Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Title: Not for those whose like drawing on the cappuccino
Review Description: Bought this for my wife because she like making shape and drawing picture on the cappuccino but this machine doesn’t matter we try change the beans or setting, we even called In but still can’t do it.  Big disappointment.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Title: A must for both office and kitchen
Review Description: Excellent slim espresso machine. Very easy to operate.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Good machine

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: First of all, it doesn't occupy space much thanks to its compact size. Economically it's important considering expensive land price.Secondly, its convenient features in design that has consudered most human behaviour to make own coffee, such as cup tray, cup warmer, 3 types of filters incl. ESE pod coffee etc.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I like latte coffee but not bothered about the patterns with the milk that comments are made. I've tried a few coffees and found that the tesco Italian suits my taste. Better than costa :-) . So as a coffee maker I like it a lot. Better than my old Tessimo that took expensive pods. This works out cheaper and better to use. The sleek design works for me due to space, only had it a week but all good. Watch YouTube videos to help you understand on how to works plenty on YouTube.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Reçu avant la date prévue, merci !Ah ces capsules !! En avez-vous déjà ouvert une ? C'est un cône en plastique où le café est emprisonné sous encore une fine pellicule en plastique . ( pas bon pour la planète ) Elles sont de surcroît deux fois plus chères que du café moulu ( 250gr au lieu de 128gr, soit :16 x 8gr pour les capsules ) . Ce percolateur fait du très bon café, ( l'eau chaude, réglable, est directement injectée sur le café, pas comme dans une capsule ) . De plus, vous pouvez utiliser des dosettes, style "SENSEO" (moins bon) s'il vous en reste encore, (c'est mon cas) dans le filtre prévu à cet effet . Ne vous inquiétez pas sila dosette est plus grande que le filtre : tassez-là sur les bords, et ça rentre . Cette machine est plus silencieuse que ma "Krups  Dolce Gusto" . Elle est bien pourvue en accessoires : Trois filtres, la cuillère doseur/tasse-café, le détartrant .Certains commentent qu'il faut tenir le perco lorsque l'on insère l'appareil à café : son faible encombrement, (donc sa légèreté ) est un atout pour un gain de place, et si l'on ne veut pas tenir l'engin, il faut en acheter un "De  Pros" , comme dans les Bars, et avoir la place pour le mettre .  CONCLUSION : très bon rapport qualité/prix .

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Bought this coffee machine to replace an old well loved de longhi - went with the same make because we'd been really happy in the past. It worked well for a couple of weeks and then just stopped pumping - we sent it back to Amazon for repair (as it was past the return/refund time) it came back looking like it hadn't even been unpacked out of the box and wasn't working any better when we plugged it back in. Just dripping through instead of the normal flow with crema that we are used to. The video that we've shared is actually it on a good day! We are now stuck with a coffee machine that we can't return, can't sell and doesn't work. Gutted.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Dopo una settimana posso dire che fa un caffè ottimo. Devo dire che l' ho provata solo con Lavazza qualità rossa per moka ed è ottimo anche con questo tipo di caffè ,avevo solo quello in casa. Mi raccomando un misurino intero da  7 grammi e poi importante è la pressione. Per fare il cappuccino ho notato che il braccio si muove e si discosta dalla macchina rendendo più facile lavorare per ottenere la schiuma, (muovere  la tazza in maniera circolare aiuta a ottenere più schiuma). La pulizia è facilissima. I filtri si possono tirar via con quella guarnizione intorno che li rende molto più semplici da lavare. Il filtro per le cialde non ha il filtro removibile ma penso sia fatto di proposito. quando si schiaccia il pulsante del caffè La macchina emette per 3 secondi un rumore come se uscisse  caffè poi si arresta e riprende l erogazione. Ho letto che è del tutto normale. Come quando si fa il vapore che fa un rumore ad intermittenza. Un po' complicato regolare temperatura e quantità di caffè desiderata;inoltre, per me va bene così, ma il caffè non esce bollente come con la moka. Facilissimo pulire il raccoglitore sotto la tazzina. Per me è un' ottima  macchina del caffè paragonata anche alla precedente, saeco via venete de luxe, anche se non ho capito se quella color metal è effettivamente tutta acciaio inox e questa no o cambia solo il colore. Cmq questa nera è costata 20 euro in meno rispetto alla metal. Consiglio acqua della bottiglia e decalcificare spesso.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Machine's pump started malfunctioning post descaling within 20 days of use, so called engineer/people who came to check the machine from Orient Electric had no idea how to diagnose the problem or check the machine in general. They asked me for the manual and sat down wondering what to do. They contacted their boss and told me they'd take the machine to the service centre. They had no product receiving slip. They asked me to write it all on a blank sheet of paper that they'll sign.This machine comes with a UK plug. They didn't even have the plug converter with them. They borrowed mine. After a week, the machine came back. The person who brought this back had no idea how to install it or run it. Couldn't demonstrate its functioning. The machine started delivering watery shots.  I went to Delonghi's youtube channel to learn the program reset procedure and ran it to get it back to default values. The problem with watery shots remained as it was. I reported this to the Orient Electric service centre and they sent the same 'I have no idea how this machine works' people to check the machine. The pump is dripping again.This might be a BAD QUALITY PROUCT supported by BAD QUALITY SERVICE.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this coffee machine 1 week ago .If you would have asked me a week ago, I would have give it  1 star or no star if possible .. but now I will give it  4 stars. It is not perfect but it doesthe job ,it  work very well and you have a pretty decent coffee .Firstly I had  to read the instructions 3 times because there are not  very helpful but after I watch few videos on YouTube I got the hang of it .Do not judge it straight away ,take your time and be patient .You have to understand this is not an industrial coffee machine.Secondly once you do your coffee give it time to cool off so you could use the steamer for hot milk and capucino.Very easy to clean and so much cheaper then drinking a coffee out . Just a little update .I used it for 6 months now ,amazing little machine and the coffee it gets better and better or maybe my barista skills kicked in 😅.Highly recommended.After 1 year of purchaseGreat machine ,easy to clean ,the coffee it gets better and better .

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is smart looking machine that doesn't take up much worktop space. I have made a couple of flat whites using ground coffee already and they were delicious. The frother works well and the coffee is dispensed quickly. Haven't tried all the programming features yet or the coffee pods so can't comment on that. The reason I give 4 stars is because it was supplied with a European 2 pin plug! I had to replace this with a UK plug...I thought it was against the law to supply electrical items in the UK with a European plug?

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Awesome. Husband very happy with it. Makes a superb espresso and machine looks good with a small kitchen space footprint.Thanks to the teachers who left previous review about having tested this to destruction in their staff room. No better recommendation!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Wir haben uns die Maschine mit dem Graefe 800 zum mahlen gekauf aufgrund der positiven Bewertungen die ich nun nich verstehe. Die Maschine baut kein druck mehr auf, auch ein zurücksetzen auf Werkseinstellungen wie beschrieben bringt nichts. Egal ob weniger oder mehr ob feiner oder gröber, kriege keine Kaffee mehr raus. Das einzige was diese Plastikmaschine produziert ist dreck, weil man die halbe Küche versaut wenn man den Siebträger löst.2 Wochen hat sie geahlten. Rate jedem vom kauf ab. Die doppelwandigen Einsätze sind schlecht, der Plastiktamper ist genauso überflüssig wie ein Kaffeepadeinsatz. Wer billig kauft kauft mehrfach:(. Wir werden auf was wertigeres wechseln in der Hoffnung das die mehr kann. Absolut keine Kaufempfehlung.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Consistently good espresso however the pump has failed on mine after just 15 months of ownership.  Not really De'Longhi Dedica more De'Shortly Dead.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: After breaking my fourth cafetiere I decided it was time to settle for a more permanent solution, which led me to this machine.Attractively priced and a pleasing on the eye. It has a small profile yet has the capacity for plenty of drinks, and my wife and I were easily able to master most drinks within a few attempts.Pros:Has an energy saving mode and can be quickly started up, ready to serve in about 20s.Large capacity drip trayEasy set up andCons:Steam spout is short and too close to the lever that controls it.Components aren't dishwasher safeI'm spending too much money on coffee and milk

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Our previously capsule coffee machine was broken, was looking for a replacement without capsules for the environment. Our kitchen is not enormous, so we want a slim functional good quality coffee machine with milk frothing function. This one prop up in the search and we gave it a go. We are very happy with the purchase. It is relatively easy to use. Only takes around 2 min to make a latte.The only reason I took a star off is that you can't really make 2 cups of coffee at a time. If I put 2 scoops of ground coffee in the "2 cup filter", it won't fit into the machine... So end up making 1 cup at a time, which takes longer to make 2 cups. Other than that, I am very happy with the machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Using this coffee machine has been incredibly difficult as it struggles to push the water through the coffee even though I’m not using a full spoon, I’m not tamping it hard and the coffee is between a fine and coarse grind. Most of the time the coffee only drips through the filter and is very bitter as it’s over extracting. Also, in my opinion, this machine is not pushing out 15 Bar of pressure. I don’t know what 15 bar of pressure looks like, but considering it’s about 7x the pressure of your car tyre I’m not convinced this machine is achieving that! I did order a replacement as I thought the first machine was under powered, but the second is pretty much the same. So all in all, a rather disappointing coffee machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The machine works really well, but only because I worked out how to use it despite the instruction manual being incorrect and missing out vital information!I’ve just come off the phone to customer services who agreed the manual isn’t right. So here’s the trick: if you’re using either of the filters that are for loose, ground coffee you need to add in the little removable drive-like piece with the black rubber round the outside.If you don’t add this, then the coffee grains will get stuck in the single hole st the bottom of the filter and the machine will stop pumping.Both the manual and the YouTube video don’t tell you this...  In fact the YouTube video on the delonghi website has a man that shows you the filter he uses - and he doesn’t use the drive-like insert.To be honest, the girl at customer services didn’t seem to understand anything I was saying....  and I’m still not convinced this is how they intend you to use the machine. However, customer services agreed it only works with the sieve inserted .... despite manual saying the sieve is for coffee pods.Once you do this the machine produces a pretty decent cup of coffee! I used to have a gaggia classic and have trained as a barista. This machine uses half the amount of coffee as the gaggia and seems to have more pressure to still produce a good quantity of espresso. The machine seems to adjust automatically the brew time in order to pump a specified amount of water though the coffee. This function seems to work well and serves as good feedback: if the brew time gets too long, you know you’ve tamped the coffee too hard.Ps... you won’t fit the full 2 spoons of coffee into the filter if you use the sieve insert....  it takes up too much space. Delonghi need to review this and communicate how they intend this filter to work!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: After a long time of wondering whether to get a pod coffee machine or not to bother at all, I decided to refine my search and only search for a barista style coffee machine for a real experience of brewing coffee. I also chose this because of how little waste there is when comparing to a pod coffee machine. I only waste the ground coffee puck but this goes straight into our green bin so no harm at all!The machine is super easy to use. I find that the portafilter is now very smooth after a few weeks of daily use. It was a little stiff at first but with a bit of practice and as the machine gets worn in, it's super easy to use. I live in a hard water area so I invested in a water filter so that I can save the internals from scaling up. This machine did come with some internal cleaner but I'm yet to get to my first full-on descaling.Filling up the water is nice and easy. Frothing the milk for cappuccino is simple and straight forward. I tend to use the Hot Milk function as I'm more of a Latte drinker.I wish this came with a better tamper than the multi-tool one it comes with. I find it hard to press the coffee into the portafilter because of the spoon being on the other end. I've invested in many tools to compliment this machine such as a black milk jug made by Rhinowares. Also, some cleaning brushes to be able to clean the small holes and pipes when doing a clean of the milk steamer.One feature which I am a little underwhelmed with (it doesn't really have any effect on the machine in my opinion) is the cup warming shelf on the top. It gets to be luke warm at the best. You can barely notice the heat from it. If I am pre-heating cups, I just run them under the hot tap. To be honest, I never really do this either...All in all, I'd definitely recommend this machine. It looks great, there's a wide range of accessories you can get direct from Delonghi and it makes a great coffee. I have never been barista trained and I picked it up in a couple of days.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: After 3 weeks of great coffee, my machine started pumping water out from its base. I tried descaling (though having used softened water all the time, I thought it would be the fruitless task it proved to be). Amazon suggested I contact Delonghi. I've had a reply from Delonghi basically telling me what's in the troubleshoot section of the manual. I have a 90Mb video of the failed descale process that caused overheat in the boiler due to lack of water supply. I await further reply from Delonghi....

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The product fits neatly in the kitchen and does not take a lot of space. It has consistently given me a good cup of espresso every time. The steam spout makes a great cup of Cappuccino as well. The only trouble I face is with the coffee basket and hot water delivery. If you bang the coffee basket even slightly to empty, then the whole filter falls off (and I have to fish it out from the trash can then). Secondly, there is no instrument provided to change the coffee filter which has resulted in chipped nails and pinched skin on quite a few occasions. The hot water spout seems to shoot out hot water like a machine gun splashing it every where! So I never use the hot water function, relying on my sturdy electric kettle.  I also feel DeLonghi can provide a better quality coffee tamper instead of the cheap plastic one.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   As Italian, I am really happy with this Delonghi coffee machine which I have been watching for so long. It's easy to use and to clean, it makes fantastic and creamy coffee (I personally use Lavazza) and I am very satisfied with the frothing quality of the milk using almond milk which I mix with soya. I love it because it's compact and stylish.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: OK. The devil, as always, is in the details.Get these things right and you will be rewarded with an exceptional expresso, better than 95% of coffee shops. The longevity of the machine I cannot speak for.Here are the details.• experiment with the coffee sort AND roast (“100% arabica” means nothing - in fact for many good espresso coffees you WANT at least some percentage of the robusta bean in there for the crema)• get the grind right for your chosen coffee - too fine and the EC685 will not handle it, the extraction will take too long (coffee drips slowly out) and the double filter is liable to clog• don’t overfill the portafilter basket for the same reason, this machine will NOT manage to push the water through fast enough and it will drip slowly through (too long = bitter)• don’t tamp too hard, for the same reason• if you live in a hard water area, use FILTERED water or buy a filter for the tank, or even better, both.OK that’s it. There is also the factory reset trick if it seems to play up, but I have not had this problem.Good luck and enjoy!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Works beautifully for a WHILE!Very easy to program with lots of options, it heats coffee well & the steam wand works great - HOWEVER I have unfortunately had to return 2 of these machines as there is a persistent fault with the power button. After a short period of time the catch inside the machine breaks, and the power button no longer remains held in - meaning that the only way to turn the machine on is to manually hold the button down the entire time you are using it.Unfortunately because this has happened to 2 separate machines it seems to be a consistent hardware problem. If you get lucky then it's a fab machine, but if not then you will only get a few months of use out of it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: An update to my first review (that I've left below). That was a 4 star review however I've dropped it to 2,and that might be a bit generous!This machine is very flawed. After using it for three months I've come to the conclusion it is just plane hard work to use with so many frustrating quirks! There is absolutly no room for variation in using it - you have to be some precise in what you do that if you stray beyond the norm something goes wrong - it's just not pleasurabe to use. I'd say I get a faultless coffee 1 time out of every 3 or 4 brews. I've listed some points of interest.1) the coffee volumes are for midgets! We use the 2-cup grounds for one cup.2) the measure provided is too big as well. All the advice and videos say not to pack the grounds too tightly where infact if you put 2 level scoops in and compress to what you think is right it's still too much coffee and when inserted onto the mackine it gets compressed even more - to being very hard compressed - then sometimes the coffee doesn't come out. We use 3/4 scoop - and this is in fact in keeping with the volume of our previous machine's scoop.3) if you want two cups you have to recharge the (2-cup!) filter holder and reattach. Unfortunately the machine is now hot and it's almost impossible to get the filter holder re reattach as it's very very tight and sometimes just won't go on!4) it gets itself into regular and various silly modes where it (function wise) locks-up and the only way out is to unplug and start again!5) more for a warning, but even with lightly packed coffee in the filter holder it regularly doesn't work and the usual cause is the hole at the bottom of the filter holder is blocked so the routine is to make sure that's cleaned after every use - we have a piece of thin wire to do that.6) the steam milk frother is pathetic. It takes longer then the mechanical frother on our old machine - and that also gave a better quality froth that didn't collapse. Forget the DeLonghi video of the so called coffee expert - tap twice - swirl - tap again stuff as your froth completely collapses doing that.I could go on with the niggles and I'm at the stage where if it spits it's dummy out with another malfunctiin of some sorts it going back - straight to DeLonghi as I don't believe Amazon should be held responsibe for such a poor product.Original Review:I went for a De'Longhi machine as they seemed to have 'the' name in the market place for such, although quality was perhaps flagged up as an issue occasionally. However, the first impression is that this coffee machine is not the panacea I'd hope for. Our previous machine had started to become very eratic in it's behaviour so a replacement became due. The first comment relates to the quantity outputted. We put in the 2 cups insert for grounds and made two cups. Well I think it must be midgets the machine was designed for! It soon became apparent that we needed the 2-cup insert for one person, so for two of us we had to run it through twice. This then made the amount of coffee ground used a very simiar quantity for two cups on our old machine. Next was the milk. It froths very well but it says not to run the frother for more than 1 minute. Well, 1 minute is barely enough time to generate frothed milk for two cups reinforcing my opinion that the machine is designed for midgets. Then there are the little niggles like when it says not to compact the coffee too firmly in the holder - if you put two of their measures of grounds in it dosen't matter how firmy you compress it as when the holder is loaded into the machine it compreses it more anyway. Then, it's really difficult to knock the used ground out of the holder. One tap on our old machine and it dropped out where here you end up having to scoop it out with a spoon!All told I'm dissapointed. I was looking for a superior coffee machine to our 15 year old machine whereas in fact I feel I've taken a backward step. It'll have to do but I can't see this one lasting 15years as my patience will run out before then - but first I need to get some money's worth out of it. :-(

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is our 4th De'Longhi coffee maker. We have had the combi one in the past but realised that we did not use the jug coffee very often so decided on this version as it takes up less room. Absolutely love it. Having had coffee makers in the past it is quite easy to get the hang of it. It is quicker and quieter than our previous models and like how the coffee automatically stops. The other coffee maker needed watching to make sure you stopped it when full. Set up to deliver 2 doses of coffee and we use Carte Noir dosettes from France which are like a coffee bag so no messy ground coffee but the same great taste. We drink a lot of coffee and this suits us really well. Would recommend.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Have been using this machine now for about 6 months and although it produces a decent cup of coffee i would not replace with the same make/model.  Firstly it is quite lightweight and in inserting the filter holder securely the machine moves around and it is easy to press one of the buttons inadvertently when trying to steady it. The machine has been used for single cup preparation normally which has been okay but on the occasions two cups have been  required I have had problems. I used the two-cup filter and put in two level scoops of correct coffee and tamped down but to try and insert the filter holder was almost impossible. After numerous  trial attempts and various cleaning procedures the only way this two-cup works is with only one and a half scoops of coffee which, obviously then produces a weaker strength.Then there is the obvious problem of getting two narrow glass/cups side by side on the cup holder.......

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I spent ages deliberating over a few models in this vague price bracket reading many reviews before deciding the DeLonghi was my best bet. My old machine which had lasted for 12 years was still available (rebranded) but scored only 3.5 stars. This DeLonghi rated higher so I had positive expectations. But it’s a bit disappointing and much more of a hassle than my old machine to operate and keep clean. Here are my top 5 likes and dislikes:TOP 5 LIKES:> The machine looks nice and has a small footprint so it fits nicely on the kitchen worktop> The quality of the coffee that it makes is very good; compared to my previous machine the coffee seems slightly more intense but certainly not more bitter. I think the temperature and pressure control must be spot on.> The steamer/frother works nicely: It is quite quick and gives a decent 'thickness'. You can also disassemble it all quite easily for cleaning.> The unit switches itself off after a short while, so if you forget to do that yourself, you're not wasting electricity> The two programmable buttons are very convenient for a short or long coffeeTOP 5 DISLIKES:> It is not as simple as you would imagine to go between coffee and steaming especially if you are making more than one latte. This is due to the need to cool the boiler after steaming which means you need to pump cold water through the steamer spout to drop the boiler from 100 degrees back to 60 degrees before it will make another espresso. Plus, it also seems that if you want to turn the steam on for 2 successive milk froths, sometimes the steam just stops for no obvious reason and other times it puts itself back on "non steam" mode and then you end up with loads of water in your milk. You need to keep your wits about you.> The decalcification cycle is too frequent and takes too long - it starts flashing and expects decalc treatment every 50-100 coffees or so and each decalc takes about 30 minutes. OK, the upside is probably that this protects your machine, but my old machine lasted 12 years without anything like such frequent cleans.> The menu system for the various options is not memorable to anyone who's not part of mensa. If you lose your instruction manual you won't know how to change any settings.> The seal in the grouphead against which the portafilter presses is quite difficult to clean (due to tight access). If you get mess on the seal (e.g. coffee granules!... no so unlikely), then the portafilter may end up leaking but putting it right is not possible with a quick wipe. I had to turn my machine upside down and try to clean the seal with cotton buds.> The portafilter has a removable filter basket which itself has a removable sieve. Seems like a good idea except that a) The sieve sometimes falls out when bashing out the used coffee granules (be careful not to lose it), and b) I think that water can get down the side of the sieve meaning that not all the liquid going into your espresso has truly been through all the coffee. Not sure about this but I've bashed out the coffee granules on a few occasions only to find that the middle of the granules are almost dry as if they've not really had much/any water go through them. That seems odd. But balance this comment with the fact that it does, nevertheless, make a decent espresso so perhaps this is normal (?).So a mixture of pros and cons. Only because my expectations were higher and the less straightforward daily operation makes me give it a 3 star rating.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is our 3rd DeLonghi espresso machine (other 2 lasted 10yrs between them). This model seemed to be the replacement for our previous machine which was fine. This one is so light and flimsy (too much plastic??) that it is impossible to fit the filter into its housing and twist to the lock position. I had to lean my full body weight onto the top of the machine (carefully so as not to press coffee flow buttons) to keep it still on the kitchen surface to allow me to do it. As my wife is shorter than me she hasn't the height, or the required strength, to hold the body of the machine whilst trying to lock the filter into place.  Had it three days and have just arranged a home collection for return. Will chose next machine more carefully.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Its good looking and slim. We are fans of De Longhi expresso machines and had to replace because of a electrical fault with the previous one. Its took us 3 weeks to nearly  master this machine and we are finally getting a good coffee. The instructions are not clear and we have had to resort to You Tube which has many many videos on how to use it. You really have to be a cross with a programmer and a mind reader. The 3 buttons on the front need to have 2 labels attached to each of them because when you get into programming mode(hold down the steam button for 10 secs)  they mean something else ( temp, hardness etc) Haven't conquered the amount of water yet but will continue to try.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I spent countless hours comparing the different brands and specs of high quality coffee machines on Amazon, and let me tell you, acquiring this coffee machine is one of the best decisions i made lately - and i'm so glad i get to spend my quarantine with the ability to indulge in a frothy flat white at any time of the day !I find the results very satisfying, and the process of preparing a cup simply enjoyable and addictive- I'am at a point where i need to limit my daily consumption - took me a short while to master the art of frothing milk properly, but it's actually very easily done and even more so if you do it out of a metal jug rather than a conventional mug  (the metal jug can be bought separately on Amazon, I also recommend it).I have yet to understand how to clean and decalcify the machine properly - i went through a whole process the other day and found it a bit complex and time consuming, but that won't prevent me from giving this machine a well deserved 5-star rating !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The last one of these lasted over 4 years. This I consider normal for a coffee machine unfortunately. I opened the box. Great packing..followed instructions to the letter.. it would not pump water properly ..repacked with great difficulty..filled in amazon form for replacement. The replacement was immediately ordered and arrived next day. and I had a month to send back via local hermes collection point. Amazing service Amazon! Thank You. The latest replacement is fine and I hope it will give me good service.Thank you Amazon!!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: De'Longhi Dedica Style, Traditional Barista Pump Espresso MachineFirst time I used this machine I was disappointed in the quality of the coffee produced (Americano), but rather than giving up I persevered with some research. Seems there are a lot of variables that need to be right in order to make a good cup of Americano. Apart from your favorite coffee beans these are: grind fineness, tamping pressure, amount of grinds used, amount of water used to dilute the expresso. I now have it just right and my Americanos are as good as Costas.As for the machine itself, it is well built, well designed, easy to clean, compact, and versatile. I have even used it to froth milk for hot chocolate for my son. He loved it.My only gripe, and hence 4 stars, and I hope it does not turn out to be a problem, is the pump is very noisy when pumping hot water. To the point where it sounds like it might not last long with regular use. Mostly I boil water in the kettle and use that instead.Apart from the pump worry it would say this machine is overall good value.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've bought other cheaper machines all under £100..and was never happy with them...so decided to treat myself and buy a slightly more expensive one...definitely worth it!!..coffee is nice and hot unlike cheaper ones which I found make it tepid...milk frother does its job nicely...but my favourite bit is the fact that if you remove the main drip tray there is a secondary smaller removable drip tray underneath...which gives loads of clearance for a standard coffee mug!!! The programing function for delivery amount is straight forward and its not to noisy.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I ordered a replacement for my original De Longhi in June. That one worked ok-ish, but one evening in September it exploded!! Cleared up the mess, phoned A,axon, and after the Amazon rep couldn’t connect to the manufacturer, he offered to replace it. Next day delivery/ no hassle/ again very impressed by both this wonderful machine* and Amazon service. The coffee machine works faultlessly, but I don’t like the plastic insert in the coffee holder, but as I cannot persuade the other inserts to fit, it just means it’s fiddly to clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The product had a faulty switch which was very quickly resolved by way of return and replace it took one day. The new machine is perfectly ok. It takes no time at all to heat up and makes perfect froth for the cappuccinos that we love.Easy to use and easy to clean, nice and slim so doesn't take up too much space.I would definitely recommend this machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this as an upgrade to previously well-abused espresso machine. Narrow and stylish, it took less space and had better features such as automatic cut off (my previous machine needed me to switch off the coffee making process manually). My main niggles are some odd design choices such as the power switch down the side towards the back of the machine rather than up front with the other controls. The other issue is that the filter is clasped into the holder using a spring metal system that means when removing coffee using the traditional hit the coffee holder against something hard method of removing the coffee can result in the filter coming loose instead. The said spring clasps might loosen over time if you are in the habit of switching between filter sizes or if u switch between ground coffee and ESE pods frequently. Another niggle is the long cool off period for the steamer. However I prefer this to be there rather than ending up with burnt coffee. But basically if you plan on making more than one cappuccino , you should make all the coffee first then froth the milk for each cup after.  Having said all that though, the pressure is good and the coffee has come out consistently smooth and creamy and the frother works well too. I've given it a variety of coffee brands (both ready ground and freshly ground) and everything was A-Ok. In all a great little machine for the price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This coffee machine involves a little more effort and a bit more mess, but the results are worth it. You'll have to experiment a little with coffee grind (if using beans) and how hard or soft to tamp depending on grind size, but it doesn't take long to work out. Previously had a bean to cup machine which always seemed to produce a different result so this pump machine is more consistent and a big improvement. Crema isn't as good as with a Nespresso machine, but it's good enough considering this uses a pressurised filter. Can't comment on the milk frother as we use our Nespresso Aeroccino if necessary.Chose the charcoal grey version (it's not black) rather than the silver. In John Lewis the silver machine was covered in fingerprints - something that doesn't affect the red or the grey, and the grey looked classier in the shop.However ... the paint job is very poor. Just after a couple of weeks we were astonished to discover that the paint chips off to reveal the silver finish underneath. I don't know if this is a known issue or if we were unlucky with a dodgy unit, but this greatly negates the point of choosing one of the painted versions rather than the silver. Where the paint flakes off makes the machine look tatty and cheap, and it's difficult to understand how the manufacturer skimped on this detail. Such a disappointment and a clear oversight on the part of Delonghi.That said, the Dedica heats up quickly, is easy to programme, produces good espresso, takes up little space on the kitchen counter and paint job aside, looks good.Pros:- very quiet compared with Nespresso and bean-to-cup machines- takes up very little space - just a bit bigger than a basic Nespresso machine- can use any type of bean, from light roast to dark and oily beans, unlike a bean to cup machine- produces good cremaCons:- very thin/fragile paint job- the cup warmer is a bit of a gimmick- old coffee grains stick to the roof of the filter on the machine, so wipe these off before making another drink

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I was a barista and I have used many coffee machines. I read a lot of reviews and watched videos about this machine and I was very excited about it. However, the machine is very unreliable. Put too much or too little coffee in, tamper it too hard or not hard enough, and the machine barely sprouts out coffee or when it does, it’s very weak. The cups are not standard sizes, which means that the cup supposedly for a double espresso actually only makes one since it doesn’t take anymore than 10g (standard is 14g for a double espresso). It was important for me to be able to make two espressos at once, so this has been the biggest disappointment. After two days of use the milk frother is barely working and the machine overheats and stops working even though I’ve only made one cup of coffee. I bought this because I wanted a waste-free and affordable alternative to Tassimo (or any pod) coffee machine but I am highly disappointed. My mother-in-law has the Swan retro one, which costs only £85 and it works so much better and is more reliable, albeit it seems more flimsy. While this machine looks robust and of high quality material, it has very little else going for it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   This coffee machine is rubbish. The following issues became apparent only after a few weeks of use:1. The filter comes off the filter holder and gets stuck in the device when I try to remove it. This happens almost every time I use the machine.2. In some cases, the steam does not work. As you can see in the photo, the steam light is on but no steam is coming out.3. The frother cannot froth properly. When I put it in the 'cappuccino' mode, it still takes the milk to the boiling point before there is much froth.A friend of mine had the same machine bought two years ago and it didn't have these issues. The manufacturing quality is certainly declining.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this thinking it was the answer to my coffee woes and given how many positive reviews have been posted about it. Reality is that this coffee machine has barely any pressure, and certainly not enough to make an espresso coffee. The machine works only with course ground beans and NOT with espresso grinds. Espresso grinds are too fine and the machine cannot push water through very fine grinds - you end up with no coffee coming through to your cup and just a big mess to clean up in the machine. A real pity given Delonghi are supposed to be a leading brand in coffee machines. Very disappointing they can’t even make one that does the job it says it’s supposed to do.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Still not got to grips with making two coffees in a row, as lights start flashing after one coffee+milk cycle...... ? and am not sure whether to do both coffee first then two lots of milk or coffee then milk, then second coffee, then milk, or other combo ?  If I could be bothered to read all the instructions it might say, but there's a lot of words for a machine with few buttons........ anyway the main thing is that the latte/coffee is great

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Summary: Poor support and quality from De'Longhi. Amazon has provided an excellent Returns service.Bought a new De'Longhi Dedica Style to replace a much used and loved one bought in Dec 2019. The original failed with flashing 1xShot and Steam lights. No help from De'longhi support as over 2 years old (by 8 months).After unpacking my new machine, I was surprised to see how many parts were now 'cheap' chromed items and not as solid as my old machine. Both have the same model number  EC685BK.However, I followed the "First Use" instructions. However, no water came out of the filter as expected but poured out from underneath the machine. I checked the water tank was fitted correctly and tried again. Coldwater poured out again from underneath the main body.I contacted De'Longhi, who told me that I had fitted the water tank incorrectly. This was not the case as I heard and felt it click into place. They then suggested that I send it back to Amazon for replacement or refund, but it is to the De'Longhi Webstore.  I have chosen a refund and will buy from a different manufacturer.This model, EC685, used to be an excellent coffee maker. From my own experience and the recent experiences/reviews of others, I can now see that quality has been comprised to maintain profits.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this appliance after a long debate on which model of De'Longhi should I choose. As always, after reading the reviews from the community (good and bad) thought it might be really unlucky if I get one with the same already reported power issue. Turned out that I was. The machine went faulty after the first initial raise and auto self test performed automatically on the first start, it won't stay on for more than 2 seconds.After several attempts of troubleshooting it, plug in/out, hold the power button etc, I came to the conclusion that the power button has a faulty design.The master power on/off button is a mechanical one, this means that when in is ON it will stay put and a little bit pressed. On the other hand, when it is OFF the button will remain aligned with the surface of the appliance. Looks like there is an issue with the system that will keep the button pressed because if you keep manually pressing the button, the appliance will stay on for as long as you can hold your finger, once you release it, it will go off.I've contacted De'Longhi "customer service" and they advise to me that I should claim a refund with Amazon straight away.I believe there is a major design issue on the ON/OFF button on this machine.Unfortunately I was not able to drink a single coffee from this appliance. Will never buy again from this brand.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought to replace a Francis and Francis. This plastic unit for home use has struggled to maintain pressure from day one and finally broke completely within 5 weeks. Double espresso flavour was OK but not as strong and smooth as a more robust machine.To repair its 3-5 days for collection then 7-10 days for a repair. That’s so long to be without a machine, it’s cheaper to buy one than Starbucks for us all every day! Not a great overall experience.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I upgraded from a very simple espresso maker. It took me a little while to perfect my technique, it helped when I read the instructions. I really like both the crema it makes and the milk frothing. You can add extra heat too if you wish. I really like that it measures out the amount of crema so you can let it do its thing while you get the milk and other stuff ready. I think it is worth paying that bit extra as I do get a better cappuccino using this machine against the basic version.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: WOW I LOVE MY COFFEE MACHINE!!IT IS SOOO EASY TO USE ONCE YOU GET THE HANG OF IT, I WOULD SUGGEST YOU QUICKLY GOOGLE HOW TO USE THE MACHINE INSTEAD OF READING THE BOOKLET.THE MACHINE DOESN'T COME WITH A MILK CUP SO I WOULD SUGGEST BUYING ONE, IF YOU LIKE TO ADD MILK TO YOUR COFFEE.IF YOUR LOOKING FOR A QUICK AND EASY MACHINE I WOULD 100% SUGGEST THIS ONE, I'M SO HAPPY WITH MINE!!SUPER QUICK DELIVERY, THANK YOU SELLER!!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a great machine, easy to use and makes perfect espresso. The set up is a bit involved but follow the step by step instructions you'll soon be ready to make great coffee. As an espresso fiend I've not used the milk heater/frother too much but on the occasions I've made flat whites or cappuccino's for visitors it has performed well. The facility to set the volume of coffee to suit your chosen cups is first class meaning no mess from overfilling and perfect strength coffee to suit your taste. The machine is easy to clean and looks the business. I can't think of a single negative.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this and had to return it because it stopped working within a few months. The 2nd one has now  stopped working after a year.  I regularly descale it, even though the descale button doesn't turn yellow to show it needs descaling.  It stopped working a week ago, so I descaled it.  It worked for a few days and stopped working again.  I liked this machine because it was easy to use. Didn't take up much room and looked good.  Unfortunately, the longevity of this machine is very short.  It is a lot of money to lose and to have to buy another machine.I am very, very disappointed.  I thought De'Longhi was a good make but clearly,  not in coffee machines.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: If you like good coffee without too much hassle, this is a good option. It works smoothly and fast, it makes really nice brew and the maintenance is simple and straightforward. I have been using it twice a day every day for a month and I have a grand total of 0 bad details to point out about it. Brilliant kitchen addition.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I am not sure if the user manual I got with it is the correct one. However correctly we follow the instructions, the machine does not seem to be doing anything that the manual says it must be doing. I just got the machine today, one more try tomorrow, and if it doesnt work its going straight back, to Amazon !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: After years of having pod coffee makers and seeing the waste those capsule machines create plus the expense and not so great taste i looked hard for a machine like this one. You can make coffee as good as a barista at a fraction of the price, i will never go back to pods and no need to spend lots more on those that grind more unless thats what you want.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This solid little machine has got the necessary grunt power to fire out a rapid successions of espressos AND includes for making  a bang-tidy microfoam in seconds for cappuccinos.A job that used to take over 5minutes for one extra large cappuccino cup now achieved in less than 2 minutes.Good job Delonghi....back up to producing good products after a succession of wilderness years!Only downside is the necessity to purge steam for ages after 4 double espressos (supposedly to stop it ‘burning’ the next coffee)...but I’ll live with that!PS. Not supplied with the shown bottle of wine!  :-)

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I used to have a more manual espresso machine but they seem to be difficult to find at this price point, so I purchased this one.  A few minor gripes.  The amount of water per shot is pre-programmed, though you can change this fairly easily.  But it's not the fully manual process that I'm used to.  Also the filter doesn't seem to hold as much grind, plus it's really awkward to fit to the machine if you have even the slightest bit of extra grind in the filter (I like a stronger espresso).  Finally, when you come to wash the filter, if you submerge the whole thing you then have to take it apart (removing a screw) to ensure there's no water/bubbles inside it.  Otherwise soapy espresso.  Had it a month, not overly impressed at this point in time.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Awful machine - after 6 months is dripping water everywhereYou can only use the delonghi product to clean it (£10 a bottle for descaling)Getting in touch with delonghi in order to check the warranty is mission impossibleWill never buy delonghi again

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: after using lavassa pod machine for years decided to go for a less wasteful alternative. great machine but you need alot of practice to get it right. much cheaper using ground coffee than pods.  but e.s.e bags work very well and less messy.make sure you fit the frother correctly or you get far to much froth. altogether very happy after 3 months of use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Stopped working after 2 months. Dangerous unpredictable boiling hot water shooting from steam spout and no water coming through coffee filter. Very bad purchase. Unhappy customer. No support from Amazon or Delonghi regarding replacement or refund. Not fit for purpose.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: the comprehensive packing did not include a user manual, I have previously had a De longhi machine, but this model was not the same, so I was lost without a manual. I currently do not have a printer, so had to grovel to friend to print one for me. Once i had this I could get to grips with the machine. This is not a cheap item, I recently bought a £20 simple hair dryer and that came with instructions, so why not this

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Was hoping to make a nice mug of coffee sadly can only get small cups underneath. So if your expecting a nice mug of coffee buy instant.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We purchased this De’Longhi espresso machine to replace the same model, which we had had for quite a few years. It heats up very quickly and has a much smaller footprint than most other machines. It also makes a very good espresso or cappuccino and, once you find the flavour that suits you, it is very reliable and tells you when it needs descaling. We use Illy Mild Roast and Full Bodied Roast 50/50.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Right, so this is the best thing I have ever bought in my whole life. It completely changed my life and my relationship with coffee. As Italian I am very fussy about coffee and this is the only machine that brought back the love and the passion I had to make and enjoy coffee!!!! Definitely the best coffee machine you will ever see!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It is a very smart machine that has a small "foot print" ie takes up not much space.  It is ready to go more quickly than I can put the coffee in and makes a lovely cup of coffee.  I find it easy to clean.It unfortunately had an electrical fault after a couple of months use - inititally solved by changing the fuse but recurred and blew the next fuse.  After an initial "misunderstanding", De'Longhi collected the machine for repair.  This was over the Christmas period so it took about 3 weeks to return.  Apparenty there is a 2 year guarentee, so overall it is good value for money.  Relatives have bought this and used much more often without any issues so I guess I was just unlucky, but am reassured it will have at least a 2 year life.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The machine works fine, it’s nothing special, but using the milk frother is an issue. With no exaggeration, it is so loud that it hurts your ears and I am pretty sure it should have a warning on it advising of possible damage to the ears!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Seemed like excellent value, I really wanted to love this but it just didnt deliver.I believe my machine was a previous return so dont know if issue is with model or I just got a bad one.Making a single expresso semed ok but temperature was just luke warm.Tried to make a double expresso and it just failed. Tried with courser grind and still no good.Sending back and will look else where.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love this coffee machine and especially for the price-point, I highly recommend it.  The only reason for taking off a star is because if the coffee is too compacted in the dispenser it dribbles through so slowly and at first I thought the dispenser was blocked.  Discovered less pressed coffee plus flushing the coffee dispenser through empty a few times on a regular basis keeps it working well.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: With a bottomless porta filter and adjusted water volumes, it makes pretty good espresso and the foaming wand makes fairly silky milk.It did, however, break the second time I used it. The power button no longer stays depressed. I couldn't really be bothered returning it so it's now jammed in permanently with a toothpick. So if you buy one, expect decent coffee and it almost definitely breaking.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I have had this for 6 weeks now and use it at least 4 times a day. It’s good, quite complicated to set up though and every 2 weeks it needs to be descaled. We do use it a LOT though. Overall I like it, looks good too.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I wouldn't have put this review here, but as it is impossible to contact DeLonghi/Kenwood I was unsure of what to do. This machine works well when it works, but it isn't the first time we've had a problem with this product.  It is now out of warranty (just) and there doesn't seem to be a thing we can do about it!I would avoid this product!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine makes nice coffees. My only criticism would be the cups which hold the ground coffee are not very big so even if you use the 2 cup function you can't get a full mug of coffee at reasonable strength. They're designed for pretty small cups. The machine is compact and quiet and looks good.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Can't fault it. Makes lovely coffee, works reliably, easy to clean and descale and is very quick to get up to temperature.If I try hard enough to find fault with it, I'd say the valve on the cappuccino spout switches too easily between hot milk and capp frother, so if you're not paying attention you can end up with warm milk instead of capp froth, but this is very minor.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I love my coffee and not easy to get a good cup outside all the time. It's very handy to use (you would need a grinder extra to have it from the beans) and gives a great coffee. The steamer is very handy and you have the milk temperature as per your liking. When it comes to descaling, it's not so great, I always used the recommended delonghi descaler but it would not descale is all the time. Sometimes I had to descale it 3-4 times in a row to get it cleaned. Still, giving it a 5 star because it makes great coffee !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I never been a big fan of coffee before but once I bough it I become from those kind of people that can’t have a day without a nice hot cup a day.It did performed good but I still have some problems with it, burn probaby I will learn how to use it properly.Tha only thing that annoys me is that when you take of the coffee holder the little metal cup got stuck inside and is a bit uncomfortable to be removed.Other wise I strongly recommended it because is handy and it fits almost everywhere in your kitchen.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great coffee machine! Really compact. Fast. Easy to use once you get used to how to froth the milk (put spout at an angle to get the best froth)! Makes a great latte. Can fit taller cups/coffee glass under as can remove bottom part. As a coffee snob, I would highly recommend.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Was very disappointed in milk frother, takes ages and neither latte or cappuccino milks are to standard of far cheaper machines used before. I did get it at discount price and does espressos well. Still disappointed by milk wand/frother which I purchased for but acknowledge that this may be why I was able to buy at discount price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I have only made a coffee and a hot chocolate so far, but a million times better than my old cafetiere. My only gripes are that the tamper is pretty flimsy (which is likely on purpose so you can buy a better tamper, which I did) and that there are some informational stickers on the tank and drip tray that leave residue when you take them off. Bit of rubbing alcohol sorted that out but it is a pain.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this coffee machine only because the price was reduced. It arrived scratched and damaged, thought it was too expensive even for the reduced priced. Returned the item.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very disappointed with this machine. No idea why it has very good reviews. Maybe for light coffee drinkers but if you drink a strong full of flavour espresso this machine is a waste of money. The espresso was barely warm even after changing the settings. Not sure if I wasn’t lucky and got faulty ones or it’s the issue in general. Design is nice but nothing else, doesn’t do the job.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Out first machine was only 3 weeks old before the pump went.We then got sent a replacement machine, like for like, and now the pump has gone again, it was only 5 weeks old.Sent off for a repair as it’s now outside the returns window otherwise I’d be requesting a full refund to then buy an alternative machine that will work!Reading other reviews the pump does seem to be an issue!!!AVOID AND DONT BUY!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this to replace an earlier version of the same model on which the pump was losing it's power after around 4 years of daily use.  I like the compact and neat appearance of this machine and it does everything expected of it.  The latest model has a better steamer which can be used to heat milk or make a lovely frothy cappuccino.  Highly recommend as a entry model coffee maker.  Can use pods or ground coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Upgraded from my 10 year old Delonghi coffee maker which is still working well. Really pleased with this new coffee maker. Easy to use and makes a lovely cappuccino.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It makes really good coffee - far better than my previous make espresso machine. However the real test will be how durable  it is. This is my second Delonghi machine - the first one gave up within a year and previous reviews suggest this isn’t unusual. I  have registered my guarantee this time!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Makes superb coffee better than Costa or Starbucks etc. Also cheaperA good investment and looks cool toEasy to use a proper coffee barista experience all I need is the Tee shirt

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Cannot fault it.Bought on a lightening deal.My Mother bought us a dolce gusto machine a few years back when we first decided we'd like a coffee machine.  We persevered for a year or two but the pods became very expensive to drink on a regular basis so was thrilled to see this with such great reviews at a great price.It makes coffee to rival any coffee shop.My best purchase of 2017.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I'm a coffee addict and I absolutely love this machine. It's small, simple to use and to clean, makes an amazing espresso, and decent cappuccino foam too! Great value for money, I've used other machines that are more expensive but get damaged very easily and need to be replaced often. This one is still going strong after 2 years of daily usage! Highly recommended.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great machine that’s capable of making an excellent cappuccino without too much fuss and at a reasonable price point. Now an essentially part of my home office life and I wouldn’t want to be without it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: If you like your coffee strong this isn't for you. The receptacle which holds the ground coffee is too small, even the  two cup one and if you dilute the espresso shot with hot water for a full cup of coffee it's so weak it's not even funny.  I used good quality coffee beans that I have used for years so the beans are not the issue. One word sums it up, disappointing!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Son is very happy with this kit. The Espresso it produces is always lovely and unlike nespresso like machines this product allows you more freedom of choice for which beans you want to use.The milk frother is a but hit and miss however not much of a drawback as the main purpose is fulfilled.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: replaced a 5 year old Russel Hobbs espresso maker. The first one I ordered was a let down and returned within 24 hours as was flimsy plastic body, less wattage than advertised and switches were already malfunctioning. Decided to spend an extra 40 pounds on this machine by Delonghi and what a difference in quality of make and power of the coffee maker.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is an excellent coffee  machine and exceeds my previous one, a Gaggia which cost about 3 times the price ten years ago! I use it for espresso and it produces an excellent crema. It also is quite powerful ( high wattage) which enables quick warm up and produces a hot cup of coffee. It is very compact so fits in the kitchen without taking up too much work surface.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It's the perfect coffee machine for the beginner brewer! Compact, lovely looking and easy to use. I have it for about a month or so and so far it's been perfect for me!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I would score higher but the coffee machine came with just the one double filter instead of the three on the description. Contacted amazon who is unable to send these and only offers refund on return.which i do not want as i like the machine and would like to just get the missing bits.Not the easiest of machines to use and the frother is also a bit here and there.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I am some what of an amateur coffee enthusiast that didn't fancy plunging money into pods but also didn't fancy weighing out water volumes and grinding fresh coffee everyday; this is exactly what I wanted. I also use a separate milk frother you can find on Amazon made by a company called Chyna which I highly recommend. This machine is also the highest ranked in its 'genre' on Which? as of June 2020 :)I have had this for over 8 months and have 0 complaints.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Nothing to dislike from this perfect coffee machine. Just love it. We had to down size due to the old machine being to big for the kitchen. This one fits right in. Love it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great machine, love it. Easier to use than the last Delonghi  machine, also have the grinder, saved a fortune in bought out coffeeThankyou

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I previously had a cheap pod machine which broke within a few months. Returned that one and decided up upgrade to this machine as I realised I couldn't live my life drinking rubbish coffee anymore! And as pods are so expensive this will be cheaper in the long run. I am really happy with the machine so far, cleaning and descaling is very easy.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: this replaced a cheaper model by another manufacturer. It makes a much tastier cup, using the same beans / grind. I think that is because the temperature control is better. And it is quicker than the previous one we had.Overall, an excellent purchase, one month in!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Not a bad piece of kit and makes great coffee. Two issues stopping the 5 stars for me. The steam spout is in two parts and requires far too much effort to keep clean, could be longer too. Secondly the filter for the coffee has been designed for three different uses and every time you try to knock the spent coffee out the various inserts tend to come out with it!! Annoying....

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Fantastic coffee machine, easy to use and also easy to modify settings to your preferences. Makes a great cup of coffee and the steamer/frother is extremely powerful! Worth paying the extra for this one.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: My previous model has lasted for years and survived heavy daily use, so when one of the switches eventually wore out; we got a new one. We really like the fact that the coffee holder comes apart for cleaning, which it did not before.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Coffee tastes great, the machine looks fantastic but I'm having some issues with how the coffee holder attaches to the machine - sometimes, it's very difficult to attach - spoils the experience of making the coffee having to struggle to fit attachment- might be my technique give it a week or so.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Already had to send one back as the pressure wasn't pushing any water through the coffee.I've tried multiple coffees, multiple grinds and still cannot produce a Crema from 2 coffee machines.Very disappointed.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great machine 👏👍. Took some getting used to how much to tamp the coffee  into the holder but sorted

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Quick delivery. Compact coffee machine that gives a great coffee. The machine itself is quite loud. The rest is perfect!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I brought this as a gift for my husbands birthday. We have viry used it every day since over the last year.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The machine makes a terrific cup of Espresso/Cappuccino. Very easy easy to use, fast and easy to clean.Slightly noisy but I've owned worse.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very disappoint just 4 months on and machine is leaking terribly from the steamer  spout Delongi are not even answering customer service issues.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: One of the best coffee machines to have at home, have reasonable portability and to make extremely good coffee.If you do like espresso this is the machine.You can choose your own coffee, dose it to your taste and you don't need capsules therefore eco-friendly.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The product is no good for anyone with weak wrists. It was impossible for my wife to close and open the coffee holder.  There should be an alert on it.It also did not produce  decent sized cappucino. this is also to  do with the narrow design . nothing to hold onto whilst undoing the holderWe have replaced it with another De LOnghi, Scuttura, which is great

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Small form factor, looks nice, produces decent pressure and makes nice coffee!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is the first time I've gotten a coffee machine and I don't regret buying this. It's really simple to set up, use and makes great coffees. Can't really ask for much more.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.B DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Black, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Takes a bit of getting used to but once you have got the hang of it its great.
