No coffee makes it to the cup other than a dribble.I came onto Amazon to return the product, only to be told the return date expired on the 31st January. 9 days ago.Surprise surprise.I will not be purchasing any DeLonghi items in a hurry any time soon.Do yourselves a favour and buy a decent machine for more money. And make sure it is for the UK market.Totally disappointed in this item and angry that the supplier is shipping substandard goods out like this.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I really loved this item. It was generally easy to use and looked great. It was discreet, stylish but importantly made great coffee, consistently.However, 3 months after owning it stopped working altogether. It was used most days but the usage wasn't excessive (as in more than 2 cups per day) and it was cleaned thoroughly after each use. Unfortunately, a few days ago it just stopped working. Fortunately Amazon were kind enough to issue a full refund and the item has been returned, but overall i'm disappointed that the product is not 'built to last' and therefore it maybe a false economy to part with your cash on this. I'd suggest you go for something a little more robust (typically more expensive) that will hopefully last you longer.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: ***I love the coffee this machine makes. ****I don’t like the little hole you need to put a pin in periodically.  So tiny.  It just seems pointless.*I don’t like the descaling that needs to be done (my old model which I had years, didn't).*I don’t enjoy all the messing around with setting the various flashing lights for different functions.*All in all - I love the coffee but I feel they’ve went too far over pointless things. **I must add that other coffee machines seem to be doing the same things. **

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Having been unimpressed with my first attempts at making coffee in this maker I took to you tube to watch a video to make sure that I was using this coffee maker correctly.Thankfully I chose an enthusiastic barista to show me how to use the maker.Since watching this video I have perfect coffee each time. I can't enthuse enough about the De'Longhi Dedica  Style. It is so easy to use and clean and constantly provides excellent coffee. Well worth the money. Extremely pleased with my purchase.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great little espresso machine with a small footprint therefore it will not overpower your kitchen worktop.Easy to use and warms up to working temperature very quickly.  Delivers an excellent espresso with great creama top.  The steamer is great for heating or frothing your milk.Excellent for making 1-2 espressos, cappuccinos or lattes at a time.  Making drinks for larger groups will require great timing and efficiency.You need to make all your espresso before using the milk steamer.  Once you use the streamer, the machine goes into a cooling down cycling (3-5 minutes) and you simply cannot make another espresso until this is completed.  I initially thought the machine had a fault but it has been designed this way.  However, switching the machine off and on again allows you to continue making more espressos without any wait.In summary, this is a fabulous, eveyday espresso machine for 1-2 drinks at a time.  For those that like to entertainment larger groups this may not be the machine for you.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Had is 3 months or so now, and been making around 6 cups a day out of this for the two of us plus family visitors..Its a very good first step into coffee for me, I'm interested to get a grinder next.Actually enjoy my own coffee more than most coffee shop ones now, I hate the coffee machine at work now (a bean to cup one).I'm using Lavazza black pre-ground and it tastes wonderful, just make sure you dont buy ordinary ground which is a bit bigger as it really mades a difference with the fine grind.Only negative is the descale process, there is conflicting info everywhere about how to do this, it taken me over an hour and it was required after only a month or so of use. I've now put it on soft water mode and use only brita filter water so it should take a while longer this time before needing it again.Pro tip: Turn the temp to high in the settings menu - I done this after descaling so about a month in and it made the coffees even nicer! (they were lovely to begin with).

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very quick delivery with prime. Only got it yesterday, so I can't speak about the durability or how well it will be in time. But in the 24 hours I've had it I've found it to be a really good machine. It's small so it doesn't take up too much of the kitchen counter. It makes delicious coffee and the milk steamer works really well and makes for a delicious cappuccino. It heats up super quick from turning on in the morning, it's actually quicker than my kettle would boil.It takes maybe 15-40 minutes to read the instructions to learn how to set it up, change the settings, etc. But after that it's great.I'm usually the type to skip the instructions myself, but I recommend that you do read it if you buy this machine, it's well worth it to take the time and go through the instructions for the first time you use it to make sure you don't miss out on it's features like setting your preferred brewing temperature among other settings.The only thing I can fault on it is that the cup warmer on the top is a bit pointless for home users as the time it takes to be ready is so short that your cup will not be warmed up unless you choose to wait much longer. But I can see it being useful for a business or office setting if the machine is on for long periods.All around, it's a great coffee machine for the price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It’s a good quality machine , that makes good coffee consistently. It’s also a good looking thing. The issue is that there’s a known fault with the on off power button. If you look through independent  reviews , it seems that some owners have had issues where their machine was a problem. For me it wasn’t a big deal. Brand new, straight back to Amazon, swapped out and the replacement has worked fine since. Might be a Friday afternoon machine, but quite a few seem to have had similar problems . I would recommend it though, based on its coffee making qualities and overall value.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Wir holen aus der Maschine mittlerweile einen Cappuccino heraus, der die meisten in Eimsbüttel übertrifft. Das hat uns aber einige Tage Kalibrierung und Nerven gekostet, daher hier ein paar Tipps:• Ziel ist es, dass der Espresso 25 Sekunden durchläuft, eine stabile Crema hat und nicht bitter schmeckt. (Und die 25 Sekunden haben nichts mit der Wassermenge zu tun - die bleibt immer gleich. Die Temperatur steht bei uns auf „mittel“.)• Daher probiert man vor allem am Pulver herum. Eine günstige Rommelsbacher Mühle bringt leider gar nichts (zu grob), bei uns wurde es dann eine Graef CM800. Ja, die kostet dann fast soviel wie die Dedica, aber das ist sie auch wert. Wirklich.Bei der CM800 haben wir das innere Mahlwerk volle 5 Stufen/Schrauben Richtung „fine“ gestellt. Am äußeren Ring steht sie auf 4. Das ist so fein, dass das Pulver relativ langsam kommt und leicht klumpt. Ein bisschen wie Puderzucker.Wichtig ist auch, dass der Kaffee nicht zu alt ist. Also eher keine Vorratskäufe mit Kaffeebohnen. Wir benutzen übrigens Toraldo Bluette.Das war mit Abstand der schwierigste Teil.• Was sich auch lohnt, ist der Kauf von einwandigen Sieben. In der Dedica sind doppelwandige „Cremasiebe“ mitgeliefert, die machen zwar solide Crema, aber sehr unsoliden Geschmack. Die Siebe kosten ca. 14€ und sind auch von Graef. (Für das Doppel-Shot Sieb muss man das Plastikteil aus dem Siebträger rausschrauben und etwas flacher schneiden. Das klingt aber wilder als es ist. Wir benutzen fast nur das Singleshot-Sieb.)• Dann muss man probieren, wieviel Kaffee in den Siebträger muss und wie fest man ihn anpresst. Wir machen ihn bis ca 5mm unter den Rand des Siebträgers voll. Angepresst natürlich. Zwischendurch sollte man oft klopfen, damit das Pulver gleichmäßig verteilt ist. Sonst sucht sich das Wasser den einfachsten Weg und läuft am Geschmack vorbei.Noch ein wichtiger Zusatzkauf: ein gescheiter Metall-Tamper. Mitgeliefert ist ein wabbeliges Plastikteil, mit dem man nicht annähernd den richtigen Druck erzeugt. 14kg Druck sollen es übrigens sein. Also ganz ordentlich, aber auch nicht brutal reinknallen.• Fast am Ziel. Den nächsten Punkt nennen Fachleute die „Jagd nach dem Mäuseschwänzchen“. Der Espresso soll so langsam aus der Maschine laufen, dass sich der Strahl etwas bewegt - eben wie ein Mäuseschwänzchen. Um die 25 Sekunden zu erreichen, muss man den Mahlgrad und die Kaffeemenge feintunen. Der perfekte Punkt ist kurz bevor nichts mehr rauskommt.• Milchschaum funktioniert mit der Maschine auch fantastisch, dafür muss man nur darauf achten, dass das Milchkännchen und die Milch immer kalt sind, damit man mehr Zeit hat den perfekten Schaum zu machen. Man muss auch gar nicht in der Milch „rumrühren“, sondern es reicht die Milch „rollen“ zu lassen. Also sie rollt an der Düse und rührt sich damit selbst die dicken Blasen unter. Wenn das Milchkännchen unten so heiß ist, dass man es nicht mehr anfassen kann, ist sie heiß genug. Wer zulange schäumt, macht die Süße in der Milch kaputt.Das waren unsere Erfahrungen. Ich hoffe es hilft dem ein oder anderen bei der Einrichtung und spart ein paar Stunden. Viel Erfolg!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Sturdy well made product. Easy to add water and easy to remove frothing wand for cleaning. Two attachments for pre ground coffee and one for bags. Easy to put into the holder but would do it before adding the coffee. Tamper is plastic but does a good job of compression.You need to practice to get the coffee taste to your own preference. Can do one or two cups at same time but need small cups if doing two in order to balance on tray.As with all machines of this size and type you have to put the coffee in each time you use. So if you were making for a number of people not ideal. Overall a good machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: In general is great, I love it because it's so easy to use, easy to clean and makes great coffe. Also you have the option to steam the milk and make it creamy, which I love.From time to time you have to descale the machine with a special product, but it's quite easy to do.The only issue is that I had problems with the steamer. It showed me a red light as I had to descale the machine but it didn't work properly even after that. So I returned it and replaced it, and the new one hasn't given us any problem.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this to upgrade from my well loved, 7 year old Tassimo machine. Since they stopped the pod recycling scheme I was conscious of how much plastic I am throwing away.My sister has one of these machines which I used during Christmas so I came home and treated myself to one. Easy to set up and use.  Add 2 teaspoons of my vegan creamer powder and you have the perfect cup of coffee. ☺️

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Love this machine. Been wanting a decent coffee machine for ages but didn’t want to spend crazy money. After doing a bit research I found this one. So happy I bought it, amazing bit of kit. I have been to a lot of cafe’s and I have struggled to find a decent espresso, either too bitter or tasting burnt. I have had this machine for a couple of days now and I have had a lot of espresso’s from it #buzzing and every coffee has been amazing.The milk frother is also great, makes a great cappuccino.Ps I recommend getting a decent grinder to go with it. Grinding the beans properly will bring out all the right flavours and aromas.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: never invested in a coffee machine at this price before. had one that i used to use which was a different make and cost half the amount but broke after a yearThis machine is very nice looking, quite easy to use once used to itquite time consuming to make my cappuccino so cannot use it in a hurrybut makes a lovely cappuccino with soya milk just as good as from the coffee shopi do use it daily and I used to buy a coffee every day before.hope it lasts as only had a few months but happy so far

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Heats up very quickly and makes a great cup of coffee using 44mm E.S.E. pods.  I prefer my coffee at a medium strength and have discovered that I can use the same pod with two or three '2-cup' pulls in quick succession and it makes a great mug o' joe.  Kind of like making an Americano, maybe, except that your additional hot water is just weaker coffee from the same ESE pod, so somewhat more cost-effective, as well.  If I want a more robust/bigger mug of coffee I might splurge and use two pods in quick succession but tbh I haven't found it necessary.  Himself prefers his cuppa stronger and goes for the espresso effect using Senseo-compatible single-serve pods (as he prefers the brand of coffee that packages it that way and has yet to find it in ESE pods), and although it's not an exact fit, it works and he gets a great coffee.  The milk frother works well also, though to be fair we don't use it all that often.  Not difficult to clean.  Narrow footprint, takes up little space, nice streamlined, space-agey appearance and looks great on the countertop.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The price I'm prepared to pay for a decent espresso machine has gradually edged up as my coffee snobbery has grown. This is the best machine I've had by far with accurate temperature control that gives a good crema and never has the boiled/burned taste that cheaper machines have. On the downside- not a machine for those who don't enjoy the coffee making process- It's quite fiddly especially when heating milk when the machine needs to be cooled by venting steam before making the coffee. Descaling is also fiddly and regular and like all 'cheap' espresso machines the pump will eventually fail (within two years at my level of use) I'm now on my second machine so the pros outweigh the cons for me until I can afford a real pro machine- or succumb to the bland conformity of capsule machines.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I happy with the machines’ performance, however it is rusty now and i only had it for a year and a half. Keep in mind i really take care of the machines I have, i keep them clean and shiny all the time. I very unhappy as I specifically ordered stainless steel to avoid the rusty look! I will be asking for a replacement

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I'm am purely an amateur coffee maker, so the questions above, blending output heat and the likes do not mean anything to me!  What I can tell you is that this is a good little machine. And it works.  I watched a couple of de'longhi you tube videos to learn how to set up and use the machine first.  From the first try I had acceptable coffee.  The more I use it the better I am getting and more adventurous in my coffee making.  I don't believe you'll find a more easy to use machine to start off with, especially for general home use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've now had this machine for 2 and a half years, it's used every day and I still absolutely love it!Yes it's not as easy as a bean to cup machine would be, and a little time consuming if making more than 1 cup, but I've gotten to quite enjoy the coffee making ritual.From a maintenance point of view it's been very easy to look after, rinse out the portafilter and steam nozzle after each cup, give it the occasional wipe over to keep it shiny and descale it when it asks for it.Smart looking, takes up little counter space and most importantly makes great coffee. Far better than any pod machine with the freedom to use any ground coffee you like, and no wasteful capsules! I wouldn't be without it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine is well made and looks good in the stainless steel version. It is fairly easy to set up and can be programmed to provide different quantities of coffee according to taste as well as water hardness levels. Overall it is good value for money although I cannot speak for it's reliability as I have only has the machine for a couple of weeks, but so far it has performed flawlessly.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this Delonghi coffee maker after the pump on our previous model - used frequently for 5 years - began to lose power. This one is more sophisticated with electronic flashing lights and the ability to preset volumes, heat levels and monitor cleaning! All too complicated really - but it does produce an excellent cappuccino from the e.s.e. pods that we buy. The drip tray - made with a very shiny finish - has scratched very easily! That is the only (small) failing!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a perfect example that you get what you pay for, in a good why. Before getting this I got a Swan machine for about half the price{ see review} . It made horrible coffee and was mostly plastic. It was returned. This one makes wonderful coffee and looks great.  Many features you can change.  For instance my first espresso only half filled my cup. But you can easily change this.  But you do have to carefully read the instructions.  The metal outside can easily show  stains. You can adjust the drip try to take different size cups. This is done by removing part of it. The screen shots seem to imply this is done by it sliding up and down. Not a problem thou.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It undoubtedly makes great coffee and the milk frother is fab but I found it a bit difficult at the start. It took me a while to realise what all the various flashing lights meant. It is also important to empty the coffee grinds and clean the milk frother every time.I would make on average 5 cups a day and was surprised that after 4 weeks of use the orange descaling light came on. This process took quite a long time.Honestly it’s a good looking machine and makes great coffee but takes time to get to understand it

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've had this for about a month now and it's been great. The key points that I love over previous expresso machines is that holder for the coffee ground is firmly held in place (it can be difficult to remove at first, but you quickly get use to it) so you can give it a solid knock on the bin when emptying it without any worries if it falling off. The build quality is great, does not feel cheap at all. The machine isn't quiet, but I've heard much louder machines before. My only gripe is that the steamer is either on/off with no control over the intensity, but I've quickly adjusted to the machine and produces the desired effect. Would strongly recommend this for the price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine was a replacement for a machine that stopped working after 16 months. During the Covid crisis the response from De Longhi was virtually non existent and the machine was out of its 12 month guarantee. We decided to purchase an identical machine as the coffee from the previous machine was fine. however it only dispenses a lesser amount of espresso coffee and sometimes the coffee is not hot enough. The cleaning is too complicated and the setting up a night mare. Would I buy a third machine definitly not. Possibly pay more for a better and less difficult to use machine. Its redeeming factor it looks nice in the kitchen

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Simple controls, easy to use and clean.Solid construction.This is my second one.The first one started leaking after 5 years - I used it every day and averaged around 12 cups per day (not just for me!).  I think that is a fairly reasonable life.I live in a hard water area, so I suspect a hose probably burst.  I wasn't able to open the machine in order to attempt a repair as it had been assembled with non-stainless steel screws which had rusted (which I think is a shoddy).

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It only lasted for 3 months and then just stopped working. Amazon refunded our money without any problems and we were able to send the machine back to them free of charge. Since then we purchased another one, exactly the same model and 6 months in it still works fine.  My friend had the same machine but older version for about 5 years, never had any issues with it. So I think the first one must have been faulty.Overall I think this is good machine, easy to use and clean and would recommend.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We ordered this machine in February before we knew anything about lockdown - its been our favourite gadget ever since! Makes a lovely cup of coffee, very quickly and easily and is easy to clean up too. Its a very stylish machine to look at and doesn't take up to much room on the work top either. We use it 3-4 times everyday - its very reliable.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: La macchina è esteticamente bella occupa meno spazio delle altre. Si possono regolare tutte le funzioni con facilità. Fà un ottimo cappuccino. Io mi sono avvalso per l'acquisto anche del giudizio di "Altroconsumo" dove risulta prima in tutti gli aspetti. E' un ottimo acquisto. Naturalmente il servizio amazon è eccezionale per il prezzo e la consegna.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: In hindsight I might have bought a bean-to-cup machine. Nevertheless, with time and effort you can get a great espresso out of this thing. One important thing to note would be that if you're choosing to grind your own coffee rather than buying pre-ground, it can be very difficult to get used to this machine, as tiny changes in dose, tamping pressure, bean or grind coarseness can very easily result in you choking this machine. This is always a nightmare when you remove the head and coffee grounds invariably explode over your surface, adding to an already lengthy and arduous coffee-making process.However, if you're a patient sort of individual who enjoys the process of doing things as much as the end result then this machine is great for you.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Hace buen café pero me ha empezado a fallar. La goma que va en el interior del cacillo si la pierdes ya lo puedes tirar. No existen recambios. Es rápida al calentar y va muy bien pero no la volvería a comprar.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Followed set up to the letter. Coffee basket was difficult to change, and then once in place was then hard to twist around to put on machine. First time we used it, very nice coffee produced. Next morning, tried to make coffee and water wouldn't run through so sent back and received very quick refund from Amazon (thanks Amazon!) Have now ordered a Morphy Richards - cheaper and highly recommended, so fingers' crossed!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this item 34 months ago and has now stopped working. Cleaned and descaled. No improvement. Pump appears to have packed in.Contacted Amazon support, but outside warranty and they consider 34 months greater than the average life of this product. Pretty poor for a £200 coffee machine.Contact De’Longhi who put me in touch with a 3rd party repair outfit who can’t do anything due to ‘COVID issues’. Will be in touch apparently, but been waiting 2 weeks now and nothing.Very poor all round and a complete lack of support from all concerned.Update p- Amazon have now agreed to a replacement which is great news!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: i replaced my sadly dying de longhi, which i was sentimentally attached to. The sadness went away quickly when I noticed how much better the coffee tastes from this model. Can recommend.... good value for the price.The parts are more sturdy and the machine heavier than my previous machine. From the size more compact, though

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this coffee maker because of the size and design, one neighbor have the same and the coffee es really good. Well, now that I have mine I can't be happier, works perfectly fine, love the fact you can use a big mugs or small espresso cups, even the almond milk get creamy and delicious.  The size is perfect for small kitchen since it doesn't take a lot of counter room and it's a really good looking machine. I just love it

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought 2 of these as used off here thinking they be good first one looked great leaked water from underneath sent back bought another was putting less than single shot in double shot button and way  less than double on single shot button and the steam was very bearing in mind I had one of theses machines for 5 years and never had an issue and are rated as one of the better expresso machines for that money long and short of it do not buy the second hand ones buy new they are known for pump issues plus the hassle with amazon to sort it is unreal if you buy from amazon warehouse shocking returns absolutely no consideration for the customer at all you have to go to post office send it back and about 10/14days to get refunded even with second purchase and same problem broken they did not realy want to deal with it im now without machine for over 2 weeks dealing with them for the sake of going click and collect in currys or argos

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine looks great, and can produce a really nice coffee... but I am loosing my patience with just how sensitive it is to becoming blocked. I use standard grind coffee (same as I've used on machines for years) and whereas cleaning through the baskets etc was required maybe weekly on all machines I've had before, with this machine it is daily. And in fact to avoid wasted coffee (which was happening every other use) that means taking it apart, using a pin to put through the small hole, and cleaning the removable sieve in the basket every time I make a coffee. I don't over fill it either or compress too hard. It just really is that temperamental. Sadly, as cool as it looks, I would rather not have bought this.... and may see if I can return - it can't be right. I like the process of making a coffee... but this is next level!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Absolutely love this espresso machine, I use it 3x a day and so far after 2 years it's still going strong and works just as it did when new, and I expect it to last me many more years to come. Definitely worth the money, and it's so so easy to use. I've previously used cheaper espresso machines from Aldi and the quality and ease of use are just not comparable. Whenever I do need to replace this I will certainly get another Delonghi, and I highly recommend this model!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This coffee maker is true to its word. Makes the best coffee I have ever had. I love my cappuccino strong, which most coffee outlets don’t do. Here I have the option of adding how much milk I need. Trust me, coffee is a million times better than Costa, I have never gone back to it. The milk frother is a bit temperamental, stops functioning occasionally and once I use the milk frother can’t immediately switch back to making coffee. Needs cleaning after each use to keep it going. The machine itself needs descaling very frequently, even though I use Brita filtered water.One may say it is a lot of hassle, but if you love your coffee, it makes it worthwhile.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Unsere große Jura Kaffeemaschine, die seit Jahren super Kaffee liefert, kann leider keinen echten Espresso herstellen, daher musste eine zweite Maschine her. Die ganze Familie ist nun total begeistert von dem Espresso, den die  De'Longhi Machine herstellt. Sie arbeitet sehr schnell und der Espresso hat eine perfekte Crema.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I thought I'd wait a couple of weeks to review and I have done but can honestly say this is my favourite purchase on Amazon to date. Its so easy to use and the coffee is so good. I wanted bean to cup for less waste but it also means you can chose from lots of different coffees. Its quite compact so doesn't take a huge amount of room. Its really quick to start up and holds a lot of water. We've used it daily since getting it and I wish I bought one sooner.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I used to work as a barista for small coffee shop run by an Italian guy, and this little machine is able to make whatever you ask of it-latte, cappuccino, espresso, espresso macchiatto etc. I use ground Lavazza. The quality of froth is perfect too. Strongly recommend.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: What a disappointment! Very slow to heat the milk, drips from the milk pipe when you’re making coffee and worst of all, it demands a descale every two weeks, making it the most expensive “affordable “ coffee machine I’ve ever come across.I do not recommend this machine. Spend a little more and you might not need to spend £5 every two weeks on their branded descaler.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Best cappuccino machine I have had, and I have gone through quite a few over the years.  You need to read the instructions as it is a bit more complicated than cheaper models because it has more features, eg you can programme how hot you want the coffee or how strong.  However, I am not great with technology but managed to do all this fairly easily.  The coffee is great and you can make it just how you like it.  The machine is beautifully made in brushed stainless steel, and looks great.  My husband is an engineer and really liked the quality of the design and finish.  Some of the details are amazing, for instance the bottom of the milk frother has a tiny lip on it so when the spout is folded up, any drips will come off the lip and go directly into a small hole in the drip tray!!  This was obviously designed by someone who enjoys using it.  Highly recommended.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I needed a new coffee maker since my trusted 10 year-old Gaggia Kubica began to fall apart. I chose this machine based on its huge popularity and decent feedback rating. Alas I have not been impressed so far. The main issue I have faced is its inconsistent performance. I used the same amount of the same ground beans every day yet some days the coffee flows through freely, some days it drips and some days nothing at all. On the days it drips it seems to burn the coffee. On the days nothing happens at all I've wasted coffee. The cream layer is sometimes good, sometimes almost non-existent. The same goes for the steam wand. I drink flat whites and so I like a nice silky textured milk. Maybe one in ten times I get the desired texture despite using the same quantity of the same milk every single time. Just so inconsistent it makes for quite a stressful and frustrating experience. The only good aspect is the machine is very easy to clean and feels more hygienic than my Gaggia. I've decided to return this machine as it's either faulty or just not very good.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very happy with the coffee maker it's so easy to use the instructions are a bit of head work and I'm still trying to figure things out  myself but so far everything seem to be working perfectly although it didn't come with the jug for the frothing part had to buy that separately.Easy to clean you just run the hot water system though without any coffee init .you do however have to remove the bottom tray to fit a cup underneath

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Only owned a couple of weeks but so far really impressed with my first entry into the coffee making market. Makes drinking coffee a pleasure again and no need to buy takeaway coffees ever again. Brought from amazon warehouse at half the price it was before Dec 18, the only issue was it came with a 2 pin plug but you can buy adapters from Morrisons for £2.50 or Wilkos for £3.50. Beautiful and small enough to sit on the work surface in my small kitchen.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I had a De'Longhi years ago that I liked. After travelling a while and moving around, I decided to buy another for my new flat.So I looked at reviews and settled on the De'Longhi Dedica Style EC685M Traditional Pump Espresso Machine - SilverI'm working from home more and more and wanted my daily fix from the coffee shop I frequent while at the office. I use a dark roast from Gordon Street Coffee shop in Glasgow (their Glasgow Roast). Tastes practically the same when I buy their beans and use this machine.Pro's- After around 4 attempts I got the coffee amount, tamper method etc down so it was easy to get it right.- Warms up v quickly.- I like Americano and I use the double shot attachment and run the water through it twice. Job Done.Cons- I'm quite happy to clean up afterwards (takes literally 30 seconds) some may prefer to use a pod machine if you don't like rinsing the porta filter.- I put the porta filter in the dishwasher and it cleaned the chrome right off it. I gave it a wash afterwards to get some grime off it and carried on with my life with my chrome free porta filter lolz :)Recommended especially if you like proper or a particular type of coffee and don't mind making it properly.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: So disappointing to find this lovely looking coffee machine is not very practical....The steam wand won’t work, it keeps flowing hot water but not steam; you have to be so careful adding your ground coffee, it goes everywhere!; the actual coffee dispenser is quite hard; coffee quality isn’t that good either... I am sorry, going for a better fully automatic one.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I drink coffee all the time and previously had a pod machine (bought by my mum) which I hardly ever used as didn’t like the creamer taste. Have been looking at all the coffee machine reviews for ages and had this in my basket for months.my Mum gave me a voucher to purchase it for Xmas and it is the best present ever. I love it. It looks stylish fits snugly on my work surface and it makes great coffee with the ground coffee I usually use in the cafetière. My only negative would be it good be hotter but great for drinking straight away

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Really impressed after a couple of weeks.  I like that you can set the amount of water you want in your coffee. The auto cutoff also reduces the chance of drips.  Again the ability to set the temperature is really good, real hot coffee with a remarkably short 'get ready' time.  The deep coffee grain holder also allows you to make a strong cup of coffee.  They are never that easy to clean.  Only criticism would be that it is surprisingly light weight, will be interesting to see how it lasts.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: So first: I have never had such a machine before so it might be my fault but it took me a few times to finally learn how to use which tool to make a certain coffee. But: it works and it's such a lovely design. I really like the metal and it is easy to clean i think, many parts can be taken off to wash it properly and I always make sure the but where the coffee gets stuck is clean as well. Perfect value for money, would always buy it again and looks really classy in the kitchen!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've had this machine for almost 3 years now, and although I've been using it a lot (average of 3-5 times a day!), I never had a problem.The quality of the coffee is excellent every time, and with a bit of practice you can make batista like cappuccinos.Buy it, you won't regret it!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Had this for a while now and wanted to see how it faired after a decent time. I am very pleased with it. Great looking appliance. A little noisy but it is ok, good selection of functions and cappuccino is good and barrister in the making! Lol. Just had to de-scale the unit and the automated function is very complicated to follow and goes on for ages, gave up after an hour of trying and still throws up an error message/light... Just ignoring as cant be arsed. Working fine. Overall I would recommend

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a great machine, fully metallic with intuitive buttons and ease of use. This machine in my opinion is a super simple coffee maker which is excellent at producing espresso and has options if you fancy something a little more luxurious like Cappuccino or Latte.While expensive, I think this machine is really great for the price and could have asked for a much higher price point. Thankfully, they haven't and this is a fantastic, accessible, machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Easy to use although the instructions are not the best.Good pressure and crema and temperature better than some.Easy to clean and doesn't take up much room.All in all a good value domestic coffee maker particularly if you invest in decent coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I thought it was a good idea to move away from my trusty 'pod' machine as the manufacture does not make re-usable pods.I do like the sharp, sleek look of this De'Longhi machine, however, it is very slow and the poor rate is uneven in a '2-cup' espresso. The hot water temp is not great and despite following the instructions word-for-word to increase the temp it has not helped at all.I am now having to face buying ANOTHER machine just to get a reliably decent cup of coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: A little bit complicated for a coffee machine what with temperature settings etc. (not sure why anyone wouldn’t want coffee at hottest setting) but bottom line is it makes brilliant espresso. Looks good too and doesn’t take up much space. Once you get to grips with the instructions and settings this is a brilliant machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We've had this machine almost a year now. It took a little bit of fiddling at first to learn the sequence of actions for a good cappuccino, but now it's become a ritual, and the results are always perfect. We've had to descale it once only so far, which again is a simple process. Highly recommended.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I always wanted the sage grinder and espresso machine but couldn't justify the price. I found this and liked it immediately. Size is really nice, the flavour is great. I have found it quite easy to get a consistently good espresso. The milk wand is very handy, I haven't managed to get the correct consistency of milk for decent latte art, but I think this is more my abilities than the machine.  I have also got the de'longhi grinder too which pairs with this perfectly.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love the machine! Definitely recomend it. Ordered 4 times for family and friends, unfortunately had to return it twise as received with broken water tank and leaking. Apart from that, the mashine worth its money and we enjoy our daily coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very slim footprint and a doddle to use. Heats up extrey quickly and in no time produces a highly satisfying cup of fresh coffee. My second DeLonghi machine. Only bought this model because I wanted a smaller one. Very happy with my previous one too.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is my first review because I don't write them but felt like I needed to do it for this one. Bought this last Christmas for a friend and she never got a coffee out of it, wrote to Delonghi in August (the beginning of the year she was out of the country and then we moved houses, she is my roomate) and they were less than helpful, I have 4 or 5 different kinds of coffee that I bought, finally (after saying the coffee was being tampered wrong) they gave me a phone for repair as I live in Ireland and said the repair guys would collect it, on the phone they said they couldn't collect at all. At this point I already got a new coffee machine and we'll just give the money from this one to my friend, but major loss of money.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I have had other coffee machines before but both were for pods only.  The coffee was OK but nowhere near the standard of this great machine.  OK its circa £100 more expensive than say a standard Nespresso machine but well worth every penny.  I will only ever buy a Delonghi from now on.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've only used this coffee machine a hand full of times why does the coffee come out so slow I press the 2 cup button and only get a little bit of coffee I like flat whites but doesn't matter what I do the milk froths up so much complete waste of money am so angry I don't have a great deal of money and had to save up for this machine I normally buy the cheaper ones I just don't get this machine at all a pure gimmick trying to be to clever people don't want mess around making a coffee just put the water in your coffee heat your milk up and away you go £175 down the drain if I ever get a coffee machine again it'll definitely be a cheaper option

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've been looking for a coffee machine for quite a while now and after seeing this in the Black Friday sale, I couldn't pass on it. it fits perfectly with my other kitchen appliances, being all silver. What sold it to me was the milk frother, it works perfect every time. it beats putting a cup of milk in the microwave to make milky coffee. perfect cuppa every time.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We love this coffee machine . We have had two nespresso machines which developed leaks after a short time.This makes a great cup of cofffee, the frother is perfect for cappuccinos and the best hot chocolate ever (if you make it with green and blacks )Easy to use and keep clean , nice compact size for the work surface too .

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I did lots of research when we decided not to buy another Nespresso machine (to avoid using plastic pods), but despite its good looks and price, the set up was more complicated than it should have been because the instructions were not clear enough, and the coffee (we ended up using several brands over 2 days) tasted plastic-y time and time again. We followed the guidance to to the letter but had to run water through the system more than was recommended. After 2 days we cameto the conclusion that nothing we tried would make any brand of ground coffee taste anything less carcinogenically plastic. Really disappointing!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Purchased to replace a similar machine  ( so I thought) that had broken but really there is no comparison. This machine is very easy to use and makes a really good coffee. It also looks good on the kitchen worktop!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Overall a nice product and easy to set up. We had a problem with the double filter, after a few weeks use, coffee was no longer coming out when using the double filter. We tried different grinds and beans but still no luck. I tried the filter with no coffee in and noticed water was really struggling to come through. Upon closer investigation I noticed there was a small piece of plastic (see picture) lodged in the exit of the filter, which must have got caught in the filter when it was being manufactured. After pulling at it with tweezers we eventually got it out and now the filter works fine. A bit disappointed by this oversight in an otherwise good product!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine does everything that you want from a coffee machine, plus it is compact in a small kitchen.Espresso is easy, needs a bit of experiment for cappuccino 🙄The instructions could be a bit clearer but I suggest trying thing out and then go back and re-read and things will become clearer.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I looked at a lot of machines. This one seemed to have a good reviews. I didn't want to have to use pods.I am so please with my purchase.  Its so easy to use and clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Machine has just packed in and not producing coffee any longer. I seriously would not recommend it to anybody. I will try to get a replacement and update with the results. Update Amazon kindly sent me out a new one. This is absolutely fantastic service. Thank you Amazon!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I love almost everything about this machine and it is amazing value for money. The one thing that takes a star off is that the holder bit that holds the coffee falls out when you hit it against w surface to get the coffee grinds out, which means you have to fish it out of the bin and empty it with a spoon which is messy. Love everything else about it though and would recommend it!!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've been using a nespresso for the better part of a decade, however on one rare occasion where we ran out I started using a bialetti stovetop espresso maker and fell in love with the strength of the coffee compared to the watered down capsules of the nespresso. I picked the De'Longhi Dedica after a comparisson video on YouTube showing a coffee expert couldn't tell the difference between this and a $3000 espresso machine.My wife and I have not been disappointed. Get this and some decent coffee and you'll be seriously improving the quality of your coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I am fussy about my coffee and have had espresso machines for over 30 years. I drink black coffee and the creme is great. The steamer produces cappuccino that my friends love.  The De'Longhi Dedica  EC685M is attractive, small. easy to use and makes great coffee!UPDATE. Its now April and this machine is still reliably producing great coffee. Love the fact that it has 2 drip trays to fit both espresso cups and larger mugs. Very easy to use

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this as a gift for my partner and I've heard nothing but good things said about it! This machine is easy to use, easy to clean and makes lovely coffee quickly.I chose this one as we have a small kitchen so it can't be taking up too much room, and it doesn't, it is a perfect size!I have bought this brand of coffee machine before and will continue to as it's a fantastic make. We have never had any complaints.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bottom line is that it makes a great cup of coffee...However, it took almost a month to receive this item as the first two machines went missing. When the 3rd one did arrive the outer box was bashed and bumped all over.However, as I say.. it does make a great cup of coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It worked 2 weeks than stop. Sent to repair and after 3 months they lost in their partner repairs wholesale. Paid a lot of money for nothing, stay far from De Longhi products if you want live withot problems

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: As a real coffee lover I am very happy with this machine, simple to use, easy to clean, makes good coffee depending on the beans you use of course and combined with a good quality burr grinder, very good crema.Happy :-)

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Truly nothing beats freshly ground beans put through an espresso machine! This machine is simple to use, as long as you take care of it, you should have no issues.I use water filtered in a BRITA jug, so no issues with mineral scale build-up and great tasting coffee!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   DeLonghi nos presenta uno de sus mejores productos con esta cafetera.En cuanto al diseño se trata de una cafetera metálica casi en su totalidad, con una base de plástico duro.Trae consigo tres filtros, un portafiltros y un descalcificante, buen detalle.La cafetera tiene una presión muy correcta de salida de café.Tanto la temperatura como el tiempo de extracción son programables.En cuanto a la espumadera de leche, tiene dos posiciones, Hot milk y capuchino, esta última te permite cremar la leche. Es casi imposible cremar mal la leche con esta cafetera. Con otros modelos de esta marca, había que tener un mayor manejo para evitar que la leche tomara burbujas de aire, sin embargo, con esta siempre se crema a la perfección.Adjunto un vídeo y una imagen.Por otro lado, la altura de las tazas es muy variables en cuanto a compatibilidad con la cafetera, pues su base de aluminio puede ser ajustada a distintas alturas.Por buscarle un punto a mejorar, cuando la cafetera toma presión, por un tiempo después ya no te permite extraer café. Esto se soluciona dejando salir toda la presión habiendo previamente despulsaso el botón de la presión.Recomiendo la cafetera. Indicad que "os gusta" si os ha servido la opinión

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Took me a couple of goes to get used to using the milk warmer/frother but once I understood how to fit it on properly I love the lattes and cappuccinos that i can make.  I switched from using a Tassimo because I was concerned about the amount of plastic I was throwing away.  But the quality of the machine and the coffee far exceeds my expectations.  the kit comes with a descaler which I haven't used yet but it seems easier to use than the Tassimo that I used to have.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought the delonghi,worked first time but was temperamental the following morning.Replacement arrived ,the arm did fit .Amazon's customer service useless.I've sat at home all day waiting for collection(returning item for full refund) its 19h. No one has arrived.No point calling Amazon,as they will say we don't know when courier will arrive.Iam now stuck with a faulty machine and £182 out of pocket.Will never use this service ever again

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I have been using this machine for nearly a week now, having had the more basic De Longhi espresso machines in the past which were simple, robust and produced lovely coffee.  I am not so impressed with this machine, the coffee is alright but not as nice as with the simpler machines (not so much crema)  and setting it up is fiddly.  The hot water nozzle works fine, but when slid down to heat milk for cappuccino, it's rubbish - hardly any steam and the milk remains cold and at the same volume (because nothing comes out).  I wish I had saved my money and bought another more basic machine.The small size is nice as it means it has less of a footprint in the kitchen, but because it is very light, it is easy to push a selection button whilst fitting the coffee holder or tip it over, though putting in less coffee grounds helps.  Not a help when you want a stronger coffee though.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Flavour is more to do with the coffee you buy not the machine. Leaked and packed up after no time. Changed to a different machine, maker and model!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Quality product that enables you to make an excellent coffee. Space saving design really helps in a small kitchen. Overall a really good purchase. Only issue would be ease of use, believe me it takes a bit of time to get used too regarding settings (temp + volume) as well as tricks to cool down heating block if making more than one coffee. Highly recommend you watch YouTube setup instruction videos before attempting to create a wonderful flat white.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a much neater footprint than our previous De'Longhi coffee machine taking up much less space on my kitchen worktop and for that reason I like it very much.  As for the coffee drinker in the household he seems happy with it too.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This was delivered without any form of packaging- just in the product box- straight into the hands of my husband who the gift was for at Xmas. Thanks so much for ruining the surprise.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this coffee machine to replace the nespresso lattisima machine I had as the price of the pods was extortionate.Very happy with this machine we currently buy ground coffee but looking to buy my own grinder, coffee tastes great and easy to use and clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love it, had the item for over a month and it gets used daily.  Makes great coffee and looks great too.Its pretty compact space wise which is a bonus but it still easily fits two espresso mugs, although you wouldn't be able to fit two coffee mugs under it.I use it with ground coffee but supposedly it does take pods too if you don't like the associated mess that it brings.  The milk steamer works well and actually really well placed as it stops you getting milk all over the machine.Overall thoroughly recommended for the price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Really good little machine, you'll need to program amount of espresso to desired level and it will be great :) also coffee ground size matters as well

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I chose this model due to its size but find it a bit fiddly to use and it doesn’t work if you compact the loose coffee at all.It has flashing lights and stuff and you need to get the knack of how to get it to work ie is it on standby, or has it overheated (it does this a lot).  Once you get used to it it’s ok but I have it in a holiday let and suspect guests will struggle with it.For the money it would be great if it worked easily as well as looking good

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: You'll like this. I just couldn't justify spending more than £300 on a bean to cup machine and this fits the bill perfectly. Make sure you read the manual a few times, this coffee maker is pretty customisable.Makes top quality coffee. I've had this over a year now and have only had to replace the seal to the coffee holder, just keep descaling when necessary.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I love this machine. It is wonderful. Makes beautiful coffees and capuccinos..It makes espresso with the perfect 'crema' on top, and heavenly hot frothy cappuccinos. It is easy to maintain and so easy to use. I got a bit confused at the beginning with trying to program it according to instructions, but got past that and have no complaints.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Well it has produced some lovely cappuccino's. I'm very pleased with it. I'm sure with time I will get quicker at making them. My only criticism is the button placement, they can be pressed by mistake.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love this compact coffee machine, fits nicely on the small kitchen counter I have but still has enough power to make a fantastic cup of coffee. Easy to use and clean. The milk wand might take a bit longer to make the milk the right temperature, but it still has enough pressure to make a great coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Looks smart, makes a really a great creamy coffee and is very easy to use. Just be very careful when removing and re-connecting the water tank to avoid cracking the flimsy plastic brackets at the top. Make sure you align them up flush with the body of the machine with no force. You are probably better filling the tank from above with a jug if you can. Otherwise I’d have given 5 stars

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine makes good coffee and the milk frother works well. It replaces an older machine that was much loved, and this one seems to be a good replacement.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I was looking for a really small espresso machine to replace my Krups nespresso machine as I did not want to produce so much plastic  aluminium waste every day -  this is perfect - coffee is great, works very well with ESE pads, looks fine and is small as well as reasonably priced..CORRECTION: after 8 month this is not really working anymore for me: if you do more than one cup of coffee, the filter arm starts moving to the left and kicks out the filter and coffee while brewing - huge mess!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Generally happy with this coffee machine. Bought one for my friends and they loved it so bought myself one too. The first one was faulty but I’m a Prime customer and Amazon replaced it the next day and the new one was perfect 👌

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great value - I have used it for a few months now.  Very quick to warm up.  Does a variety of measures.  Coffee is a good temperature if you warm the cup first with the steam nozzle.  Even turns its self off when not in use -highly recommend this product

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellent coffee - haven't drunk coffee made by anything else since getting the machine.Instructions not great for the milk foamer - it has 3 positions: 9 o'clock OFF; 6 o'clock PURGE; 4 o'clock FOAM. once did works that our great.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Well, my first coffee machine and I’m so disappointed, the machine didn’t work at all , the pump looks like doesn’t have power at all and I send it back, don’t by this joke if you care about your time and your money.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great machine, produces well brewed coffee at a good temperature by default. Doesn't push the coffee through the filter too quickly or scorch the coffee. A few customisation options available to change size of coffee shots or temperature, but defaults are pretty good.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this as a gift for my coffee loving boyfriend. He loves it! Makes very nice coffee and froths milk beautifully. It's nice and compact and looks great on the kitchen. Highly recommended!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is the second one of these machines that I have bought. They both ended up with the same issue where eventually the coffee stops coming out and the whole machine blocks up (and yes I used their descaled). Just not good enough. Waste of money.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this to replace an old knackered Dualit machine. This is miles better. More compact, a lot less noisy, easier to use and the milk throther works a treat and is very easy to use and clean. It’s made making coffee a pleasure!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: i like to drink coffee . but the item not good to rechange the ground coffee. it is very hard to change it .but the quality is looked good.the coffee tast is ok.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Wont make coffe with the one cup filterThe milk frother doesnt froth milk or heat it  its like a childs toy ...its pretending to be a coffee maker  very expensive for what it does  might just return it

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Right out of the box it makes great coffee.  I chose to remove the pressurised basket and got a normal one from Amazon for only £8. Makes very good espresso.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: If you are searching for a nice solid sleek looking compact Coffee Machine that makes a proper cup of Barista style coffee - this is it! Yeah you might have to put a little more effort in than the pod machines and clean up a bit afterwards - but it becomes a very rewarding ritual! I’m impressed & addicted..... ☕️

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Perfect. Especially for small kitchen. Got myself one of those electric milk frothers to save up time when I make my cappuccinos and my coffee is just perfect now.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Temperamental, doesn't work properly, forget the milk frother too ! I wish I returned it, when I had a chance. I bought it 2nd July and I wanted to give it a proper test. Now, I am going to have the hassle of contacting the manufacturer !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: As soon as I ordered this, I also got an unpressurised basket after checking the reviews and some online forums. Having tried both, i do confirm coffee tastes slightly better with unpressurised basket and definitely gives you room to experiment more with your shots. This a great machine for anyone looking to start with espresso making... Loving the fact it doesn't take any space on the kitchen counter.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Only had this a matter of weeks had to go online to fully understand how to work it! Had a few really nice cups of coffee then it stopped producing the filtered coffee to add to the milk.  It’s expensive so I would have expected better instructions and ease of use and a bit longer usage.  If it’s just a quick cup of coffee you want go to one of the pod machines as they would be so much easier to use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very nice design and size. It does the job quite right but can get messy if you don’t use it right. :-) I usually have to use two shots for a long americano which means you need a bit more work but then it’s a good result.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a fantastic entry level espresso machine, with one caveat. The pannarelo steam wand. If you want to make micro-foam you’ll need to mod the machine with something like Racillio Silva wand which will void your warranty. But if you like a cappuccino this is perfect for you! I’ve done the mod and can say that this machine is capable of some incredible coffee. Well worth the money once you make this small change.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: My first coffee machine. Took a few days to get used to filling, hot water, hot milk, cappuccino maker and how to clean but WOW, once I knew how to use it and clean it without looking at the instructions, there has been no going back. In lockdown I was missing my daily coffees in local shops. This machine is keeping me sane, having virtual coffee meetings with friends. Fabulous. Don't hesitate to buy.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Easy to get going.  Doesn’t produce a big cup of coffee, it’s espresso after all.  The 2 shot option is good but I do it twice to get a decent cup of great, strong coffee.  I decided to avoid the mess and bought the little bags, love em!!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great quality product.The machine itself if in stainless steel which enhances the quality of the product and the coffee that it makes is really good.We've also used the milk foamer and it works really well too.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Really happy initially, but pump lost pressure & broke by the 5th use. Tried all the trouble shooting tips to no avail & now awaiting replacement.As usual, amazon customer service is first class. However am now tentative as to the quality & durability of this espresso machine. But with caution.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great replacement for my old machine that gave up after many years.  Nice compact size with a high quality finish. Some nice touches like control of the coffee temperature and a reminder to descale after a certain amount of time.  The milk steamer is also much easier to clean than my last machine. The coffee tastes great and can do single or double shots. Overall, very pleased.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Took a while to get used to how to use this, but it's great, makes lovely coffee, cheaper than having to buy those pods all the time, can use ground coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Yes its a good machine which when you get into a routine with it. However be warned the coffeee holder is NOT dishwasher friendly.The Chrome “Spray Paint” comes off. Still works but no shinny looking coffee holder. I am sure I read that its parts are dishwasher friendly. “Guess Not”, however its a ok machine so far.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Did the youtube course on using it. First cup great. The second cup you have to wait half an hour to get a second cup using the 2shot head. Found a way round the problem. For the second cup us the single shot button twice. good job there are only two of us. Milk facility great.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bei der Maschine sollte Kenntnis bzgl. Malgrad, Kaffeegewicht, Brühdauer in Relation zu Mahlgrad/Gewicht etc. vorhanden sein.Wenn "Einstieg" anhand des Gerätepreises, fehlender P.I.D., kein Brühdruckmanometer, der verwendeten Einkreisertechnik etc. etc. definiert wird: okay.Anyway, ich kann bei dem Preis eben keinen Kupferkessel mit 300ml usw. erwarten.Was soll die Diskussion?Das steht doch in keiner Relation, so ein Gerät mit einer großen Maschine aus der hochfrequentierten Gastro zu vergleichen.
