Äpfel/Birnen usw.Der gleiche "Einsteiger"-Unsinn wird auch auf kaffee-netz.de nicht nur zu dieser Maschine anhand falscher Parameter durchgezogen.Wenn ich eine schwankend 150 - 200 EUR DeLonghi 685 kaufe, kann ich nicht erwarten, dass damit meine 8 Vorzimmerdamen aus der Kanzlei den ganzen Tag Spass haben.Einwandfreies Zubehör ist nötig und dann kann damit auch guter Espresso gezogen werden. (Alleine die Notwendigkeit bestimmter Prärequisiten  negieren das "Einsteiger"-Meme):- "richtige" Kaffebohnen (Mischung 70A/30R) - ich erspare mir hier den Hinweis nicht, dass 1000gr. für unter 20 Euro eben keine guten Bohnen manifestieren können- Kaffeemühle stufenlos, etwa eine Eureka oder für die Hand eine Comandante- Feinwaage von Timemore (B2),- bottomless Portafilter, nicht das Ding mit zweiwandigem Inklusivzubehörsieb von DeLonghi- Kaffe-Nivellierer- Tamper (ein richtiger Tamper)- gutes WasserNochmal zur Kanzlei und dem Aufknopfgehtderspasslos: Nee, so umständlich ist die Zubereitung einesg u t  genießbaren Espresso mit der Maschine nicht, aber man muss die Handgriffe checken und wissen, welche Instrumente wie zum Einsatz kommen müssen.-> Auf YT mal nach "Arty Home" suchen.Die "Kaffemacher" kommen auf gleicher Plattform ebenfalls zu keinem schlechten Gesamttestergebnis.Alles immer in Relation sehen und langsam machen!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Good quality machine that does what it says - makes nice expresso coffee and heats or foams milk well (depends on setting).  Heats up pretty quickly.  Needs cleaning each time, but a quick wipe is sufficient.  Water tank needs refilling fairly frequently.  Very satisfied.Tip - cleaning out the ground coffee from the carrier while damp is much easier..

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This machine is good and makes coffee quicker than our previous one also delonghi, however it has let us down twice and we have sent it back since the on off switch failed to work and this is the second one we have returned with exactly the same fault.Poor quality control !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Loving my new coffee machine, which will take both paper pods and loose coffee - I use both. It is ideal for occasional use in our 2-person household, and doesn't take over our small kitchen. Produces barrista-quality coffee with relatively little effort and doesn't cost the earth to get it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Just love our coffee maker, it is just fabulous and the finished product is perfect and I feel like I am in Costa Coffee. everyday! easy to clean. You must keep it clean and regularly wash all the little bits and peices but its well worth the little bit of work for the end result

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Have had to phone 4 times and still got nowhere as our machine is faulty since we first used it.  Not impressed with after sales though they were very courteous.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Really disappointed with the company DeLonghi. It’s not working properly. Having issues making a simple cup of coffee. They have sent us a broken product.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This was perfect for me and the better half. It is a doddle to use. Saves money on coffee, great for the environment and endless opportunities to experiment. Very happy so far 8.5/10.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Lovely compact machine, easy to use, great coffee.  The steam output is great and makes perfect milk - my daughter now slightly addicted to 'frothy milk! My first machine of this type so nothing to compare to, but does exactly what I bought it for so very happy

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I really enjoy this product it makes great coffee, once I had read how to use it and watched a couple of youtube videos it was very simple and tastes great, obviously make sure the coffee you use is good- a machine can't change the taste of the coffeeLooks great and takes up minimal counter space which was important to me

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Se si utilizza un caffè molto fine si intasa il portafiltro, e non si pulisce più.Questa lamentela l'avevo già sentita in altri commenti, non ci avevo fatto molto caso finché non mi sono trovato di fronte allo stesso problema. Oltretutto non ha un sistema di depressurizzazione, con il portafiltro intasato il caffè non esce e la macchina rimane in pressione, quando si toglie il portafiltro schizza tutto via e si rischia di scottarsi.Restituito.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great size for a kitchen with it being slim - blending power could be better, the milk frother could be easier to clean but overall makes a good coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very happy with the coffee machine. It takes up very little room and it makes very good espresso. The milk frothing gadget is a little fiddly but we hardly use it. I was looking for a machine that didn't take up much space and made good coffee and this fitted the brief perfectly!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellent espresso every time. Solid machine. Excellent steam production. Nice design I love the way it looks.If you are looking to buy an espresso machine for under £150 look no further ! You won’t get a better deal than this

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love love love. Need I say more. :) Do program it to your preference (water heat, length of pour etc) - it's not hard if you follow the instructions, and it's very satisfying. And the machine comes with a packet of descaler - I felt that was considerate. :) Thanks Delonghi. :)

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It does the job but my goodness me it’s made of the lighter plastic existent

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Makes great coffee - use esse pods so easy to empty. Has a couple of adjustments including temperature of water. Very happy

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Ordered this as a gift for a friend...brand new ..but the milk frother didn't work so had to return it straight away.Very worried now about the build quality!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Returned sent same replacement also faulty returned. Still awaiting refund. Ordered different brand.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This has made my morning coffee really delightful. It makes perfect coffee really easy. No mess, easy to clean and economical as filter coffee requires more coffee per cup for a similar density of flavour. No pods, so more eco friendly, just my favourite coffe made better.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Makes great coffee & is easy to use. This was bought as a present as are that pleased with ours which we have used every day for a few months now.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I have put off buying a proper coffee machine for ages.....but after adding up how much I spent on coffee shop bought coffee every month..and the fact that I am pretty fussy about my soya decaff cappuccino ....I decided to take the plunge and treat myself to this one after reading many online reviews. I can honestly say that I am not disappointed! A bit fiddly at first but once you get used to it....makes a great coffee and the milk frother is fabulous for my cappuccino's made with soya milk. Wish I had bought this machine sooner. Added bonus of saving loads of money making coffee at home!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Amazing coffee. Better than the high street believe it or not. Only slight issue is after 2 weeks use it has started behaving badly.... takes long to start up or never recovers after steaming even if yoj let it stand for 10 minutes, and then it powers off.Great coffee worth it / you'll save in the long run.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The first one broke down after 3 years constant use so happy to buy another at prime day sale

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellant coffee machine..... 4th one in 5 years..... only cos I've been buying cheap machines from cheap German supermarkets.... can't fault it only day one but I'm used to making capachinos can't spell the word) Lattes easy but this machine is great. Silent and coffee and milk can be done one after the other whereas cheaper models you do coffee then have to wait 10/15 mins for machine to catch up and reheat again

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this as I had previously experienced coffee from a friend who was a trained Barista. He owned this machine, so I took his lead. A good move.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great so far, upgraded from an older cheaper Delonghi model (which lasted me 5+ years). The only issue was the first item came broken (returned and got a new one) and both didn’t come with the pod filter, and there seems to be no way to contact the seller other than to return the entire item. There was another irregularity that the first machine was an eu plug, the second was uk (the ideal).

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Neat design, quick boiling and a ready supply of steam for a rich frothy cappuccino.The results are great. I get rich crema with each espresso shot, and feel that the machine is getting the most out of the coffee.This is a great machine , well

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The machine looks and operates well enough, but how can they justify charging nearly £200 when every coffee taste like plastic?The smell and taste seems to come from the coffee holder insert, I’ve run the machine through this maybe 100 times now, even removed the plastic insert and washed separately.Any advice anyone?

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is a excellent coffee maker... just nice for my afternoon coffee fixInstructions could be clearer though

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellent as model before was, can’t live without this machine, takes little space too. Frothier really good as well

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this for my daughter and she is very pleased with its appearance and that it makes excellent coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I've had this espresso machine for about 6 months and Im still very happy with it. It especially surpassed my expectations on the frother/steamer front. I can make creamy latte and frothy cappuccinos without problem. My only comment is that because of where the buttons are, it's easy to accidentally press them when you fit in the coffee tray. So far, so good and I love the size.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Moving into my new house soon and I can't wait to get this out of storage as I had no room at my mums for extra stuff :) !! I have had this for 2 years and you can't beat a fresh brew coffee! the only small issue I had was the steamer switch needs pushing abit further than usual otherwise it won't fully steam. but that point is so small. yeah great buy !

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Had this for 7 months now and use every weekend. We've probably saved more than it actually cost due to us not going to coffee shops and makes a better cup than most we've been to.It's easy to clean and frother makes a good cappuccino (when done right!).

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Fantastic machine, quick to set up and easy to use. Makes perfect coffee. Milk frother can get hard to re-attach and the inside rubber tube can be easily lost!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is the second machine I have purchased.my other lasted 2 years under different circumstances I would have had the previous mended but under lockdown the parts were difficult to obtain as they come from Italy although the product says it is made in China ?This machine makes a great cup of coffee although it can be more messy than bean to cup machines .

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great coffee machine. Easy to use. Don't really use the milk frother! Would definitely recommend.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It is nice and working perfect machine. However i not really like the design of it.  It is quite inconvenient when i make the hot milk for cappuccino. It is alittle bit smaller than what i thought.  But overall it is working very fast and making good coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Purchased this appliance but has been returned and replaced twice now because faults developed in the form of leaks.Lets hope third time lucky,but i must say it was replaced with no hassle.it does do the job.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: A friend has one & its great. So i got one but have now returned it - the milk frother/stamer did not work & then the coffee outlet kept clogging. Just not worth the hassle

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Really Good, had Dozens of various makes,models when it comes to coffee machines. The best so Far Quick,easy to use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We were excited to initially receive, whilst using it. Seemed simplistic but immediately reached an obstacle. It’s started over heating and water was leaking from where the power supply area. This caused the fuse breaker to kick in and cut out the electricity. This was worrying and felt unsafe. We have returned this product and purchased another separate model which is perfectly fine.Difficult to clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: If you want a one button machine, look elsewhere.If however you are into personalizing your coffee, look no further. A bit of time on set-up, a few coffees learning curve, and then you will soon reach shop quality (and beyond?).

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this to replace my previous delonghi machine. This is way better. I especially like the water level alert - very useful whet you forget! Brews great coffee, but obviously depends on the coffee you use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love this coffee machine - makes lovely espressos, then I add just hot water and frothy milk to make a great cappuccino. Would recommend!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: followed first time instructions to the letter, had to send it back, no water came out to a cup, instead it sat in a puddle and that's all it did, after 3 fresh attempts I had no choice but to send it back, total waste of time.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Brought this for my mother as she admired mine I have had mine for 6 years and is still going strong and makes fabulous coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Works well enough, but instructions not clear and function of buttons not intuitive. Search for the hidden on off switch too.But you like pressing buttons don't you?

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Was looking at the Sage bambino but decided against the popularity of it and went for this. Very happy with my decision.Definitely need to make 5-6 coffees before it makes a v.smooth tasting cup.If your making a lungo Americano don't forget to add hot water into the cup before you a brew.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Returned. Spent a whole afternoon trying to make a decent coffee and no luck. Tried all you can try and still no luck. Very sad because is a cute wee machine, but not good for people that likes a proper coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Like most espresso machines it takes a bit of experimenting with dosages, tamping and pre-infusion but it is perfectly capable of producing great shots. The steam wand has plenty of power for producing microfoam for lattes/ flat whites.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: So far so good. Had a cheaper coffee machine before this and am very impressed with the quality of coffee you can make with it. The milk frother is good, nice crema on the espresso. The only downside is that its a single boiler and takes time to make multiple coffees when you have people over. Not for entertaining or definitely couldn't be used commercially but excellent for normal domestic use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Aftet a trial & error session, makes perfect coffee for is, NOT noisy but tempremental!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it although it took her a while to set it up. She says it is easy to use, but I don’t yet know how easy it is to clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is just an awesome product really easy to use, and it does the job. Coffee coming out with the cream on top which is my favourite part.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great coffee machine - makes lovely coffee.  not really much more to say - this is a very good machine.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very happy with the machine it works well makes very good coffee if you use the right coffee beans I recommend going to coffee direct you’ve got a huge selection of different coffees

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is an excellent coffee mashine for coffee lovers. The plastic tamper is not really usable, but using with a good tamper it is great.Steamer also works properly, making very good milk froth. Very easy to clean the frother, just couple of seconds.Summarized: it is a great machine, if you love coffee, this machine willsatisfy your needs. (You still need a good quality groud coffee as well of course)Love it!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellent product as an entry level espresso machine.Easy to use, clean, re-fill etcMakes a decent espresso with little hassle.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great little coffee maker. Love how compact it is. Only given 3 star rating on durability because the machine is easily marked if it gets slightly knocked. The stainless steel exterior appears to be very thin.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The best coffee is however you like it made. This machine enables you to do just that, after a little practice. Love making americano with it, very happy overall. Takes a little more effort than the ubiquitous pod machines but we'll worth it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Avoid. Constantly blocked and wastes coffee, then explodes everywhere because of the pressure in the machine making a huge mess. I’ve been really pleased with delonghi machines in the past and this was to replace one that I had had for 6 years. Very frustrating and disappointing.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: My last coffee maker was also a De’Longhi which after 12 years of continuous use finally gave up.This model is slightly better than the last one I had and if it’s lasts half as long as my previous one I’ll be very happy.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This product was a present for my grandson who is absolutely delighted with it.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Milk frothier / steamer is good has 2 modes steam or hot water. Can fit a decent sized container. Coffee shots are a bit annoying has to measured with provided scoop can’t fill to top as won’t fit in machine. Amount of water and heat can be adjust but temp not as hot as I would like even on max.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It is working well and easy to make a coffee. I havent cleaned it yet. I will come back if any issues

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Perfect.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Very impressed with this machine. Simple to use and of high quality.  I guess not suitable for heavy use, but for me perfect for that morning coffee or two.  Very good powerful pump and steamer. Looks good too

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Use the Dedica with ESE pods to make late coffee. Heats milk and water very efficiently and produces good cappuccino frothy milk. Reference to handbook essential for set up and descaling. Light in weight, has to be held firmly when inserting and removing the filter holder. Overall a good product.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Excellent espresso machine, easy to use, compact and makes lovely coffee. Stylish too. Quick delivery. Mine arrived with a continental plug, but Amazon sent an adapter the next day free of charge, so no complaints.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: J'ai acheté cette machine pour faire du bon café avec des moutures spécialement achetés pour cet effet, malheureusement j'ai dû déchanter car seul le café avec gros grains passe. Le reste bloque et on n'obtient que quelques gouttes au bout d'un long moment d'attente.Très déçu par cet appareil

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great coffee machine, easy to use and delivers great coffee - came without spoon and tamper however bought separate and Amazon gave me a discount. Worth the money and looks great as well.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Has done about 10 coffees and then had a pump failure. Appears to be a common problem. My previous delongi did 15 years of daily use, this one is at the repair shop. Not impressed so far. Looks great, poor internal build quality

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Mareketed as a return, in fact completely non functional, reporting to trading standards, avoid.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Good beans deliver good coffee. This espresso machine delivers.👍🏻

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Lovely coffee.Milk heater works well also. Unable to decipher the descaling instructions though. We've put in a water filter on the tank also.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great coffee maker. Brews fab coffee and delicious lattes

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I bought this having read all the amazing reviews and thought it was a winner. Unfortunately I had nothing but problems with it and had to send it back as presumably faulty. Coffee just dripped out even after first use and then just stopped all together.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Exasperating machine which probably needs expert guidance, as from a store, to set up. Much inferior to  their previous model which was suited to someone simply wishing to make a cofffee without trouble.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It is easy to use and does the job.Not much cleaning involved.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: A really good first high quality  espresso coffee machine. Enables the making of high quality espresso, and the steam wand is so easy to use. No expert experience required. Only downside is I can’t stop having coffee!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: not user friendly in a large family  takes too long to make a few cups of coffee because transition from cappuccino to espresso reheating takes too long.  the milk steaming devices is not user friendly

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: It broke after 3 months.  The De'longhi service centre tried to palm me off by saying it just needed descaling and now have advised i will have to wait 28 days for a repair.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Compact machine that performs as good as any other manual cup espresso machine I’ve used before. The size suits my requirements but it performs in every aspect. The Steam milk frother/heater works really well too. Still getting used to it to gauge optimal grinding for the coffee.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Just what I have crying out for an ideal coffee maker Great for making single coffees for self.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I really love this coffee machine. Use ese pods and ground coffee. Descale done today. Simple job. Froths milk perfectly

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This was a present for my daughter and she loves it

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is an excellent machine that feels very solidly built. The initial set up takes a bit of time but, once that is done, it is very simple to operate. It is quick to heat up and much quieter to operate that my previous coffee maker. It produces a good espresso and the milk frother works particularly well. Highly recommended.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Easy to use make great cups coffee

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: This is the best small coffee machine in the business. I enjoy multiple different types of coffee drinks when ever I feel like one. Saves me a drive to coffee shop so great on the environment

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I will no longer be visiting Starbucks daily, this perfect little machine has finally met the standards I’ve been looking fo after trying out many of the automated branded machines like tassimo and dolce gusto always being very disappointed I have now found the Perfect affordable machine for home 🙂

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Bought this to replace our old De longhi coffee machine that broke down. Elegant and suitable for our small kitchen and more importantly the coffee is great!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great value item, well built. Takes some practice to get great coffee but I've got there now. Nice compact machine at a really good price.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Love this machine very neat and very creamy americano seems to need de scaling a lot according to light but overall would buy again

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Makes great coffee and very easy to use and clean.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Works great, easy to clean, and will save you a fortune in the long run.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Pretty decent. Agree with some comments about the coffee not being that hot. But does make a nice espresso (quickly) with some crema. Enjoyable to use. The steamer is a little tricky. But all in all a good machine, good fun and decent cofffee. Looks nice too.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: The machine made coffee fine but is poorly made. The power button broke after 2 weeks (very light usage) and wouldn't stay 'on'. The previous De'Longhi machine I owned (more expensive than this one) broke after 12 months. I assumed it was bad luck. Won't make that mistake again. Very disappointed.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Compact; not too lightweight. Easy-to-use; easy-to-clean. This now takes over from Krups as the best 'premium budget' espresso maker.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Brilliant coffee maker.  I can now make cappuccinos like you get in a Bistro.  So much better then the pod machines.  A great buy.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Espresso schmeckt gut.Leider ist die Maschine innerhalb 7 Monate bereits zum 2. Mal defekt.Versucht Wasser zu ziehen und surrt nur noch leise vor sich hin.Maschine wurde entkalkt, daran kann es nicht liegen...Maschine geht nun endgültig zurück und wir möchten unser Geld wieder.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Looked the part and ideal for a kitchen with not much counter space. Sent back as stopped working after 4 days. Wish I had taken more notice of the bad reviews. Very disappointed and would not buy again.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great little machine family very happy with it. Only downside is I have to buy another one as my son used it and said he'd love one for his upcoming birthday.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I picked this machine, because of its neatness. Makes a good cup of coffee. Very easy to use.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: We have been using and loving this machine for 3 months now but it broke down and started pouring water through the milk arm as the same time as the main one... it basically stopped working all together. Amazon gave us a refund and we sent the coffee machine back.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Easy to use. Good expresso

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Moin,Maschine ist ok,3 Temperaurstufen, Wassermenge Programmierbar,Durchflusszeit kann  über den Mahlgrad eingestellt werden. (!)singleesieb ca 10 bis 11g ( je nach Röstfarbe, helle/dunkle Röstung haben unterschiedliche Volumen bei selbigen Gewicht und identischem Mahlgrad)Hinweis:doppelsieb für ca 14 bis 17g  Mahlgut , also kein "echter" doppelter Expresso in Bezug auf singlesieb.Sinnvoll erst Leerbezug, ( für gleichmässiges Heiswasser) dann expresso Bezug, dann Leerbezug ohne Siebträger ( Reinigung)zum Schäumen extra Taste zum erhitzen des Wassers nötig.geht Fix, ca 10 sek.,das ist auch notwenidg, weil für Dampf höhere Temperatur nötig als zum Brühen des Mahlgutes.Expressotasse kann solange auf der Wärmeplatte Gehäuseoberseite verbleibenSchäumen geht, man muss es auch können, Geschicklichkeit ist da hilfreich.vor dem Schäumen zuerst Dampflanze kurz öffnen, Heisswassertropfen ( kodenswasser)  in Gefäss ( Glas, Tasse) abfangen, ich nehme das Gefäss vom 2. Leerbezug ( = zur Reinigung Brühsieb wie o.a.)Tip:Milchkännchen leicht schräg halten, Dampflanze eher zum Rand hin ausrichten ;-)Schnelles Abkühlen des Gerätes von Dampflanzenbetrieb  auf Expressobetrieb durch Drücken Dampfknopf auf AUS und öffnen Dampflanze, reinigt auch gleich..., Auffangen von Tropfen in ein Gefäss.schmales, hohes Gerät, nimmt wenig Platz weg, ist aber weil schmal nihct ganz so standsicher. muss mit einer Hand unterstützend beim Siebträgereinsatz gehalten werden.Hinweise aus anderen Rezensionen:nasser Kaffeepuck = zu wenig Kaffeemehl oder zu fein gemahlen.also nicht Gerät doof, sondern Anwenderfehler.Heisswasser troft nur aus der Dampflanze, kein Dampf.Knopf Dampf drücken und aufheizen lassen.Nachteile:;einfacher Expresso und doppelter Expresso sind Mengenmässig nicht die doppelte MengeDadurch habe ich beim Brühen von 2 Expresso eine geringere Expressomenge bei gleichem Wasser/ Mahlgutverhältnis als beim single Expresso.Doppelsiebeinsatz hat eine kaum zu greifende  zu tief liegende kleine Gmmilippe.Geschmack ist ok, man kann sich mit dem Gerät in die Baristawelt eingrooven.Empfehle ein Mahlwerk mit einstellbaren Mahlgrad und ggf. zusätzliche Waage für gleichmässige Egebnisse und Versuchebei mir ergab bei 10g Mahlgut im singlesieb und 41ml Wasserdurchlauf eine Expressomenge von 28g, Restfeuchtigkeit ist im Puck, weniger Mahlgut = mehr Nässe im Kaffeepuck.Sterneabzug gab es wegen der single / Doppelexpressomenge nicht 1:2 sowie fumeliges Sieb mit Gummilipe beim doppelexpressosieb.Gut das der Wassertank gross und abnehmbar ist.Tampergrösse angegeben 51mm, besser 50,5mm, es bleibt ein kleinerRand.der mitgelieferte Tamper ist komplett aus Kunststoff und kann gut über den Grünen Punkt entsorgt werden.viel Spass beim probieren, derthomas

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: I'm no expert but very much enjoy my coffee and flat-whites now

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Good espresso machine, only concert is double shot cup can take about 15g of coffee, so if you are after strong coffee, probably would be not as strong.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Die Maschine hat die erste 10 Espresso wunderbar zubereitet, die Qualität war sehr gut und ich war sehr zufrieden. Wie schon in einigen Bewertungen zuvor beschrieben, baut die Maschine seit heute aus unerfindlichen Gründen keinen Druck mehr auf. Der Kompressor / die Pumpe läuft an wird dann immer leiser, um dann komplett aufzuhören. Es kommt kein Tropfen Espresso aus der Maschine, egal wie viel oder wenig Kaffeepulver man verwendet. Sie läuft nur noch ohne Kaffeepulver, also ohne Gegendruck. Sobald Druck aufgebaut wird (das sollten bei der Zubereitung von Espresso ja immerhin 9 bar sein) gibt sie auf. Die mehrfache Rücksetzung auf Werkseinstellungen haben hier keine Änderung herbei geführt. Selbst wenn, wäre es für mich nicht zumutbar alle paar Tage die Maschine neu einzustellen. Ich gehe von einem grundsätzlichen Designfehler aus (Sensoren, Programmierung etc.), so dass ich von dem Kauf der Maschine dringend abrate. Leider scheint es tatsächlich keine gute Siebträgermaschine in diesem Preissegment zu geben. Also lieber sparen oder eben darauf verzichten.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: versatile enough to create your coffee as you like it!but beware it came with wrong plug for UK !!!

Review Description: Attractive product.  Does not need a lot of space. Very neat.  I can make a great latte at home!

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Great looking coffee machine in a tidy size

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Esta fue mi primera cafetera espresso y solo puedo tener buenas palabras para ella. Salvo sus limitaciones evidentes.Es facil de usar y con un par de añadidos puedes obtener un café casero bastante decente.Si utilizas los filtros que trae (presurizados) tendrás un café con crema sin complicaciones. Mas allá de que hayas ajustado bien la molienda de tu café -doy por sentado que tienes molinillo y café en grano-.La parte buena de esto es que utilizando los filtros que trae, al ser presurizados, no necesitarás un molinillo muy sofisticado. Con uno que puedes encontrar por aquí de 30€/40€ es suficiente.Pero para el 99% de la gente, es una cafetera que recomiendo si lo que necesitas es un espresso rapido. La ventaja frente a otras es que no requiere un calentamiento previo. Se enciende y casi al instante puedes comenzar a hacer cafés.Para ese 1%... si te quieres complicar la vida -cosa que no te recomiendo a este nivel- puedes comprarte un portafiltros 'botomless' o simplemente serrar el original y añadirle una canasta despresurizada. Eso si, requerirá una molienda mas fina (tendrás que mejorar el molinillo).Investiga un poco sobre ratios (1:2 suele ser el ideal) y tiempo de infusion y obtendras un mejor café.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Couldn't be more happy with it. It takes some getting used to frothing the milk to the right level but other than that makes excellent coffee relatively easily. Upgrade to my Tassimo

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Pro:Die Maschine ist sehr hochwertig verabreitet. Das komplette Gehäuse ist in Edelstahl gehalten. Der Siebträger ist auch Vollmetall, richtig schwer und liegt super in der Hand. Das Sieb klackt richtig fest mechanisch ein. Materialien und Verarbeiten lassen einen traumhaften Kaffee erhoffen.Contra:Crema - Fehlanzeige. Habe 4 Bohnensorten probiert und verschiedenste Mahlgrade (Handmühle mit Keramikmahlwerk). Alles was aus der Maschine kommt ist einfach nur ein starker Kaffee. Aber weder ein Espresso noch ein Caffé Crema.Mahlt man den Kaffee zu fein, schafft es die Maschine noch nicht mal Wasser durchzupressen. Entweder bricht sie nach 10 Sekunden von allein ab oder es tröpfelt ein bisschen was in die Tasse. Von 15 Bar kann da keine Rede sein.Man kann nur wählen zwischen Wassermenge für 1 oder 2 Tassen. Das lässt wenig Spielraum bei Mahlgrad usw. aber sie schafft ja eh nichts. ;)Der Milchaufschäumer geht mal - und mal geht er nicht. in 5 von 10 Fällen geht er nur für 5 Sekunden und dann fängt die Maschine an wegen angeblicher Überhitzung zu blinken.Fazit:Gerät geht zurück. Totaler Mist. Schade. Finde sie mega schön und viele andere Modelle haben selbst beim doppelten Preis viel billige Plastik verbaut.

Product Title: Delonghi EC685.M DEDICA 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine Coffee Maker, Stainless Steel, 220 Volts (Not for USA - European Cord)
Review Description: Zu Beginn zwei Anmerkung:A) Vorsicht, längere Rezension.B) Ich habe die Dedica als Amazon Warehouse Deal für 75 € erstanden. Im folgenden bewerte ich (nach einer kurzen Beschreibung) nicht den Warehouse Deal beziehungsweise den speziellen Zustand der Maschine, sondern die De'Longhi Dedica Style EC 685.M an sich.Zum Warehouse-Deal:Nachdem uns in den letzten Wochen der Espresso und Kaffee aus unserem Vollautomaten (ebenso De'Longhi) trotz regelmäßiger Reinigung & Pflege sowie recht guter Bohnen nicht mehr so richtig schmecken wollte, dachte ich etwas intensiver über den Einstieg in die Welt der Siebträger nach. Da ich seit einigen Jahren wenn möglich versuche , auch Geräten in ihrem zweiten Leben eine Chance zu geben und für mich die Wegwerfkultur etwas zu minimieren, bestellte ich eine Dedica für gerade mal 75,-.€ als Warehouse-Deal. Neben den zu erwarteten kleineren Kratzern und einer Delle zeichnete sich mein Exemplar durch einen mechanisch defekten Einschalter aus, den ich dann selbst recht simpel repartieren konnte. Amazon hätte die Maschine zur Reparatur zurückgenommen, dass wäre jedoch wieder recht aufwendige geworden, zudem hatte ich schon angefangen, die Maschine für uns etwas zu verbessern (s.u.).Zur Dedica an sich:Sie ist zwar unser erster Siebträger zuhause, jedoch habe ich schon häufiger bei Freunden etc. mit solchen Geräten einen Espresso/Kaffegetränk hergestellt.Die De'longhi ist klein, findet so auch auf übersichtlichen Flächen ihren Platz, leicht, hat ein Metall-/Kunststoffgehäuse und an für sich wirklich ordentlich verarbeitet. Durch die Thermoblock-Konstruktion (sie hat keinen Kessel, das Wasser fliesst Wasser durch ein elektrisch beheiztes Rohr) heizt sie schnell auf (max. 2 Minuten) und ist ebenso schnell aus dem zu programmierenden Ruhemodus wieder in Betriebsbereitschaft.Neben der Maschine an sich und einem große wie einem kleinen jeweils doppelwandigem Sieb zur Kaffeepulveraufnahme ist ein Kunststofftamper/Dosierlöffel dabei, so dass, fein gemahlene Kaffeebohnen vorausgesetzt, der Start direkt erfolgen kann.Heraus kommt dann, je nach Bohnen, ein mehr oder weniger genießbarer bis guter Espresso mit immer ordentlicher Creme. Durch die Konstruktion von doppelwandigem Sieb, das darunter noch einen zweiten Boden mit winzigem Loch hat, wird das gesamte Kaffeeextrakt mit sehr hohem Druck durch das Löchlein gepresst. So entsteht zwangsweise eine Crema, egal wie gut/alt die Bohnen sind bzw. das fertige Pulver ist. Der Siebträger, in welchem die Siebe mit einer simplen Klammer befestigt sind, hat darunter noch eine Kunststoffkonstruktion, die die Kaffeeflüssigkeit gleichmäßig auf die beiden Austrittslöcher verteilt. So können bei großem (doppeltem Sieb) theoretisch zwei Tassen gleichzeitig mit je einem Espresso gefüllt werden, wenn diese Tassen denn nebeneinander auf der Abstellfläche Platz finden.Bemüht man sich nun um gute Bohnen, welche man dann idealerweise noch in einer ordentlichen Mühle reguliert fein mahlen kann (hier wird die Mühle sicherlich so teuer wie die Dedica werden, jedoch lohnt sich die Investition in eine gute (ggf. gebrauchte) Mühle, so produziert die Maschinen einen netten Espresso. Allerdings kann man aufgrund der o.a. Siebkonstruktion den Extraktionsprozess nicht vollumfänglich steuern und die Ergebnisse sind m.E.nicht immer reproduzierbar.Die Herstellung eines Milchschaums gelingt mit der Aufschäumlanze recht gut, sicherlich hat die Maschine nicht den Druck eines großen Siebträgers mit voluminösem Kessel, aber mit etwas Übung läßt sich schnell ein stabiler Milchschaum erzeugen.Die Wassertemperatur ist in 3 Stufen programmierbar, die Wassermenge ist für doppelten und einfachen Bezug ebenso einstellbar wie die Wasserhärte und die Zeitspanne, bis sich die Dedica in einen energiesparenden Ruhezustand versetzt.Zusammengefasst bin bzw. war ich (fast) zufrieden mit den Ergebnissen, auch für den regulären Preis hier eine Empfehlung und 3,5 Sterne, die fehlenden liegen in den besonderen Sieben und dem zugehörigen Träger begründet.Aber die Maschine machte Neugierde auf „mehr“…Außerhalb der Bewertung:Für mich als (inzwischen etwas belesener Halb-Laie) wird der Geschmack des Espressos (natürlich neben dem Bohnen) hauptsächlich durch die Extraktionszeit, also die Zeit, in der das Wasser das Kaffeepulver durchquert und damit Kontakt hat, geprägt. Steuerbar ist das zum einen durch die Menge wie den Mahlgrad der Bohnen (je feiner, desto dichter das Kaffeemehl) sowie die Menge des Wassers. Der Wasserdruck ist nicht veränderbar. Natürlich spielt auch der Anpressdruck, mit der das Kaffeepulver im Sieb mit dem Tamper (vergesst das beiliegende Plastikteil und kauft einen vernünftigen) eingedrückt wird, eine gewisse Rolle, aber hier gehe ich davon aus, dass man dies auch manuell immer wieder reproduzieren kann und mit recht gleichem Druck das Kaffeepulver festdrückt. Also kann ich über die Pulvermenge, sowie den Mahlgrad und die Wassermenge kontrollieren bzw. festlegen, wie lange Pulver und Wasser in Kontakt sind. Ist diese Zeit zu kurz, werden mehr saure Bestandteile gelöst, ist diese Zeitspanne zu groß, werden mehr bittere Bestandteile gelöst. Durch die doppelwandige Form der original Siebe habe ich jedoch einen unberechenbaren Faktor, der zwar eine gute Crema erzeugt (sogar mit gekauftem Espressopulver), das Extrakt jedoch nicht direkt unter dem Sieb austreten lässt. Es braucht mehr oder weniger lange, um dann in einem dünnen Strahl aus dem Löchlein im zweiten Boden herauszuspritzen.Aus diesem Grunde habe ich einige im Internet gefunden Ratschläge befolgt und den Siebträger so umgebaut (das untere Ende abgeschnitten), dass ich nun nachträglich gekaufte einwandige Siebe verwenden kann.Und so versuche ich nun über die oben dargestellten Parameter, den Geschmack des produzierten Kaffeeextrakt zu beeinflussen.Nach einigem Üben und unter Nutzung einer Briefwaage (Wasser- und Pulvermenge) klappt es inzwischen auch recht gut, so dass ich mit dieser modifizierten Dedica aktuell wirklich glücklich bin. Nachteil ist, zumindest sagt dies meine Familie, dass ich nun morgens, mittags und abends doch einige Zeit (gutgelaunt) vor Mühle wie Siebträger verbringe. Aber eben diese besagte Familie hat sich auch zu Kaffeengenießern entwickelt, und ich komme aus dem Espresso machen und Milchaufschäumen nicht heraus…

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   This is a good espresso machine that is consistent, simple, and small. There is some learning curve to get used to this machine, but once you have it, it only take 5 minutes from start to finish (cleaning) for a nice shot of espresso. The machine heats up quickly; it takes only 40 seconds to get started. But I start by warming up the filter and the cup by pulling an empty shot. I found that  the water temperature gets slightly higher after the initial pull. The next step is getting the actual espresso shot. Most of the time, I do double shots, and it usually takes around 25~30 sec. For the single shot, it takes about 20 sec. (For comparison, Starbucks’ $180,00 fully automatic Mastrena machine takes 18~24 seconds for quad shots.) 30 seconds double shot is not bad for an entry level espresso machine, and I found the shot quality is consistent. Of course it’s not just the machine that makes a perfect shot of espresso, but when it comes to the quality of the shots, the machine’s consistency is critical. I found the default medium temperature is fine for me, but in the setting, I can also change the temperature to low, or high if needed.I am not a latte/cappuccino drinker, so I don't do steaming often, but when I do, this machine has no problem. I don’t get super creamy and velvety frothed milk, but it does its job (steaming milk). It takes about 60 seconds to get to around 160 degree. And the water needs to be purged right after steaming, before pulling the shots. Those are a few extra steps to go through, but it only takes about 20 seconds.Overall, this is a nice little machine. It is only somewhat bigger than my Nespresso Pixie,  and I like the compact design since it doesn’t take up so much counter top space. Recently my Pixie started leaking,  and I got tired of buying costly ‘capsules’ from Nespresso. I also couldn’t find a reliable reusable nespresso filter. So in my defense, a manual machine like this could justify my decision. I was looking for a manual/semi automatic machine that’s not too expensive and “small” with the ease of maintaining.I think the machine is priced slightly high for what it is, but, nonetheless, I am satisfied with the shot quality I get. For a better price option, in my opinion, the previous 680 model is good option (currently at $235), and the only difference I found is the steaming wand. This newer version has steaming options for ‘hot milk’ and ‘cappuccino’ and the 680 model doesn’t. Honestly, I don’t think this minor change is worth more than $100 price difference since milk steaming relies (not 100%) on the pitcher handling. But for americano,  espresso con panna, straight espresso shots, or just simple latter and cappuccino, I am sure both models would do equally good job.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Amazing machine - Let’s talk about the negative reviews
Review Description: I had this machine for 6 months and I’m super happy with it. Let me spill the tea. So, a lot of the negatives reviews are semi-true; yes, the machine gives you a warning sign that it’s overheated already after making two cups of coffee. But you fix the problems very fast just by running the machine with water for 5 seconds. Yes, the machine give you a descaling warning after couple of months but you can just switch it off or even simply ignore it (nothing really changes but the color of one of the buttons, that’s all really). I use Brita water so I don’t descale the machine. Otherwise, works perfectly fine. Coffee takes amazing. The machine has a sleek design. Temperature is good, and adjustable. Cappuccino maker works great and it’s easy to clean (you purge it before and after, wipe it with a tissue, done). Never gave me any problems so far really. The only issue I have with it is that it won’t run if the coffee is grinded to a very fine level. And sometimes I get or buy coffee that is very fine. That’s my only isssue with it. But that’s not worth getting a 1,000$ espresso machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Very disappointed in this company and if it is returned this ...
Review Description: DO NOT but this product from this company. Limited use of this machine in my house it's not as if it's overworked. Maybe 4 times a week I make 1 latte a day. Over $360 I paid and It's not even 2 months old, it is overheating and not making steam.  Called DeLonghi and I HAVE to pay for shipping to be repaired on a product I haven't had very long. Very disappointed in this company and if it is returned this will be the last product I purchase from them.UPDATE: 1/30/18. Machine has been in for repair for over a month. They aren't sure when they are going to get the part in...maybe another couple of weeks.  I needed a new pump. So without a machine that was 2 months old and that I had to pay $40 to ship back for repair and no idea when I will receive it back.  Just spiffy....UPDATE: 2/8/18 Machine was returned yesterday and when I removed from box, the bag and machine were covered in water. When I set up the machine to make a cappuccino, the water came out of the machine everywhere EXCEPT into the coffee holder.  It continued to drip from around the coffee holder even after I had turned off the machine.  When I came back to try again, noticed that the entire counter was a big puddle of water and the reservoir was almost empty. I called Amazon and complained about this product that even after being repaired at 2 months, it was returned in worse shape.  They refunded my money and I will ship back to Amazon.  I definitely would NOT purchase this machine based on product support and repair.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Leaking boiler after four months, terrible customer service
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Bought this machine in January 2018. As of last week, I can no longer use it because it is leaking around the boiler gasket. I've contacted DeLonghi directly. They've attempted four different times to require me to upload video as proof of the problem, which has failed because the systems they have for doing so, both over the phone and online, do not perform properly. I am left now with having to ship it to a service center at my own expense, and I haven't checked yet but I can only imagine how much it must cost to ship something so heavy.  I will never buy another DeLonghi product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Bought this product in January. Has worked perfectly until ...
Review Description: Bought this product in January. Has worked perfectly until this week. I've used Delonghi filters and Delonghi DeCaulking liquid when the machine indicated it needed descaling. Have cleaned the unit completely after every use, which is daily. Today it stopped working. Called Customer Service. They told me to do everything I had already tried and it still doesn't work. Now they want me to drive 40 miles to a service center where they say someone will attempt to fix it. That means driving 80 miles round trip two times to drop off and pick up. I asked what happens if it can't be fixed. They said they would be contacted but probably wouldn't be able to replace with a new unit. I advise strongly to NOT buy this product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: After one month of normal use the portafilter started to corrode around the edges.  No big deal.  It's a $15 part.  I thought I'd get a free replacement under warranty since this machine is new.  Nope! I have learned from the fairly rude and impatient customer service people at DeLonghi that because it was sold through Amazon by a third party the warranty is null.  Amazon doesn't make this very obvious on their web site either.  I don't know who's more to blame here.  Me, Amazon or Mitch Mel Corp, the re-seller.  Do yourself a favor, buy another brand directly from the manufacturer at MSRP and enjoy your coffee!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Still an Excellent In-home Espresso Machine - one year later
Review Description: I've owned my DeLonghi EC685BK for almost one year and make an average of 2 cappuccinos/day. Here's why I bought this machine...at an average cost of $3.50/cappuccino, I would have spent over $2,500 in a coffee bar.  Having re-read all the reviews, it is very important to realize that this machine delivers espresso in your own home similar to what you get from the typical coffee bar's $10K machine that is "professionally" maintained. It does have a learning curve though, and as a consumer, it is up to the purchaser to do the research (there are many YouTube videos, even on this machine) on what to do and not to do when purchasing/using an in-home espresso machine. It is equally important to follow the directions in the owner's manual regarding cleaning/descaling, proper grinding, overheating, and so forth. Expect to go through trial and error at first, but with a little patience, once you get it right (it won't take too long), you'll be very pleased. I would highly recommend this machine, as well as Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee Blend, Medium Espresso Roast to go with it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Brand new machine -- Did not perform as described. As soon as I made an espresso, the one and two cup lights starting flashing indicating that it needed to be cool -- and it would flash for 2 minutes and longer. Tried numerous times to cool it down according to instructions; turning it off and starting over, etc., etc. -- all to no avail. Contacted DeLonghi manufacturer and they wanted me to take it to a company for repair that was a two-hour drive each way (if I were to do that -- really, drive four hours to get a brand new machine repaired!) AND, they said that according to the warranty, they were not obligated to replace it. So, I went back to our trusted Amazon, and they sent me a replacement right away and made the return of the first one very easy. Unfortunately, the second machine was no better. What a shame. My Sister has the earlier model, and she has had no troubles, other than she has to frequently decalc the machine. Thank you Amazon for your customer service and for standing behind your products, even when the manufacturers do not!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Purchased through amazon directly and not through a seller, got this at a good price of $223 and so far the espresso maker itself is quite perfect. Quick and easy and makes really great espresso. The noise however just makes me laugh, it sounds very similar to a sound I've heard from a sci-fi movie so I feel like aliens are attacking every time I hear it. It is obnoxious and loud but doesn't last too long. A lot will hate it for that reason but it just is amusing to me. The steamer on the other hand is temperamental if not slightly possessed at times. Worked for a day and a half and when I went to start it again, I barely used it 5 seconds before it stopped working. When I tried to get it to work again the steam came out so hard it splashed the milk everywhere. Talk about ghost in the machine. Love the espresso, hate the steamer and it slightly scares me at times if it will work properly or try to kill me by steaming. I would suggest buying a separate steamer for heated milk! I give it 3.5 stars out of 5.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Great! One cup at a time.
Review Description: Great product! Takes a minute to get oriented with how to use it and not fill up the cup too high with grounds. If the cup is too full (or the grounds are too fine), the pressure builds up too high and will shut off before it produces any espresso.I usually want more than just one double shot, so I have to take everything apart and refill it to get another cup. It's a small inconvenience and I readily do it to get the amount I want, but I wish there was a more convenient option to produce more without resetting everything. The overall product and size and espresso produced are great.UPDATE 7-MONTHS LATER:Still going strong! I use this machine almost daily, usually running the machine 2-4 times to get the amount of espresso I want. I live in a small apartment so this takes very little time to do in between getting ready in the morning. Still very happy with mg purchase!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Over the years, I've owned various home espresso machines ranging in price from $150 to almost $800, and this is one of my favorite espresso machines ever. I purchased this model in July 2019 (I'm writing this review in Nov 2019), and have used it multiple times a day since I purchased it. Several highlights that make this one of the best I've used:a) Ease of useb) Ease of clean-up!c) Great *consistent* flavor extractionThe light over my counter probably makes things look a little amber, but this machine really does pull a beautiful caramel-colored crema (as seen in these photos). As you can probably tell, this machine does not make a thick crema though. That's a good thing! For those new to espresso, you don't want a lot of crema. Depending on the coffee roast and the machine, crema can be bitter. I have found a great locally roasted espresso that works really well with this machine to produce a lovely rich under note, and a slightly bitter-sweet crema. Therefore, I don't stir my espresso since I enjoy that slight contrast. If you find the crema is too bitter, be sure to stir it into the darker coffee below the surface. That will even the notes out a bit.I typically drink espresso black, no sugar. That means I don't use the steam wand a great deal, so I don't really have many tips for working with the wand on this machine. But, the times when I have used the wand, I've stretched enough foam for a macchiato and that has turned out quite well.A couple of other tips:1. You will need to experiment with the brand of espresso beans you use, and with the grind of the bean. No two espresso machines are the same, so no two machines with pull your shots exactly the same way either. For instance, regardless of which roaster I buy my beans from, my machine works better if I grind on Fine which is slightly more course than the Espresso setting on most grinders. I just get an overall better-tasting and better-looking cup of espresso that way.2. Experiment with flavor profiles in the espresso blend you use. Try different roasts from different roasters. It's amazing how much variation you'll get from one roaster to another. I've found a local roaster who makes a great espresso blend that I've not gotten down to the place that I pull a shot that has a nice, rich under note with a pretty smooth finish (very little bitterness in the crema). There's a good balance even without stirring the espresso. some people like brighter, more acidic roasts, that's great, too.3. Make sure your espresso beans are as fresh as possible, and try not to let an open package of coffee sit for more than a couple of weeks.Those things are as important as operating the machine in terms of pulling a quality cup of espresso that it satisfying to both the sense of smell and taste. (I love the aroma of espresso in the house.)Overall, the Dedica Deluxe has been a great machine thus far. I use it (on average) 2-4 times a day, and I couldn't be happier. The sleek design fits neatly on my counter, and it looks good, too.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: If you're tired of bad coffee, buy this!
Review Description: We love this machine. It's very easy to use and makes delicious frothy espresso (we buy dark roast whole beans and grind them, much better than pre ground) The steamer works great too and only takes about 45 seconds to get your milk to a desired temp.I started off making single shot espressos with 4 ounces of steamed milk. Now I'm making double shots every day and can't get enough... I may have an addiction.The cleaning process is a little annoying though and the directions aren't perfectly clear. I would recommend following them but using two large cups (one for the coffee dispenser part and one for the steamer) so you don't get water/cleaning solution splattering all over the place! Hope this helps someone.Anyway, it's a great machine and I would highly recommend it to anyone who is trying to step up their coffee game. Seriously, enjoy your new addiction.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Is the pump made out of balsa wood? It doesn't last.
Review Description: Update: 05/31/2020 This is a beautiful machine and works great! The only problem is that the pump doesn't last.I would not recommend the extended warranty. Just put the 50 bucks into a new machine, because in 6 months or so you will have to buy a new machine anyway when the second one breaks down. And the replacement is slow so you are stuck having to go to Starbucks until the new machine arrives. After researching these machines, I see that NONE of them have pumps that last unless you buy a $5,000 machine as Starbucks uses.  What I do now is to buy two inexpensive Hamilton Beach machines (for half the price) and when one breaks I have a new machine instantly. The Hamilton Beach machine lasted seven months making one espresso per day. That's about par for the course. The Hamilton Beach is comparatively ugly but works just as well. It's too bad these pumps are not user-replaceable like automobile spark plugs!Original post:The pump stopped working before my warranty ran out. I must say, I had no problem with Customer Service. They had me use my phone to give them a live feed from my kitchen while they put me through troubleshooting steps. It took a good number of days to get the new machine, however.  I was sent another machine, and I resolved to treat the new one like a baby - with minimal use; i.e., using the double-cup filter only once a day.  And, I stopped using the machine to make hot water to fill up my 18 oz. mug, as I like "Americano"; so I heated water in my electric kettle to save wear on the Delonghi. Never-the-less, the new machine quit pumping after 5 months of use. It made normal pumping sounds, but wouldn't push through the coffee. If DeLonghi would beef up the pump, that would be great, as whoever designed this machine did a super job - easy to use and looks exquisite. When the first machine quit, I looked online and bought a Hamilton Beach espresso machine as a  backup in case the DeLonghi failed again, and it was less than half the price. How long the Hamilton Beach will last, I don't know, but it did make a great cup of espresso coffee this morning.12/12/2019 UPDATE: Word of caution: My Hamilton Beach acted as if the pump had failed, just like the Delonghi. I looked online for a more expensive replacement and came across a user who said his expensive machine acted as if the pump had failed - wouldn't push through the coffee. However, this person did an update and said his problem was that the water tank was not fully seated, and that fixed the problem. That fixed my HB machine also. Note this was NOT the case with my Delonghi. The lesson is:NEVER let the water tank run out or get too low!Be sure to properly seat the water tank, every time!I was all set to buy a $500 machine tomorrow morning. This uses' advice saved me $500.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: NOTE: this rating is for the reseller, not the product. I purchased this without realizing the order was to be fulfilled by Lifestyle by Focus. This is NOT an authorized reseller of DeLonghi products, which I learned the hard way when the product stopped working properly. The replacement would have been handled no-questions-asked by DeLonghi, but as it was not direct from Amazon, it voided warranty instantly. I was put on hold for 30 min by Focus and then told they'd email me when they had a solution. I will update if they choose to resolve this as they should.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: if you are serious about espresso, then this machine is not for you. if you will be dialing in your grind, using an aftermarket non-pressurized basket, etc, then you will be very disappointed in this machine.the extraction itself is OK. while you can get a decent shot using a non pressurized basket, the experience itself will be very frustrating. the drip tray and water tank are TINY, and require constant emptying/filling in between only 1 or 2 shots. not to mention it’s tiny cup clearance which makes it impossible to fit a shot glass and scale. like all aluminum portafilters, it hardly holds any heat whatsoever, and by the time you’re done grinding, tamping, etc, it’s room temperature, which definitely negatively affects shot quality.what’s most frustrating to me (and ultimately the reason i returned it) was the steam wand. in cappuccino mode (aka panerello) it produces very light foam and absolutely screeches. in hot milk mode (non-panerello-ish) it’s hard to get any milk texture whatsoever or any sort of swirling motion. you can remove the attachment and be left with the the flimsy rubber piece, and can get decent milk texture and quality, however the rubber piece will fly off into your milk mid-steam. i’ve heard of people taking the machine apart and upgrading to a ranchilio steam wand, however this will obviously void your warranty and if you’re expecting to buy this machine and do that, you might as well save yourself the headache and buy a breville instead.overall, just avoid this machine. i know, as a beginner it seems insane to spend $700 on a breville barista express, but i guarantee turning this delonghi into somewhat of a decent espresso machine will cost you at least another $100. so just save yourself the massive headache and disappointment, and buy a breville barista express. i promise you won’t be disappointed.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: All in all a nice machine.  The process of making espresso is pretty straight forward with a bit of a learning curve.  What I don’t like is recommended prep and processes to heat the unit by doing a run without coffee in place. This uses water from the tank as well as I feel could contribute to hard water build up necessitating de scaling sooner.  The cup warmer does not really warm enough and if your making coffee their is some inherent vibration which could cause cups to vibrate off.With all of this said I do really enjoy the espresso produced by this machine and would purchase it again.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The product never worked right from day one.  Don't waste you money.  It has no weights on the bottom to hold it steady, so when you take the filter in and out, the machine slides and wants to flip over.  If they would work out the electronics and weight the bottom, it might have a chance.  Coffee was inconsistent in taste.  Yes, I roast my own coffee and have owned other units I paid over $1500.00 for.  I know how to use an espresso machine.  So, there isn't a problem with my not knowing how to make a good espresso.  I'm now choosing to fix my other machines.  You get what you pay for.  I don't like the smaller size of the filter baskets.  Also, I'm sure the unit they sent me was a return.  As I was boxing it back for a return, I found coffee and dust in it. I had it stored in the box, so there was no way I could have done it.  Anyway, research and think before you invest in this product.  A fair price for this unit should be about $50.00, way over priced IMO.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Overall it is a pretty good espresso machine. It heats up very fast and produces excellent pressure. It presoaks the grounds which certainly helps the espresso.
