It is very simple to operate with minimal controls. My only real complaint is that it only comes with double-walled/pressurized filters. While the pressurized filter appears to create crema, it really only creates "foam." A single-walled filter would have been a cheap addition to the other 3 filters in the box and allowed the owner the choice of which to use. They don't even offer a single-walled filter for separate purchase, requiring you to buy a complete portafilter to get one that will work... an extra fifty bucks that a fifty-cent filter in the box would have saved me.The only other issue is common across most espresso makers; there needs to be an extra inch or two between the bottom of the portafilter and the drip tray to accommodate a full-sized coffee mug. It will accommodate a standard coffee cup, but nothing taller. It is no big deal for straight espresso, but the extra room would allow me to add a double shot directly to my moring coffee without having to make it in one cup and pour it into another... yeah, I know, I'm being a Karen about that one.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Great machine. I bought this after a lengthy debate on what to get when my last espresso machine died. I love the compact size of the machine which does not take up a lot of space on the counter and it can handle a proper mug if you want tpo put one in which most machines cannot handle.So far so good, I will update at a further date when I have used it for longer.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Works great, until it does not.
Review Description: I really like the narrow form-factor, and the frother works great. This is the second unit. On the first unit, the master power switch sticks right out of the box. I had the same problem with the unit, but I decided to leave it in the ON position and keep it anyway.But now, the double-shot button times out after a few seconds. Single-shot seems to work fine, but that is inconvenient, and I am concerned that it could quit working as well. It is out of the 90-day Amazon return period. Bummed.UPDATE: I restored the defaults, and the double-shot timer started working properly. I am going to keep it, but it is definitely a glitchy product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I intentionally waited 6 months before writing a review so I could test it thoroughly.  I've used quite a few espresso machines and for the money, this one is the best.  It produces picture perfect, great tasting espresso.  The steam wand works as advertised but I mostly use this for straight espresso.  I purchased extra filter baskets and have made 8 double shots of espresso back-to-back when I've had guests without a hint of trouble.  I have given this machine a workout every day for 6 months and have no complaints.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Do NOT buy this machine from a third-party vendor.
Review Description: After close to 6 months of using this machine, it was unable to deliver adequate pressure (which made for very bitter, watery coffee). I had properly descaled the machine twice when the machine indicated it was time.After contacting the manufacturer and a lengthy customer service call, they were going to send me a new machine. However, once De-Longhi discovered that my Amazon purchase was through Spreetail, which they said was not an authorized retailer, they informed me my warranty was void.Of course, Spreetail declined to help as well, stating I was outside my return time.After looking online, I noticed that the pump on these machines is often a cause for problems. That should not necessarily dissuade the buyer SO LONG AS THE BUYER PURCHASES FROM SOMEONE DE'LONGHI APPROVES OF. If you are buying from an Amazon vendor that isn't De'Longhi, I would recommend that you steer clear of this machine. You are shelling out a fair amount of money if you are buying this machine, and you should expect to receive a good product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: My first day officially using it. I’m used to Breville and so know the “technique”!It just took me a couple videos on YouTube to know what I’m supposed to do.There is a programming thing to change the warmth of water where it is, by default, set to warm, and I like it HOT!It also needs a couple steps ahead before you start making your coffee.Cleaning the steamer is very important, like any espresso machine, to make sure it doesn’t get clogged! Taking it apart is very easy.Update:March 17/2020Super!! I now make great latte. It’s really great 😁

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   I am so sad... this is our second machine. The first was returned because each time the double shot was chosen the espresso dripped and then stopped. A warning signal would flash- all three lights blinking and then stop. We returned and got this machine as an exchange. See the attached video.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I have been sucked down the coffee rabbit hole, so I did a lot of research before buying this espresso machine. For the price, this thing is excellent. Coffee snobs will likely recommend a higher price point ($500-600) breville, but this little thing makes better espresso shots than the local hipster joint. The low profile size is great to save on counter space.I did purchase an aftermarket non-pressurized basket for "true" espresso shots will really made a difference and I'd highly recommend. The steam wand takes some practice, but over time I was able to perfectly foam milk for both cappuccino and lattes.Also, I recommend to have your own Burr grinder to adjust grind size for proper extraction. I'm so happy with this purchase

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: After coming home from Italy, I found myself craving the delicious cappuccinos I enjoyed daily. I did my research for an at-home option. Having been a barista for 8 years when I was younger, I really wanted a machine that was mostly manual with ease of use/clean up. I also want a good shot with thick crema. So glad I settled on this one! Even using non-dairy oat milk, my cappuccino was gorgeous! Fine froth, no huge bubbles.. and the shot was tasty AF. This machine is legit.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Easy to use and easy to clean!
Review Description: I absolutely love this espresso maker!  I easily use it two to three times a day.  It is not that large, and looks very sharp on the counter.  I like that the removable drip try allows me to either use a standard latte cup or if I would like to use a more traditional coffee mug, I can remove the tray.  The foaming nozzle works well.  I haven't mastered latte art quite yet, but it gives me a thick foam.  I do wish the stainless steel milk frothing cup and a better tamper were included with the purchase, but they were easy add-ons.  I did notice that after steaming you can't go right back to making another coffee as the water in the line is too hot, indicated by flashing buttons.  So after steaming, I press a coffee buttom and then bleed the steam from the line until only water comes out.  This clears the line of water water/steam and lets the machine cool down enough to do a second espresso.  I do find the warming tray on the top of the unit pretty much worthless.  Running the unit once without espresso in the pod flushes the lines and heats the mug.  I also do one run after brewing to clean the machine.  I've not had a single problem with it, and it seems to balance expense against value.  If you're looking for something fully automatic, then this is not for you, as you have to press your own coffee and steam your own milk. If you don't mind the process of making your own coffee, then this is for you!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Great espresso maker + tips for those who like cappuccino
Review Description: I really like this espresso machine. Compact, nice stainless steel finish, heats very quickly, frother works very well, the machine can accept fairly large cups (which bothered me with the other machine I tried), no issues with pump pressure even with well-compacted coffee. The only thing I wish was different is that to switch from frothing to espresso you need to let out all steam until the boiler cools down and hot water starts coming out. I like to make the milk first so the espresso is not bitter. I ended up just turning the machine off, then back on to reset it and avoid having to go through the change-over routine. One other comment - you need to get your own glass or steel container. It does not come with the machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Great if you know how to use it.
Review Description: There are a lot of mixed reviews on this product. The thing about an espresso machine is that you have to know how to use it and take care of it for it to work smoothly and provide great results. Although it is not hard, there is a learning curve to working an espresso machine. If your not up for reading the instructions and performing the routine cleaning procedures (all of which is quick and easy once you know how) you need to stick with a pod machine. It is evident from other reviewers that the customer service can be rough, but this is a review of the product, not the customer service. I give it 5 stars for consistently producing amazing coffee, being easy to use, and looking small and sleek in my kitchen. It creates great espresso shots and once you learn how to make the milk the way you like it, you can make a latte/cappuccino etc.  exactly the way you want it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: No longer works just after several months of gentle use
Review Description: While it worked the machine was great to have. But unfortunately as the other reviewers point out -it stops working! Should've paid more attention and have not ignored the bad reviews.This machine lasted only 5 months!The pressure stopped working and the coffee would no longer drip.At first I thought it may be the filter. I cleaned it, then I even ordered a brand new one. Same problem..After reading more reviews it turns out it is a common issue with this machine.Very disappointed in De'Longhi.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Once you get use to it, it works well. Every espresso is the perfect temp, nice frothed, which is easy to clean. On the other hand, the descale process is quiet lengthy... You must manually operate the machine for about 15 minutes to complete the entire process. What’s more, about 6 weeks daily use to the first descale, which seemed short.. but I’m all about a clean machine. Overall, good value, doesn’t take up a lot of real estate on the counter, and it’s relatively quiet.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Amazing espresso with a little bit of modification
Review Description: Pulls a GREAT shot with just a couple simple modifications..I’d been using this espresso maker with the included pressurized filter since I got it back in November. It worked okay but I always got frustrated that I couldn’t make a strong enough iced latte. I was determined to figure out what I was doing wrong.First I discovered the difference between a pressurized filter and a non-pressurized filter, so I ordered a Mr Coffee non-pressurized filter, which made a small difference but then I discovered that my Baratza Encore was not grinding as fine as it could! I found a guide online which instructed me on how to open it up and adjust the grind. The improvement to the grind was HUGE and really complimented the non-pressurized filter upgradeBut it still wasn’t perfect.. I ordered a bottomless portafilter, with mixed reviews and was nervous it may not work properly with this machine, but it is perfect!!!I got this machine as a like new open box for $180, sunk about $50 into upgrades and after a little bit of grunt work on the grinder, it feels like I’m working with a $600+ machine. Highly recommended if you are willing to upgrade to an unpressurized filter (and preferably a bottomless portafilter), and have a proper espresso grind!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Seems it perfectly worked for only a month or so
Review Description: It gave me very tasty latte for less than a month. The frothing power was amazing at first giving me awesome frothed milk. However, in less than a month, the frothing power declined. The decalcifying alarm turned on and I cleaned it as instructed. But the frothing became even worse. Now, when I feel the steam, it only feels like wet steam sometimes and like dry puffing something. The frothing voice also changed to loud noise. It rather boils the milk, while I set the nozzle to frothing and not boiling. I will keep it for few more days and monitor the performance, and I will return it if it does not improve.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Best entry point yet professional machine
Review Description: I like everything about this machine from the price, the quality, the ease of use, the ease of cleaning to the perfect production of a cup of a shot of espresso or cappuccino. The only slight draw back about this machine is the wand. However, it can be upgraded for under $30. I highly recommend it. If you can spend more, I would definitely suggest the mate color if you really want to avoid seeing smudges and fingerprints.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is a great machine for personal use.  I researched for a while and even tried the Mr. Coffee but had to return it due to a malfunction with the automatic milk steamer/frother.  I like this one because you steam/froth the milk manually and you can use the pods or measure your own grounds.  It took a few tries to learn the milk frother but now it's perfect every time. It heats up rather quickly and makes a great espresso with good crema.  It only takes a small space on your counter which is a plus for me.  My only negative is it comes with one portafilter but three interchangeable inserts depending on if you want a single or double shot or using a pod.  I understand this was done for cost effectiveness but the inserts pop out every time you try to "knock" the puck out which by the way the puck doesn't come out - I end up digging it out with a spoon.  Overall though I still LOVE it!!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Lasts about 1.5 years before going kaputt
Review Description: This is the 2nd De'Longhi Dedica that I've owned. The first was pre-owned, given to me by a neighbor, and it lasted about a year and a half. When that one stopped working, I purchased the same model figuring I should buy something familiar. Well, here we go again, right about the same time.Basically the machine gave me the warning to descale, which I ignored for about a month, and then when I went to descale it, it won't go through the process nor even drip water, much less make a cup of coffee.I like the machine *when it works.* However, when I buy the next one, it will not be this model. I need a machine that will last more than 18 months.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I wanted so badly to love this machine, but incredibly disappointed with it. I've had a DeLonghi EC702 espresso machine for 9 years. My wife and I use it twice daily, sometimes more if we're having guests over. The EC702 never has had issues with creme and making a good cup. We decided to treat ourselves and upgrade to this compact and nice looking machine, the Dedica Deluxe EC685W. We were excited when it came fast and set it up right away. I went through the normal setup process, ran 2 tanks of water through like the instructions say. Right away I was troubled by leaking. Due to what appears to be a design flaw, putting water in the tank causing it to leak a little bit and create a puddle under the back. It happened 2 days in a row. It stopped after a few seconds, but other reviews will show you it can get worse over time. My biggest concern was the quality of extraction. You can see in my picture by comparison, a fresh extraction from identical beans, compared to a 9 years old EC702, this newer machine truly falls short. I'm not a coffee snob, but even I could see the creme on the old machine (in the little bowl) versus what was just gotten from the Dedica Deluxe is very different. This was identical beans and espresso grind, the Dedica Deluxe can't create anything. To those who don't know, creme is indicative to how good the machine is doing at extracting from the beans. An old machine should not do so much better than a brand new (and more expensive) espresso maker. I tried many different thing, different grinds, light versus dark coffee, nothing mattered, the Dedica may look nice but can't produce a quality drink compared to even an older machine.  I wanted so badly to love this machine, but will unfortunately be returning it. Read the reviews around here, and know the ones that talk about leaking and creme issues are the most accurate and to look for a different machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Good espresso. Failed 80% of the time though!
Review Description: Machine drew a few of the best espresso shots I've ever had. The problem is that it took 5 tries to get it to work. Afterwards I had nothing but trouble getting decent shots. Sometimes I would put an empty basket and nothing came out. Other times water didn't even come out. I must've wasted 1 lb of coffee trying different ways and grinds. Sometimes it would work but most likely nothing would come out. Too bad because the flavor of the good shots was 5 stars. Reading past reviews confirmed my experience as a common one with no solutions offered. Delonghi is IMPOSSIBLE to contact.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Good espresso, but a few minor glitches
Review Description: Very happy with this product overall, and would recommend to others. The espresso produced is good, with attractive crema. The features are intuitive and functional. Easy to clean. About one in fifteen uses, a grain from the grounds gets lodged in the little hole through which the water is pushed through, and I have to throw out the grounds and begin again. Also, I wish that the descaling notice allowed for ONE more use after it came on. Instead, the machine stops working until you descale it, which takes about 25 minutes. But, overall, I'm glad I bought this machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I had the machine for 20 months , it stared leaking a couple months back. It’s water coming out from between the metal upper housing and the nylon serving holder . If I had seen this portion was plastic and metal I would not have purchased this machine . That’s what  sucks  about amazon , u can’t really get full detail on what your buying ...I like to refer to amazon as the harbor freight of the online stores ! It was good while it worked , now it is going in the trash bin....

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I love this coffee maker and use it daily. I used to work in a coffee shop so I know how to make coffees and I don't think this can be beat on size and price/value if you want to make your own coffees from fresh ground. It makes a great cup of coffee and I have had no issues with it at all. My only gripe which is a bit niche to me I guess is that I owned the same model in Europe before I moved to the USA, and that had a removable insert inside the espresso metal pod where the coffee grounds sit. For some reason they have welded that in for the USA model, and I know from when I cleaned my other one you would get old coffee water collecting in there. Well now since it is welded in and I cannot remove that piece I have to shake the water out which is super annoying. I will look to see if I can get a replacement espresso pod which has the removable piece, but that aside HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I also bought one for my parents who love theirs. I make a black coffee in it daily and recommend running it for 3 shots to get a full mug as the flavour is much better than if you just added water to one (double) shot. I have also made successful latte's and cappucino's in it when the mood takes me. Just be aware when using the frother, you have to let a small amount of water out before putting the wand in your milk, otherwise you end up with slightly watery milk. Again a small quirk which once you realise it I don't even think about. I have previously owned a nespresso machine as well as drip coffee maker and would recommend this to anyone wanting a decent home coffee maker where they are not put off using loose coffee grounds

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: first 3 months great and then, tech support troubleshooting  WIFI/camera not the machine
Review Description: Water started to leak from above the coffee holder after 3 months of usage. Water would be dripping into cappuccino not passing the coffee chamber. There are a few people that reported the same  issue. I cleaned the machine following procedures and cleaned it with decalk solutionThe worst thing was that when I got on tech support. They forced me to create a video of my problem and we ended up troubleshooting me creating and sending the video over my bad connection. (Never worked my connection at the place I use the machine is NOT good)  Really, tome to wake up Delonghi! I rather drive to the closest repair drop off (10 miles from my house) than going trough this process that requires me to have CAMERA to troubleshot coffee machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is a beautiful sleek looking machine but it is the most difficult coffee machine I have ever used. I've had it for a month. It seems to overheat after every cup of coffee, you have to wait at least 10-15 min before you can make another cup. Plus when making the froth you have to wait another 10-15 min before you can make your coffee, by that time your froth is not a froth any longer. Tried making coffee first and then the froth, same thing happens, your coffee gets cold by the time you have a chance to make your froth. I followed the instructions to the letter and still kept having issues every time. Very disappointed. Will be returning it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is our first ever espresso machine and we're very happy with it. We've been using it to make an average of two double espressos per day since November (8 months, or nearly 500 espressos). It still works great. There was a learning process to use it but it comes with a pretty good troubleshooting guide. The milk steamer was especially difficult and it took a lot of tries to get this to work (tip: use whole milk and watch some videos). If the filter-holder won't turn, it's likely because the cup is overfilled. From what I've read, decaf beans are well-suited to espressos, and this has been my experience as well.At first our coffee quality was so-so and inconsistent, but switching to a quality burr grinder made a HUGE difference. The type of beans is also important. The only downside is that I can't drink drip coffee anymore!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Had it a year now.  Drinks everyday at home or in RV.  Been working flawlessly.  Makes awesome foam and cafe quality lattes.  For starts purchase use high quality fresh organic espresso or light/medium roast beans .  Good water.  A Crema pro thermometer for steaming cold pasteurized organic whole milk.  Start steaming milk at 7oz mark in 20oz froth pot.  Hold froth pot at 45deg angle with wand at lowest point and dont move till about 130-140f.  Over time dial in foam consistency by feel.  Use a 51mm Stainless tamper like the Luxhaus brand to get a firm press into portafilter. I like the included double shot portafilter cup and make one shot into a 8oz double walled glass cup.  Make shot straight into 8oz cup then add steamed froth with in 6 seconds to avoid bitterness.  The Delonghi Dedica matching conical burr grinder near finest setting makes a big difference too.  It grinds straight into portafilter for convenience.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: We paid for a new machine and got a totally used one!!!!!!
Review Description: We paid the price for a brand new machine and we just got a very used one!!! The pictures are what we received today. It’s packaged in a worn out De’longhi box. On top of the box there is a shipping tag that was removed on purpose! I’m pretty sure it was shipped to someone else and that person used it for a long time and returned it. The tray of the machine is also scratched. There’s no doubt it’s used and it has been used for a certain amount of time. When I tried to replace the item, the system showed they can’t validate my credit card. This is absolutely unacceptable!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This little Esspresso machine is absolutely wonderful, super easy to use and makes great espresso. I work at a fine dining restaurant and was looking for a Budget way to get the same espresso coffee I could get at work at home. The DeLonghi Dedica totally does the trick it may have a few cheap plastic parts but overall the build quality is great. My only complaint is in regard to Descaling the machine, the machine calls for Descaling with a little orange light, but no matter how many times I follow Delongies descaling instructions it won't shut off.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I got this as a Christmas gift for my significant other but shamelessly use it myself. We both love it! It has a fairly sizable water tank. Between the two of us using it everyday, we refill the tank about every five days. Turn on the power button and it takes about 30 seconds to warm up to be ready to brew. A good feature when It's early and you're trying to head out the door.  If you're looking for a convenient, quick way to get a decent cup of espresso, latte, cappuccino etc. look no further. If you're stepping into this price range you get a great piece of machinery without breaking the bank.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I just bought it and took me a while too understand how use it but that it's the idea. Learn about how makes a good coffee takes time. It works good but it's not easy to understand. But ones you catch its perfect. I love it. My only complain is the weight. You need to hug the machine to don't let it felt when yo place the coffee. But I think is normal for machine that size.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I love this little espresso maker. It's perfect for a first timer like me. It was easy to learn how to use and easy to set up out of the box. Pros and Cons:Pros:Quick to heat upCan make one or two espressos at onceWand for milk frother is easy to cleanWand for milk frother can be used to heat OR foam milkComes with a removable drip tray with another underneath to accommodate larger mugsCompact enough for apartment kitchens & light enough to be moved to a cabinet daily if need beInstruction and quick set up guide is informative and comprehensive for daily use and/or troubleshootingCons:Comes with a crappy tamper--must buy a stainless one separatelyPortafilter won't attach if there's a bit too much coffee in the filter basket--must measure very preciselyThe buttons in the front are easy to mistakenly turn on when attaching the portafilterIncredibly loud and shakes a bit when brewing (nothing crazy but it's definitely not heavy enough to sit still on the counter fully)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: You are better off going to your local coffee shop for a latte then getting this machine.  Unless you do everything perfect or plan on buying the pods, it is very hard to make a double espresso and I was never able to do it. As others have stated, use 1.5 coffee scoops or the machine clogs.  It is easy cleanup but good luck descaling and getting the yellow light to stop blinking.  I have owned several DeLonghi appliances including an espresso maker and they were all excellent but this machine was a major disappointment.  I would not recommend it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Reviewer Name: Holistic Nutritionist at EverChange, LLC - https://bit.ly/2UwjVtk
Review Title: Delicious - I make better espresso than coffee shops now.
Review Description: I learned the secrets to making a perfect espresso from a local coffee shop owner, so I was spoiled.  I loved to try espresso at new local coffee shops as comparison, but there were too many variations in taste and crema.  Too many served espresso that tasted sweet and fruity, burnt, or lacked a nice crema.  Plus, the cost of espresso has increased a lot over the past two years.  I researched affordable at-home machines and hoped I picked a winner, and I did!  I found a local coffee roaster whose espresso did not taste fruity and bought 1/2 pound of its espresso roast.  I also bought its decaf beans.  After two tries with my new espresso machine, and a couple of tweaks with my hand grinder, I was able to make such a delicious espresso that was how I loved the taste and the creaminess of the crema.  The best part is that I am in control of the caffeine content.  I don't have to wonder if the coffee shop will serve a larger than usual espresso that will zing me for the rest of the day.  And I don't have the disappointment of a poor tasting espresso, thinking, "maybe tomorrow it will taste better," depending on the barista.  The machine makes the decaf version just as well.  Although it seems like a lot of prep and post work (two minutes to grind the beans using a hand grinder & a quick clean up/rinsing of equipment), it is so worth it.  I pass by my variety of coffee shops and say 'bye'! because this machine is great!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: My Capreso was cheaper lasted me 5 years and made awesome lattes and cappuccinos
Review Description: I only had the espresso machine for a month and it already needed to be descaled, I do not use tap water and we do not have hard water here. It wants to program it, which is ridiculous I am only making lattes and cappuccinos. My Capreso was cheaper lasted me 5 years and made awesome lattes and cappuccinos. This machine was more expensive not logical to operate and makes the same lattes and cappuccinos. I will us it until it dies but will not get this brand again.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: So glad I bought this! Excellent machine!
Review Description: I absolutely love this machine. I was a bit concerned as there were quite a lot ‘meh’ reviews but I encountered none of the problems they described. It works amazing. The frothing thing is amazing, I actually did not expect this, but this is even more fun to me now than the espresso. It works with milk obviously, but I tried oat milk and even cashew milk. It foams everything! The espresso is amazing too though. I feel like I am in Rome or Paris every day!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I needed a small espresso machine that didn’t take up a lot of counter space.  This one is perfect! One down side is it doesn’t make my coffee hot enough for my personal preference,  even when adjusted to the highest temperature. Another is cleaning the grounds out of the cup.  I have been a barista and I’m accustomed to knocking the grounds out, but when I do that with this one, the whole cup falls out.  It’s not tight enough.  But I can deal with that.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Great espresso machine for beginners. You will almost always get it right! You will need to learn a trick or two to perfect your perfect cappuccino or espresso shot technique, but you will get there in no time. One of my favorite things about this machine is its size, so compact! Definitively recommend it. So sexy looking too!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Not as good as I expected based on the other reviews
Review Description: If you like true espresso (very strong, nice crema) this will disappoint. The pressurized baskets are a joke. If you grind your beans fine enough for a true espresso, the basket clogs up and you get very little or nothing. This forces you to use a course grind which, of course,  means weaker espresso.  Even the double basket doesn't hold enough grounds. The steams part works fine however, easy to make a weak cappuccino if you are into that. It's also nice and small. I've ordered a non-pressurized basket. Hopefully that will help.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Love it! Read the Manual; Follow Instructions!
Review Description: Very happy with our new espresso machine! We used the older model (EC680M) during our stay in Germany and this model (EC685M) is not that different at all. Very satisfied with the results! Love being able to brew straight into a larger 5-inch tall cup/mug with the new drip tray design. The slim design is perfect for our small kitchen in a studio apartment. Also used it with Illy's ESE pods. Make sure you use the correct filter with the ESE pods. Loved how easy it was to brew with the pods but not worth the money, but that's just me. Highly recommend to read through the manual before using.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Love,love,love this espresso machine!So sleek- looks great on my counter. Very versatile also. Works like a charm.If coffee doesn’t seem hot enough for you, you can run a cup of water thru it without coffee; the water will warm up your cup . Then make your espresso.I like to drink Americano so I reset the amount of water by holding down the start button (rather than just pressing it for a second). This resets amount of water for future cups.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This machine is great! Looks great and makes fantastic coffee! Well, actually I make the coffee with a little help of the machine! Soooo I guess, I make great coffee!!  In reference to the machine itself, after reading the other reviews, keep it clean!! After brewing, steaming, or whatever you plan to do with it, rinse, wash, & dry the damn parts! It’ll also prevent from any nasty mold or assorted things from growing and eventually getting you sick. So keep it clean people!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Great espresso, easy to use, a few minor quirks
Review Description: Solid product so far. The espresso is great for those of us who don't like to fuss too much with perfect grind, perfect tamp, etc. Put your grounds in, tamp them a bit, load the portafilter, and push the button. Comes out great every time.I'm giving it four stars because the milk frother is a little underwhelming. Actually it froths fine (the "hot milk" position is perfect for lattes, nice and velvety without too much foam) but takes a little while. The manual says not to froth for more than 60 seconds, and the machine shuts the steam off after that. But it's not long enough, at least when you're frothing milk for two lattes. So I switch the frother off, wait a few seconds, and switch it back on to finish. No big deal and seems to work fine. I am just hoping this is not stressing out the machine in any way.I really like the water tank, very easy to remove, fill, re-attach, etc. Cleaning the unit is easy and straightforward as well.A couple of minor notes1, the cup warmer is barely warm at all. This is not an issue for me, but if that's an important feature for you, it might be a consideration.2-there's a little disc at the bottom of the brew basket that is a bit tricky to remove for rinsing/cleaning. It has a little tab on the edge to grab, but I sure can't get it with my fingers. I have to use small needle-nose pliers to grab and pop it out. Sort of a strange design choice, but again not a big deal.I'm not usually focused much on how an appliance looks, but gotta say this one looks quite nice on our counter.Great machine for those of us who enjoy good espresso but don't want to have to devote hours to learning the barista arts. Have only had it for a few weeks, but happy with it so far.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Stay away from this seller (Lifestyle by Focus )
Review Description: I bought this machine and in less than 3 months it stopped working. I contacted the seller and their response was "Our returns policy allows for return authorizations to be approved within 30 days after the delivery date of an order. Unfortunately, because the return window has elapsed for this purchase, our system will no longer allow a return authorization."Lifestyle by Focus didn't even care to help with communication with the manufacture. What a waste of $300.I know I will never buy anything from them again.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I've been using DeLonghi's for 20 years with no issues so I was surprised when this unit failed after just one month.  When heating up, and especially when brewing a cup of coffee, water comes out of the frother; drips when heating up and a small but steady stream when brewing.  This affects the pressure at and amount of water used at the brew cup.  Made 3 or 4 cups a day and used the frother less than 10 times.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Amazing performer at the size and super RV "friendly"!
Review Description: I have been looking for quite awhile now for a serious espresso machine that could both perform at a high level and yet slim enough to efficiently sit on a counter in my RV.  We all know how precious counter space is on an RV.  Well my search is OVER!  This espresso machine is so perfectly compact, cleans easily and most importantly makes a great espresso!  My home barista station consists of a Rancilio Silvia and Rancilio Rocky grinder, etc... so I feel I'm somewhat picky and qualified to assess this machines performance.  Again it is so perfect for an RV or trailer.  I put it through a 2 week test and it worked flawlessly.  I used both freshly espresso ground and "pre-ground" coffee too.  Seriously impressed.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: For what it is, this thing rocks. It does have some weird personality to it, as you'll read in other reviews, but understand what it is. It's not a full sized esspresso maker worthy of coffee shop utility. It does have some limitations, but if you have a small space, or just don't want to sacrifice kitchen real estate, this is about as high quality as you can ask. It'll easily serve 2 people at a time, it's just not made for heavy usage all day long. If you only have 1 or 2 espresso drinkers in the house, and have limited counter space, I would def recommend this little guy. The ONE feature it lacks that would have made it a true small space maker, is the ability to swap the frother to either side. It's stuck on the right side.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this espresso machine 1 week ago, it finally arrived today. Its really pretty, but the pump does not work, no water was pumped from the water container to the porta-filter, and no water was pumped to the steam wand as well. Very disappointed. I paid over $400 for a defect machine...I have to send it back.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Excellent at first, but broke after 2 years of moderate use - no warrantee or product support
Review Description: Although this machine worked beautifully for over a year, and was easy to use, it ultimately broke after two years of moderate use. (Water leaks out of the basket that holds the espresso pump.) The 1-year warrantee offered by the manufacturer had expired, as had the two years of product support offered by Amazon had expired. It is now, effectively, an expensive piece of junk. There are no Delonghi service centers in my entire state, so my only options are fixing the machine myself or throwing it away.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Not even two years old and...
Review Description: The machine - ec685m - made passable expresso and froth; we aren't coffee aficionados. It, not infrequently, would not froth following an expresso ( ?over-heating?); however, it worked okay up until recently when it began with the oft reported leaking boiler gasket - the gasket between the main body of the machine and the portafilter. Have done searches on-line to see if one could even order such gasket and it doesn't look like it can even be ordered.  Packaging it up and sending it somewhere to be charged a repair fee is a no-go.  Turns out to be an expensive machine for a limited lifespan.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I enjoy a good mocha latte or hot chocolate from a coffee shop but I'm not one to drop $4+ on a beverage very often. I love my DeLonghi EC685M I purchased through Coffee Appliances. It was used like-new condition, in original box—paid $169 (retail is up to $329.95).I bought it to make mocha lattes but use it year-round and make my version of a mocha frappucino in the summer. My 27-year old daughter prefers hot cocoa and it allows me to make her a decadent cup using the steamer/frother. I will never go back to those cans of powder that you just add water to.It's sleek, doesn't take up much room, beautiful on my counter, eco-friendly, easy to use & great flavor. After researching many different options (and returning a few) using this machine brings me joy—especially during the coronavirus pandemic & these otherwise tumultuous times.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Frother works great, my Illy dark roast espresso comes out beautiful with a nice crema.  Too bad the machine is so complicated to use with all the flashing lights, or I would have given it a 5 * rating. Easy to clean.  I wish they had marked the plastic numbers on the plastic parts for health reasons.  The instructions don't make it easier, sigh)  I'm so glad I have a water softener and reverse osmosis so I never have to worry about descaling any of my appliances!  (Living in Arizona it's a necessity, not a luxury with our horrible water)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I should've received an owners manual and a water hardness test in the box which I didn't. I had to Google the manual and print the whole thing myself. As much as I paid I felt I should've at least received a manual. Hopefully I will get the hang of it but my old Krupps machine was much easier.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Love that I can quickly make multiple lattes for me ...
Review Description: Simple and solid.  Love that I can quickly make multiple lattes for me and the family.  Took a couple of tries to figure out how fine to grind the coffee beans.  Too fine and no water comes through.  Be sure to make ALL the espresso shots before moving on to steam the milk, otherwise you will have to wait until the steamer cools off to make another espresso shot.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Leaks water in less than one year
Review Description: This machine started leaking water, which is common if you search the internet for people trying to fix it.  Also, if you buy from Amazon and the seller is not DeLonghi, then you have NO WARRANTY, in other words DeLonghi will not fix your machine.  So either buy from DeLonghi to get your 12 month warranty, or purchase the Amazon extended warranty.  I am stuck trying to find parts and fix this machine myself now.  Fun!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Easy to use and clean.  Instructions a little intimidating at first but made sense after a read through or two.  Makes a great espresso.  I don’t do any of the frothed milk/cappuccino options but family uses this feature and have no complaints.  A little more expensive option than I have ran before but seems worth the spend so far.  About 90 days into ownership.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Easy to use, stylish and make good espresso
Review Description: I truly recommend this machine, there's a lot of machines in the market and for me personally was very hard to choose one, after seeing a lot of videos and reading a lot of reviews I decided to buy the Dedica and am very happy with my purchase, I had no previous experience using any kind of espresso machine, and this is really easy to use, the coffee tastes very good, the milk frother does the job with more experience I'm sure that I will accomplish Arte Latte.I bought the open box option for a lower price and it's in perfect condition looks brand new.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Frother for Cappuccino stopped working after 8 months. I tried everything in troubleshooting...3 times. Horrible customer support from De'Longhi.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: After hand washing for a year, I tried dishwasher once since I didn't see any warning in the manual. Then as you can see in other reviews, the filter holder becomes a pure aluminum dull looking piece of metal+plastic. I'm so surprised DeLonghi is so cheap to design this holder like that. Very bad experience. I suggest look for other brand regardless how good review this has. Most reviews are just done right after the purchase without really using for a certain period of time.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Some of the best home brewed I've ever made.
Review Description: This thing is so easy to use with the pressurized basket-I get a nice creme off Folger Classic Roast; wow. Not nearly as easy cleanup as a non-pressurized, but its way more simple for those mornings you don't have time to fuss for a nice shot for your morning coffee drink. Maybe not a coffee connoisseur's dream machine but it is for this coffee lover-I like its ascetics, footprint, features, and best of all the brew.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I did a lot of research for an espresso machine that would accept pods and grounds. This one seemed to fill the bill. So far so good. A little bit of a learning curve for sure. The on off button sticks so I will keep my eye on that.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Wish I'm not 90 and handicapped cause I love this coffee maker.
Review Description: It is absolutely beautiful and I love it.  I bought it for home use.  I drink only one cup/day and my wife has her own old coffee pot.  After I opened the box I read the manual and returned it unused.  I'm 90 and it just looked too complicated.  Wish I am younger.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Purchased eight months ago and never had a problem except when I used pre-ground espresso, which was too fine. Aesthetic and reliable. I had a cheap plastic DeLonghi for years and years, so I expect this one to be very durable too! Feels luxurious every morning—so glad I treated myself.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: As a former coffee shop owner, I wanted a simple espresso machine for my home that wasn't freakishly massive and expensive. After all, I went from serving hundreds of people to only the two adults in my household. I didn't need something wild and extravagant. This machine so far has been working perfectly. Times for pouring and steaming are definitely manageable. I love being able to change settings on it if/when I need to. So far, I haven't had to mess around with them yet. This is a very lovely product that gets used up to 4 times a day and is easy to clean and maintain. Very happy with it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is the worst expresso machine I have ever bought. It's flimsy, all aluminum and plastic, the pump can hardly push the water through the coffee (note that I did grind the beans for expresso), it needs to cool down after a double expresso or frosting milk for one cappuccino cup. I am totally disappointed, and would have send it back, if I had not missed the return date. I certainly would not recommend isn to anybody....IU am sorry I did not buy a Breville, of whichI have one at our residence. I did get the De'Longhi for our vacation home and wanted a smaller foot print machine....bad choice for sure.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This machine is a great Expresso Machine.  It’s well made, easy to setup, easy to use and makes a great cup of Expresso.  The “settings” sounds a little confusing but if you take a moment and a deep breath they are really straight forward... All in all, a really great machine, especially for the price point!!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: It looks nice. That's about it
Review Description: It looks nice. That's about it. First, it's almost impossible to insert the and lock the filter/holder.  I've been playing with it for a couple of weeks thinking it would loosen up, but no.  Also, it has never, not once, produced froth.  It boils the milk and makes for a watery cup of espresso..  I threw out the box so I don't know if I can return it. I'm very disappointed because it was one of Amazon's recommended products and I trusted their advice. Please let me return it, Amazon!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Item looks used, although bought as new.  Instructions missing...
Review Description: There was scratches in the bottom chrome plate, and oil/dirt from past usage.  Not sure if this was a result of in house testing or I was sold a used machine for new price.  The missing instructions has me thinking it may be used...

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Good for 9 months, then it leaks from the top.
Review Description: Purchased this machine and used daily by one user. Well cared for, like I babied the machine! Puts out pretty good espresso. Great little wand for warming milks and such.Then, 8 months later.... the dripping and leaking began. And now suddenly I have failing machine and no coffee in the morning!! For the cost, I certainly expect the machine to last for a few years. My expectation was five. But this machine has not even lasted a year. Sad.Now Im wishing I got that other one with the nearly flawless reputation.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I was really looking forward to receiving this espresso maker. I have always purchased DeLonghi brand machines and they had never down. However, this “new” machine was used. The steam wand had some film on it (old milk?). Also, there was a small dent in the front and missing paint! I included a picture. This is a terrible disappointment.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Great latte, espresso, etc.  I think the people who had problems with the reliability of this device might be lacking in basic mechanical common sense.  A few times it has detected that the hole is plugged by a coffee ground and I had to use a pin to clear it.  I've had no other problems.  I've descaled 3 times.  I've been running it several times a day, every day, for 4 months and ~500 double shots, still going great.  I have a small kitchen and this is perfect for me.Update Dec 31, 2021:  3 years later, I've made 3 double lattes per day.  Still no problems.  Saved me $15000 at Starbucks.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Worst designed espresso maker in the history of mankind
Review Description: I don't usually take time to write a negative review, but in this case I have to make an exception.  This is by far the most poorly designed appliance I have ever used.  The steam wand is so high above the counter level that you have to either hold the cup of milk the entire time youre steaming or build some kind of stand to support the cup will steaming and risk the cup spilling all over the counter..........FUN.  The coffee holder is so small that you can't put enough coffee in it to make a good single shot, much less a double shot.  And putting coffee arm on the machine is like a wrestling match.  If there is the slightest amount of excess coffee the coffee arm will not go on the machine.  Because the coffee receptacle is so small it takes at least two cycles to make enough espresso for a drink.  If that's not enough, the machine will not move from steaming to single shot to double shot mode without turning it off and starting from scratch.....MORE FUN.  I've had this thing for about 6 months and have used it maybe 10 times and it never gets easier.  I don't know if I have any option to return this thing at this point, but if not, its heading for the garbage (and it wasn't cheap).DON'T BUY THIS THING

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is the third one of these we bought - this one for my daughter.  Super easy to use.  I recommend getting the Breville coffee grinder with it.  We started using distilled water only and only have to run the cleaning fluid through it every 3-4 months now!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Machine not working properly after 2 years
Review Description: The machine stopped working properly after 2 year. Running water was not enough for even half a cup. Descaling performed regularly and not filter clog. Called De Longhi 3 times, back and forth with emails, expecting to get an option for a service but instead, because the machine is already out of warranty (1 year), I was offered a 20% discount for another  pricy ”disposable” machine? no thank you :-(

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: After two years with this machine, I hate it. It makes good coffer but it is weak and now  the arm and espresso shoot off while it is brewing. Total nightmare. I recommend against this machine. It has the fatal false of having a menu but no screen. You have to push the buttons in a certain sequence to get things to happen.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I used it IMMEDIATELY after receiving & washing it. Sleek look, fast working, super easy clean up!!!! I highly recommend and the price I bought it for well worth it!!!!!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: After being in Portugal for several weeks, I completely changed how I drink my coffee.  I wanted to try espresso at home.  I don't have a lot of counter space, nor did I want to shell out a thousand dollars for a deluxe machine.  This machine is easy to use, affordable, and takes up minimal counter space.  It has a one or two cup option.  Very happy with this model.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: great espresso for a reasonable priced appliance
Review Description: Without a doubt the best homemade cup of espresso I've ever had and makes it up fast too. The milk frothing will take some getting used to as with any new machine, not to unusual to expect this to happen. Company does good job with You tube videos here to help the consumer. The flavor is comparable to the large Italian commercial machines that over $1000! Highly recommend this to others that are espresso lovers as I am.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Pretty disappointed in this purchase. It makes decent espresso, but can’t produce much crema and the double shot pulls more like a tall black. I have had zero luck with the milk foamer. It keeps producing very watery foam.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I had a similar delonghi espresso machine for years, but it finally gave out.  This one is terrific.  Biggest selling point is the automatic controls which are much easier to use and very convenient.Downside: espresso doesn’t come out as foamy as with my old delonghi machine, plus the cup for grounds is much simpler in that you don’t have to unscrew it, which means the grounds can’t be popped out, but have to be scooped out every time.  It’s a small price to pay, though.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: We had a larger espresso machine that was good but cumbersome and hard to clean.  This machine is smaller, makes better coffee and simple to clean.  Takes up no space.  WE LOVE IT!!!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The design is slim and doesn't take up a lot of space on the counter. There are a few things to get familiar with such as the on/off button sometimes doesn't seem to turn the machine off but I think it's because the machine "sleeps" when left on for a period of time, all it takes is pushing one of the pour buttons to activate the machine again.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Nearly perfect new design, the only flaw is that it's very hard to measure how much coffee to use for each time.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Just so easy to use and doesn’t take my entire counter. Perfect for this cappuccino a day gal. The pump went out in my last one after 3-4 years, but for the price I just replaced it and didn’t try to troubleshoot.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Little or no crema, more like brewed coffee than espresso.
Review Description: Returned. This failed to make a decent cup of espresso, more like brewed coffee.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Four to five shots a day and still going strong after 20 months of use.
Review Description: Makes great tasting espresso. I have hard water so descaling is a must. The manual is not very helpful for that and I had to find a Youtube video that helped me resuscitate the machine after I thought it was dead. It's back now!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Not built to last very long. Poor quality construction.
Review Description: Inconsistent noise & water pressure. Sometimes this machine vibrates so much that the glass (LeLonghi) receptacle that I used to catch the Espresso stream moves off center and wastes much of the Espresso shot. It also rarely creates any Crema (or foam) on top of the Espresso shot. I have a 25-year-old broken Espresso machine that still works much better than this new LeLonghi machine. The water stops streaming long before the water tank is actually empty, so you can never really empty the tank unless you dump it out. All very frustrating and certainly leaves you yearning for a better solution.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: No more Starbucks.  Pays for itself.
Review Description: Worth the money, brews easily but go to YouTube for video on how to use.  I had a cheaper model of DeLonghi that lasted for years but I screwed it up.  Expect to have this one for years.  Use the descale solution.  Starbucks hooey!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Update:This is the best purchase I made in years. I love it so much and can’t imagine my lifeblood without it. It needs sometime to learn to do better coffee with it.. but that’s the beauty of it. I love picking and grinding my coffee beans and adjusting the thickness and bitterness of my espresso and this machine allows for this. Love love love it! (Btw, ordered a new filter and it works perfectly)Original reviewI received this missing the single shot filter. I’m trying to call delonghi’s customer service but they’re not replying!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: ... DeLonghi Dedica for weeks now and it's really been wonderful. It takes a little getting used to managing ...
Review Description: I've been using my DeLonghi Dedica for weeks now and it's really been wonderful.  It takes a little getting used to managing the temperature, I find that if I wait too long or do things out of order I have to let off some steam to cool it off. Other than that it's been a great device.The instructions are clear, and I find that I get several days worth of drinks for my wife and I out of a single tank of water, so the tank size isn't anything to worry about.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Made great Expresso for about six months, then power took a dive and it quit working. Tried ever cleaning tip I could find. Expensive product that doesn't last.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Makes good coffee provided you use good quality coffee or grind your own coffee beans.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Hot water and steam regulator is not precise.Trying to get steam, the milk mix with hot water. Takes much more than a minute to be ready. No more De’Longhi for me.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: This espresso machine makes delicious espresso and wonderful steamed milk for lattés.
Review Description: I had never used an espresso machine before, but this one had clear instructions, so it was easy to learn to make delicious espresso drinks. It is louder than expected, but the noise doesn’t last long. The machine is easy to clean and maintain. I used to go to a coffee shop every day, but now I’m happy stay home and experiment making different hot drinks. A great gift from my husband (following my advice).

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Leaked after a few uses around the portafilter. Also overheated way too easily.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I got this a month ago.  It replaces a Breville that died after 4 years.  The Delonghi is perfect.  Makes much better espresso and foam than the Breville. Even better than super expensive automatic ones in cruise ship lounges. Easy to use and clean.  I also like the filter set up. Looks like it might not get clogged. It is small, which is great since it won't take up a lot of counter space. Of course that makes it a little light so you may have to hold it with one hand when you take the used coffee off. Now, the big test will be how long it lasts

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This machine produces as good a cup of espresso that I have had in any fine dining restaurant or cafe.  A bargain at $300.......

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Good looks. Small footprint. Works well. Controls/procedures not clear just looking at the machine, so for things you don't do often, you'll likely have to refer back to the manual.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Good coffee but awkward multiple cups
Review Description: Coffee tastes great. However, the machine does not easily transition from making coffee to steaming milk and moving to another cup.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Makes and excellent espresso or latte!
Review Description: Its a really nice space saving, quality espresso maker.  We are very much enjoying it now that we have figured it out.  Took several times reading the directions on how to calibrate for your personal preferences which is why it looses one star to a 4 star rating.  We have had it for a month- and now quite used to it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: We've had it for about 10 days and used it 4 or 5 times.  It's easy to use, program, and clean.  The coffee is very good.  The milk steaming/foaming functions work very well.  We like the small profile on our kitchen counter and the machine is good looking too.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Wanted something that didn't take up too much counter space, looked good, and didn't have too many bells and whistles but had the basic functions to make good coffee, expresso, cappuccino, etc. and have a real working milk frother for my husband. Frother works amazing with almond milk too for my tumeric lattes! Small learning curve for this machine but very happy with this purchase.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This worked for espresso very well for 3 months. The steamer for milk never worked. Now the espresso maker doesn't even work for espresso. I have tried to clean it according to the instructions and I have watched the video instructions. It simply does not work. I want to return this expensive piece of junk!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is as good as it gets without getting into machines in the thousand dollar range.  I love it  and it's beautiful

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: First cup of coffee, excellent machine
Review Description: Received my machine today, primed it and made my first espresso and latte, better than store bought latte, espresso rich in crema and full of tasteMachine is excellent after I tried 4 othersWorth the money definitelyI also bought extended coverage just in casePlan to update my review in a month

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Struggles to push water through the coffee
Review Description: If you even slightly pack down the coffee this thing struggles.  I was expecting more.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Works as claimed and makes good hot coffee.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The dedica machine is very easy to operate and to clean. Highly recommend it for anyone who enjoys a good cup of espresso coffe or cappuccino lovers like me.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This arrived today, fast shipping, plugged it in and away it went, nice hot espresso . A nice replacement for the very basic Delonghi model I have used for 3 and a half years until burning out the pump running it dry (my fault) the automatic cutoff a real bonus on this model.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Broke 2ce in less than a year.  They took 2 + months to fix it the first time and ininkyngotnit back agate multiple calls. Terrible customer service. Not helpful. Broke again 1 month after getting it back from repair shop. It came back from repair smelling like an ashtray.When it worked it was great. But terrible reliability for the price.And we kept it in excellent condition. It still looks brand new but just doesn’t make any coffee.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Dobt but from Coffee Appliance! I bought Delica Delonghi 685 from them via Amazon gor $179.99, and it stopped working after 6 months use. They said they no longer carry the product, meaning , I have to throw this expensive refurbished item away . It was an expensive item compared to a brand new one , costs more but much longer.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Best one I had so far.
Review Description: Love this machine! We tripled our coffee intake because of it:)Gives nice crema.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this for my fiancé’s birthday. It took me a few hours of trial and error but now that I can make a latte it is easy and tastes great

Gives one or two “good shots” then spits and sputters until I clean again. Not hard water or my last machine wouldn’t have lasted 8 years. Don’t buy this machine if ease of use and quality of shots matter to you.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Fast and easy if you follow intstructions
Review Description: Love how easy it is to use this to produce great tasting espresso and cappuccino. I patiently went through all the set up steps, and it's been working like a dream for almost two months now. I can pull a shot or two of espresso with one to two minutes of warm up, and I can do shot after shot in rapid succession. The steamer produces smooth, steamy foam for cappuccino in about 30 seconds., and makes great dense steamed milk for lattes or steamed milk concoctions. I know a few reviewers reported that their machines gave out after a few months, so I am crossing my fingers, as this is one of the few machines that will fit in my little kitchen.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Depending upon Price, either in the sweet spot or no-man’s land, best with a non-pressurized filter
Review Description: 6 month update- 7July19:Have not experienced any reliability issues, performs as it did new.  Descaled once and it was a very easy process.  Excellent machine and makes great espresso when used with non-pressurized filter.Depending upon Price, either in the sweet spot or no-man’s land, best with a non-pressurized filterSo what do I mean?  There are essentially three options if you want your espresso in a minute (i.e. Thermoblock/Thermocoil)- in the low-to-mid $100’s is a Nespresso, in the $500 to $600 range is the Breville Barista Express or Infuser (darlings of the sub-$1000 category), in between is the Delonghi Dedica.A Nespresso is quick and easy but- requires a separate frother, has limited flexibility and very expensive capsules.Delonghi Dedica, can be almost as quick and easy using the E.S.E pods (essentially a giant tea bag with coffee) at half the price of a nespresso capsules.  You have the flexibility of using fresh ground coffee with the included pressurized filters and of course a built-in steam frother.Breville machines have the ability to pull professional shots with the included non-pressurized filters and includes a pre-infusion stage (a pre-stage that infuses coffee grinds with low pressure hot water immediately before the extraction phase)- these are considered the 2 biggest features that enable a high quality espresso.  There are a few other features- thermocoil which is bit more robust than Dedica’s thermoclock and can improve heat consistency, a pressure gauge and PID (digital thermometer).How the Dedica compares to the Breville.  Well you can get a non-pressurized filter for $6, it’s not made by Delonghi but is the Mr. Coffee 4101 (or equivalent), and in addition even though Delonghi doesn’t advertise it, the Dedica also pre-infuses.  If you have the Dedica this is what happens in the 5 second phase when the pump starts for a couple of seconds and then pauses for a few seconds before the pumps starts up again.  Use of the non-pressurized filter is vital to improve the espresso significantly and generates a true crema.  The Breville’s thermocoil is better but not vital, same with the pressure gauge which is cool but not vital.  The PID is definitely a worthwhile feature.  These three are worthwhile but at what cost.If you have to pay the $349 list price for the Dedica then the price difference for the Infuser is only $150, even less if you can find the Infuser discounted.  At $150 or less, the added features of the Breville are worth the price.  In addition, the $200 increase over a Nespresso might not make sense, thus the Dedica is in no-man’s land.  If you can get a good discount on the Dedica to the point where it is more than $200 less than the Breville, then the added features of the may not be justified.  A discounted price for the Dedica is a  small enough difference compared to a Nespresso and may make more sense.  Hence, a sizably discounted price put’s the Dedica in the sweet spot.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Why did you change the basket Delonghi???
Review Description: I bought this machine from bestbuy. I’ve owned the ec155 and ecp3420. I really liked those machines. I do like the compact size of the dedica, (I use it for traveling quite often) the cup warmer is ok, I usually warm my cup with hot water though. I do not carry a grinder with me so I’m stuck using pre ground coffee. (BTW this machine fits perfect in a Timbuk2 bag) I’ve only owned this machine for 3 weeks, my main and only real complaint is the filter basket. Why delonghi had to change it from the double wall they made before is beyond me. The new basket has a rubber ring inside, it can be removed for cleaning with the bottom of the basket where the holes are. This is the worst design I’ve ever seen. I have looked for there older design baskets new or used with no luck. I did buy a bottomless portafilter for when I’m at home (I use beans when I’m at home) but with pre ground coffee it’s not good, so I reply on the pressurized basket for that. Crema is lacking. And yes I bought a tamp/leveler. Because of the new basket design this will be my last delonghi espresso machine. Already looking at other brands for my future purchase when the time comes.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The machine is reliable. I've seen the bad reviews. I've never had issues. Two double shots of ok espresso almost every day for 7 yearsIve owned this machine for 7 years, arguably the first generation. I recall when the msrp was $600, bonkers..  I was a bachelor with a tiny studio apartment and I wanted something with style. It did appear in GQ magazine so style wise it was a hit.Never did make a great espresso. Not even good, it's just okay stuff. You get 3 temperature ranges, and two shot sizes. The rest is up to you/us. I played with different waters, water temp, beans, grinds. It's just ok. I can think of a hand full of times when the stars aligned.Didn't think it was worth upgrading, good or great espresso is an expensive investment. My dad has a super automatic and some fancy grinder. 15min from grind to pull espresso. I don't think I have the patience.....

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: What to know after 2 years of use
