Review Description: I purchased this espresso maker off of eBay two years ago. (sorry Amamzon).  I am writing a review here because I feel it is important to let consumers know how a product performs over time as opposed to a new or recent purchase. The Delonghi Dedica espresso machine has been a great appliance that gets used daily for a household of two. Key features that attracted us were the small footprint that doesn't take up counter space and ease of use. We opted to have a semi automatic machine that did not use capsules. Reason being is we knew we would be using the machine regularly, and as such, the constant purchasing of capsules and that of disposing them ethically (we use as little plastic as possible) was not a decision that works for our lifestyle. Beside, the ritual of coffee making in the morning is a pleasant habit.This machine heats up fairly quickly and can produce decent espresso.  There are convenient buttons to press for either short or long shots. For us, the short option never gets used. What we've found over the years is that the amount of espresso produced on the long shot option has been reduced and the initial creaminess from when the machine was new is not there. It now just looks like concentrated coffee. The taste is still good, but then that 's due to buying quality coffee, not always the machine. Sometimes the button has to be hit a 2nd time in order to produce what should be the right amount for a long shot. We do clean our machine regularly and use filtered water, but like any small appliance that gets a lot of use, this little machine has worn with age. This minor issue doesn't alter the flavor of the end product. The frother has worked superbly since the beginning; a simple feature using the excess steam and a built in aerator making for nice cappuccinos and lattes.  WE paid around $200 two years ago, and feel the $$$ were well spent. The Delonghi Dedica  has been a good workhorse in the kitchen and when it finally bites the dust, we will be purchasing another one.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Well made powerhouse makes one great cappuccino & more!
Review Description: This deluxe cappuccino machine makes me feel like I have a coffee cafe right in my own home.  The entire unit has a nice narrow footprint so it take up very little width on my counter.  It sets up in a few easy to follow steps, included on the Start Up guide.  In no time you will be enjoying barista quality espresso drinks.  The milk frother is powerful, making it quick and easy to get your foam on!  You can make single or double shot espressos with the interchangeable attachments.  Just fill the rear dispenser with water, attach the desired size to your scoop and secure to the machine.  Three buttons give you the option to brew single, double or steam / water.  It takes a few attempts to get just the right mix of coffee to water strength, but I certainly didn't mind going through a few sample trials to get it just right.  It's a real hit at family gatherings or just to treat yourself on a lazy Sunday morning.  Enjoy this, it truly is superb.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Set up to First Espresso, 5 Minutes!
Review Description: I have had my share of coffee machine's and have always wanted an espresso machine, but the thought terrified me. It seemed complicated. But this Espresso machine was not intimidating at all. It was easy to set up and took only a matter of minutes. One thing I like about this machine when compared to other machines like Keurig and Nespresso is that you can use your own coffee. You can use your own coffee in the others, but this is a simpler way to do it. With that being said, this machine can be used with ground coffee AND coffee pods.This machine can make one or two beverages at a time. The water tank is easy to feel and attach (and detach). Three filters come with this machine, 1) 1 cup, 2) 2 cups, and 3) pods. When using coffee grounds (which is what I used), make sure you press the grounds into the filter. attach the filter and turn.The instruction manual gives instruction on how to prepare ground espresso, pods espresso, cappuccino, lattes and other hot drinks. You can select to steam hot milk with foam or no foam. This version of the machine does not come with a frothing cup. It does come with thee filters and descaler.The machine will signal when the boiler is too hot.The instruction manual details how to create drinks, cleaning and care instructions.It also has a few espresso recipes in the back. Be to register warranty.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Very good machine at a good price for espresso and cappuccino, in a slim footprint package
Review Description: I love cappuccino and drink at least 2 daily, but don't want to pay $5 for each. After a lot or research I decided on this machine which has the ability to produce good espresso coffee, and also the steam for steamed or foamed milk, separately.  Being able to control and access your steam is the secret to a great cappuccino.  I got this on special sale for about $170, though it retails a bit over $200 in most places. I use it daily, often several times.  Friends now stop in just for coffee!  I can brew directly into a standard height coffee mug, since I need the larger cup to add my foamed milk. I am able to make excellent espresso and foam my milk perfectly. It heats up for use in under a minute, so by the time I load the coffee into the filter, it is ready to brew.  It is super easy to operate, easy to clean, has an easy access water tank so you don't have to add water each time you use it.  You can buy a water filter to fit into the water tank, which is really nice. Every few months, you need to run a descale solution through the machine which is a process that takes a bit of time (about half an hour) but you don't have to be on top of it the whole time. You just tend it from time to time during the process.  I am extremely happy with this machine after four months of daily use.  It is a 15 bar pump machine, & does make a little noise with the pumps during operation, for those people who are interested in the noise of machines, but only during the brief operation and not so loud that to disturb anyone.  It is a bit taller than my old Krups, but the footprint isn't as big as many other espresso machines which was an important feature for me, having limited counter space.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This espresso machine makes a great beverages. It doesn't take long to get it set up. It can use either espresso pods or ground coffee. Getting great shots out of ground coffee takes a little more technique, but it's not too tricky with this machine. It seems to be pretty forgiving with the tamp.The setup doesn't take long. Once you get the hang of it, you can have a latte in less time than it takes to brew a pot of coffee in a drip maker. The machine isn't big, so don't plan to make lattes for all your friends without taking little breaks for the boiler to catch up.The steam wand works well. It can make some really nice foam. If you've never made foam before you might try watching an online video, it's not tricky, but the instructions that come with the machine might not explain the process well enough.Here's the thing. Clean up is a pain. Clean up is always a pain with any espresso machine, unless you get something like a Nespresso. You'll probably spend more time cleaning up the machine than enjoying your coffee. If that's something you can handle then this machine might be a good purchase for you. If you hate clean up, then you'll probably just let this machine sit and collect dust.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Coming from Nespresso this is the right machine for home use.
Review Description: I was hesitant, but after searching I found this is the right machine for home use.I only drink lattes, and after few weeks of use. Now I no longer purchase from outside.Actually I find that this machine deliver great delicious cups of latte.Nespresso lattissima plus, gave me a ready to drink latte.After I finish cleaning the machine, and sort everything back where it was.My latte is already warm to cold. It's annoying.With Delonghi dedica. You can steam the milk to a seriously hot temperaturethat you can't hold the cup, or drink it for a while.The issue with steaming, the machine can only deliver steam for about ~2 minutes max.Then, it will shut off automatically.You can just hit the "steam button", release steam to cool it down, then immediately hit "Steam button",then you can go back to steaming. It's all written in the manual on how to cool down the machine.~1.5 minutes is sufficient to steam a volume of 10 ounces of milk from fridge cold to a hot to touch temperature.Meaning, you can't steam milk for 2 large cups of lattes. You need to steam twice. Which is not a big deal.For now, this machine serve my needs.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Some advice on use  (good cappuccino, but...)
Review Description: I've owned this machine for a couple of years and discovered1) if the off/on switch seems broken and you cannot turn the machine on? Unplug it, plug it back in, and turn it back on. (It has tripped its circuit breaker and unplugging the machine resets it.)2) if making a single cup of cappuccino or several espressos  a) turn on machine and wait until lights stop blinking meanwhile filing the basket with coffee and bayonetting it onto the machine, b) put cup under basket and push button for desired amount of coffee, repeat brewing steps several times if you like several doses of espresso or strong cappuccino, c) after coffee is brewed, push steam button, wait for it to stop blinking, then open the valve to steam the milk .3) if making two or more cups a) turn on machine and wait until lights stop blinking, meanwhile filling the basket with coffee and bayonetting it onto the machine  b) push the steam button and wait until it stops blinking, c) open valve to steam the milk (I usually do two cups separately, about 3 oz milk each), closing valve after each, then c) re-open valve and bleed off steam pressure (light blinks 8 or 10 times), then d) put cup under basket and push button for desired amountIF YOU FOLLOW SUGGESTIONS 2 AND/OR 3, you will not need to start all over for each cup to get multiple cups.4) the machine is light and needs to be stabilized/held when bayonetting basket of coffee into it. If it is very hard to bayonet, you have too much coffee in the basket, brush a bit off and try again.  You should not need to tamp the coffee down much at all if you use a proper very, very fine grind, just level the top an tamp lightly5) the lights turn amber (suggesting descaling) after about 90 cups or so. A pain-in-the-neck task that takes at least 30 minutes, but--having lost use of two previous machines (from other companies) and discovering that they are next to impossible to repair at all economically--I now do this regularly when prompted.Can't say why people have had trouble with the machine breaking down after a few months. Perhaps a real problem with quality control at De'Longhi or perhaps not descaled often enough, or....?  . Anyway, mine's lasted several years with only moderate attention to descaling.If you are a real aficionado and require much flexibility for espresso temperature, extraction ration and the like: spend the money to get a fancier machine. This one suits me

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is my fourth machine spanning two decades. I’ve had two machines break very quickly, but both of my Delonghi machines have lasted. My previous machine broke at 3 years, but I did not rescale it often enough. This machine has lasted 4 months with no problems.Keep and read and reread the instructions. There are lots of hidden features by pressing specific button combinations. For example it has a whole process for descaling, and if you mess it up the yellow light doesn’t go away. Descaling also takes about 20-30 minutes. I do recommend buying any machine from a brick and mortar store so you can easily return it. In my experience if a machine breaks it breaks in under a month.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: I make great Cortados with it
Review Description: I have used the predecessor, the EC680M for 1.5 years daily without any problems. I make great Cortados with it. Couple things I learned:- Was glad I also bought the BlueSnail coffee tamper. Am able to compress the coffee nicely with it.- Never put the milk straight onto the frother unless you want watery milk. Use a glass and let water come out of the sprout for 2-3 seconds. Then rotate the dial slightly clockwise (facing down), exchange the glass for the milk container, then rotate the dial counter-clockwise and only steam will come out.- After each use wash the drip tray and filter with hot water and wipe the bottom of the machine (where the coffee touched it) with a wet cloth.- Unscrew the frother at least once per month and clean the inside of the frother and the plastic sprout, as shown in the manual.- Was surprised when a yellow light came on last month. Meant that I had to descale the unit. Had to buy liquid to do it.Would have given it 5 stars had I known that the container only fits, I believe, 16mg of coffee. So the coffee is weaker than produced with the larger  units that hold more coffee (18mg and possibly more).

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Product quality dropping. Prices over doubling.
Review Description: Buyer beware.  Their new products fail miserably.  Older espresso machine was great. Bought 2 as gifts after loving mine.Came time for new one.... New model EC680...... Kaboom!!!  Within a few months the power switch sticks or doesn't turn on. It's on spring button which is cheap.  Then today just about 7 months of use the flashing Amber light stays on even after descaling cycle and reset to defaults.Twice the money for cheap bad design.  I'll edit or take down this review when..... If..... They make it right with me.  Now shopping other brands.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this as a second espresso machine for a vacation home. Mistake. My primary machine is a LaPavoni manual machine and gives us great results. I purchased this because it had a small footprint and looked pretty good.  The first thing that happened was that the lid on the water tank fell off and one of the tabs broke off. Then I tried to make an espresso and the machine totally botched it...and I’m an experienced espresso maker. If this is your first machine then I would pass.  I wasted quite a bit of coffee trying to get this thing figured out. If I tamped the coffee just a little too much then the machine errored out.  It is simply too finicky for a first time espresso maker. I’m pretty disappointed in this thing and would certainly not recommend it for a first time user.  I felt pretty bad after packing it up and wanting to send it back so I completely unpacked it to give it another try. When I tried it again I had leakage around the group head and it errored out again even though I only tamped it very lightly. I don’t have time to screw around with this thing to try and make a cup of espresso.  Looking at another brand.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: My spouse and I have both worked in a place that served espresso drinks and so I was very excited to get my hands on one of these in my home. And this didn't disappoint.PROS: This is easy to use -I'm used to a twist on. Taste is great and just right for what you like (three sizes). The steam works well. (I don't use the warmer, but it's a cool perk.) Size is great - just small enough to fit on the counter easily. Water easy to fill. I was told by customer service that this comes with a 2 year warranty. Cheap to buy two more years as well (includes paper inside to mail away for it.)CONS: I wish this came with a cup for steaming. At this price point, which isn't small, you'd think you wouldn't have to. Also, why do we have to mail away for an extended warranty or registration? (You can't register this online since it was bought on Amazon. And you can't buy the extended warranty online or over the phone. You have to mail it away and wait 2-4 weeks for a response.) I do everything online but we can't with this brand. I'm not marking down for this, but it is odd.Overall, this is outstanding and I love having it!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Makes a good cup but the basket design is horrible.  Is almost impossible to get the used grounds out, especially without the inner filter coming out as well.  The filter basket quit draining a month ago after only a few months of having it, after contacting they sent me a new one which has now quit working again.  I called and they refuse to replace and say it is designed to have to be replaced every few months (mine lasted one), which is not mentioned ANYWHERE and they charge you $10 to replace.  Poor design, planned breakage, unsustainable, and expensive.  Buy another brand.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I want to say that this is the first espresso machine I have ever tried. For a novice-it was pretty easy to read the instructions and figure out how to work this machine. It makes a lot of noise but whips up a great espresso! Very simple once you get the hang of it! I like the slim design as it is easy to tuck away on my counter when not in use. Cleaning is a slight pain but with any type of gadget you are going to have crevices and parts to clean. I have used this often over the year and have not had any problems to gripe about. A well functioning machine- worth it if you love coffee and want to whip up some fancy drinks!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Duro un poco mas de un año
Review Description: La maquina trabajo bien por un año aproximadamente, cosa que no esperaba dado el valor de compra, luego comenzo a dar problemas, suerte que habiamos comprado garantia extendida, se hablo con servicio al cliente y luego de seguir las instrucciones que ellos nos dieron, no logramos hacerla funcionar, nos pidieron que se la re enviemos para ellos arreglarla, nos devolvieron el dinero ya que quienes la vendieron no pudieron arreglarla. Cabe mencionar que se preparaba unas tres tazas de cafe espresso por dia, o sea, era para uso del hogar, no negocio.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I am not a coffee drinker, but everyone in my family is. I seem to be the one to host most of our family parties and one thing everyone says they miss is a good cup of coffee with our dessert.  So I started researching to find one that would fulfill all their different likes and tastes!This unit seemed to fulfill all the requirements:1) ease of using pods2) ability to use their organic ground coffee3) ability to choose different amounts of coffee4) option to make expressos and other specialitiesI love the fact that it is easy to set up and doesn't take up much room on my counter top. It looks fancy, so it's a nice addition to our dessert table.  It can make one or two drinks at the same time. And the water tank is easy to fill.The package comes with a great instruction manual with details on setting up, using proper filters, and cleaning.  It also includes recipes for ground espresso, pods espresso, cappuccino, lattes and other hot drinks.Great coffee machine for my family's different choices of hot drinks!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Some adjustments but overall good espresso shots
Review Description: With a few adjustments, overall a very nice resulting espresso shot.The cons:1) the milk frother creates too much froth in a short amount of time. That means the milk never gets really hot. Maybe I'll try a bigger pitcher. Currently using 6 oz of milk in a 12 oz stainless steel pitcher.2) the instructions say 14 g of coffee for the 2 cup basket but even after tamping, it wouldn't fit on the machine. I had to remove some coffee for it to latch on.3) minor, but I found the basket somewhat clunky to remove from the holder. You kinda have to get under it and pull it out. There is no lever on the handle to keep the basket from falling out when removing grounds.I found that the two cup basket made a nice single shot of espresso. The customizable settings are really nice too.  Sleek design fits nicely on the counter. Happy with the purchase so far.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: I really appreciate the speed of this DeLonghi machine. ...
Review Description: I really appreciate the speed of this DeLonghi machine.  My dad finds it hard to stand for long periods due to back issues, and that had led to fewer days making the cappucinos he enjoys.  35 seconds is very doable!  DeLonghi is a brand I have repeatedly found to be trustworthy and long-lasting.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I don't like that this machine does not get hot enough, due to the lack in temperature, this machine pulls very sour shots, I could be as well that the pressure is no where near 9 bars. I don't think I can keep this machine, I have not had a decent shot of espresso.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: it makes a good espresso and froths the milk well
Review Description: This is the most unreliable machine ever. When it works, it makes a good espresso and froths the milk well. However, it overheats so easily and frequently that it is not worth the hassle. I usually have to interrupt my coffee making to allow the machine to cool off, before finishing, but by then my coffee is too cool. This machine is definitely NOT worth the money.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Sorry but it is simply hot satisfactory
Review Description: My machine failed straight out the box. The steam cutoff valve never functioned correctly and no matter what I did... the leaked steam and water always leaked out of the steamer tube. The volume of the leakage actually got worse with time as I tried to continue to use it, hoping the problem would eventually diminish. It did not. The problem was less bad with the one cup output than with 2 cup output  but still persisted. I'll get a refund and buy something else, there seem to be a very high fraction of discontent clients than I would expect if it is a generic problem, not my bad luck. The build quality seems generally not so great which could be the cause of my problem.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Not only is this super easy to use, even for beginners, it's easy to clean AND super fast. I had a cheap machine years ago that was such a pain to use and waaaay hard to clean that turned me off from trying espresso and espresso drinks at home for years. This brought me back.  It might be a big initial investment for a home machine but I can't recommend it enough if you've wanted to try your hand at espresso from home.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I actually love this machine. The coffee comes out tasting fantastic, it looks great, and it is very easy and intuitive to use. What I don't like about it is that it needed to be descaled two weeks after I first used it after only using it MAYBE, a dozen times.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is a great espresso coffee maker. It has simple intuitive controls and looks great on the counter top too. The adjustable steam nozzle allows you to adjust foaming to to the fat content of the milk to get nice consistency every time. At this price point I think a milk jug should have been included, so docking a star, but it does make great coffee and the detachable water tank and descaling filters will mean this will be making great coffee for many years.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Breaks in about 20 months but makes good espresso quickly and easily.
Review Description: Works well until it breaks . Owned two , each lasted about 20 months. Quickly made decent espresso but the lifespan of the leaching is short despite regular rescaling as per manufacturers recommendation.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Really happy about this expresso machine, we are using ese pods and coffee taste great , and we love how the Cappuccino come out.Quality expresso machine A+++++

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I read some bad reviews on this product but decided to go ahead and purchase for my wife.  So far so good.  The machine works as advertised.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: It’s nice for a few months
Review Description: Started using this at the end of February and it’s already crapped out. I’ve only used purified water and descaled it as soon as the light came on. As a former barista I can assure you this is not a good machine. Hard pass.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Works well for me. Very fast warmup time. It has adjustable temperature control which is a good idea. Relatively quite.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I have had for almost a year and it has done well. It makes great espresso, but only if you know what you are doing. Fresh beans are a MUST!! But buy cheap coffee to practice, play with it for a little, adjust the settings and you will soon be on your way.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Made great coffee, but inconsistent froth. Died after one year. Only used once daily and three times a day on weekends. Was finicky to figure out at first. Looked good, but should have lasted far longer. It replaced a machine that cost half as much and lasted five years.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Purchased at Sam’s Club on sale. Love it! Makes an amazing espresso, latte, or coffee. Frother works well. A few steps to learn but very easy and I’m happy to be using using ground coffee instead of pods.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Good quality, it takes small place on the counter, the pump is powerful,

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: How to solve the problem to used it
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   As the light, all the light are flashing and I reach the reason but no change so I cannot use it

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: ... really cheap parts probably not BPA free then you’ll like this machine otherwise your buying junk that only gives ...
Review Description: If your clueless to real espresso and want real crema without your hot water traveling thru pressurized baskets and plastic portafilters plastic water tubing and a plastic group-head and really cheap parts probably not BPA free then you’ll like this machine otherwise your buying junk that only gives Sub par espresso although some are fine with that I suggest spending a few hundred more and get urself s real espresso machine with quality real stainless steel and copper parts that will produce outstanding espresso for years!!!! In other words if u really love good espresso don’t be cheap!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This espresso machine works great and was easy to learn how to use. Simply follow the instructions and you will be able to make the perfect latte’s right at home. I would recommend buying the coffee tamper, the plastic one that’s on the end of the scoop isn’t great, it works, but isn’t great. I also bought the frothing pitcher which works great too. I love that this machine is smaller than some of the others but don’t let that make you think it isn’t as good. I am completely thrilled with it.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I love this little espresso machine. Perfect shots and quick. Looks very sophisticated and well built. Easy to set up and figure out. Compact footprint - won't take up too much counter space. I am very satisfied with this purchase (De'Longhi EC685M Dedica Deluxe Automatic Espresso Machine).It is a small machine. So, don't expect to make more than a few shots at a time. It does need to rest in between :-)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Works well, makes a niceespresso. The frother works, but doesn't give you a lot of control. I'd take a half star away for this, but rounded back up to 5 stars.I like the stainless steel finish. We have the enamel red EC680 in use at our 2nd home which I like a bit more.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: It's a pretty decent coffee machine for the price. They made several improvements over the previous model (EC680) that make cleaning up much easier. As an example, you can now get the filter out of the filter holder and remove obstructions with a needle. I'd recommend if you are on a budget and want decent expresso.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Great product and functionality for price.
Review Description: I purchased approximately 9 months ago. It's still in good use. I did purchase a non-pressurized double shot filter basket which I prefer to the one that comes standard. Overall easy to use easy to clean and great if you want a decent shot of espresso.  I am looking for ways to get a better milk froth as I struggle to get a velvety texture when frothing. That could be user error or a little underpowered.  Ultimately a good product and I've really enjoyed it. Part of my everyday morning routine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The box wasn't sealed, was very obviously opened, and it was missing the water hardness test strip. Everything else was intact and didn't look as though it had been used at all, so I didn't go through the return process. The machine itself works well so far.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I'm in love with it. Great espresso and cappuccino. There are some reviews saying it broke after a few months. I hope it will not be the case. I'll update my review if something happens.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: My husband loves this gift!  It makes perfect espresso.  It looks great on the counter, and is excellent quality.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Read the instructions if you have never used before
Review Description: This DeLonghi is a great expresso machine. Makes lattes, expresso and cappuccino perfectly 👌

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Fácil de utilizar

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Bought a refurbished machine and seems to work fine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I always thought De'Longhi was a good brand, but it is not. It is my second espresso maker that I got from them. The first one, a smaller version stop working after a year, I thought that maybe it was because I brew in average 4 espressos per day, and what I needed was a better machine, reason why I got the Dedica. A year after I purchased the DEdica, same issue again, the machine has no power to brew the espresso. The pump has loose all the strength and now espresso is under extracted, when selected double only few drops I get and I have to try four times to get some coffee. It is not the grind or amount of coffee because I've been using the same amount/ground size for over four months. And let's not talk about service for fixing the machine or to get asurion to cover the damage. No one did what promised with the first one, no way to contact de'longhi now. One star is too much!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The seal on the machine was damage and just leaked cold water around the portafilter

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I was so excited to get this machine!  And the espresso it brews can be pretty good... you just never know what you're going to get.The machine lacks pressure (which is a key part of making espresso!). If you tamp too hard, the water can't get through the beans, and you're left with an empty cup.  Single shot button & double shot button produce the same amount of liquid.  The machine will shut itself off after about 3 minutes - don't take too long while grinding them beans.  And the milk steamer - it goes out after about 5 seconds.  You can shut it off, wait, and then restart.I had such high hopes for this machine!  Overall, it has been a big disappointment.  It's not exactly a cheap machine, I would expect better than this from DeLonghi.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The espresso machine sent had obviously been used. It was dirty and all components were loose in the box. Yes, it had a discounted price, but did not say it had been used. VERY POOR quality management.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Not as easy to use than the cheapest DeLonghi EC155
Review Description: I used DeLonghi EC685R after years of owning $70 also 15-bars expresso, cappuccino and latte EC155 DeLonghi coffee maker (the cheapest). The mid-range priced semiautomatic manual EC685 maker definitely is not as user-friendly and intuitive to use in comparison. Most of the major parts like the filter carrier and the filters are more difficult to use and clean, since the filter holder doesn't have the better & easy to use EC155 design.The usage of frothier for steaming milk is not as user-friendly and frequently the process leads to forming extra bubbles and over-spilling, not as straight forward as DeLonghi EC155, which is 2-times cheaper than this used discounted model I got. Given the retail price of above $300 it is just not worth.One can easily end up with not enough steamed milk, confusingly following the not user-friendly DeLonghi guide/manual and ending up with not good, frequently over-burned coffee. Also frequently the operation leads to over-boiled water and not allowing to proceed further making coffee unless you turn the machine off and wait to cool down. Even when using one of the best coffee grinder beans sold on the market today, the coffee made is of questionable quality for the price of this makerover $300 .The only thing we like about this more expensive latest model DeLonghi EC685R coffee maker is its compact look and red color as an lovely accent in our kitchen. I struggled to give this machine more than 3-stars. Since still have a hope that operating this machine longer will be able to achieve a bit better prep of our cappuccino, or latte.  Overall we spent quite an unnecessary long time to figure out how to prep our first disappointing morning two cup of coffee, even if we're experienced long-term users of previous DeLonghi coffee maker.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Title: Best espresso machine I have owned
Review Description: Over the years, I've owned a few lesser espresso machines. I've never been impressed with them, though, and have typically leaned towards just using a french press for my morning cup of pleasure. I decided to give a new espresso machine the benefit of the doubt, to see if that would resolve my past "bleh" view of home espresso. And sure enough, this machine changed my mind. First, this machine is well made. Lots of metal. Heavy, too. Not a light 99% plastic model. Next, this heats up fast. From power on to time to brew, it may be 30 seconds. I have to have a bad cup from this machine. Granted, half of that is using a quality fresh ground bean. But the other half certainly is the pressure and temperature of the water. If you want a quality machine that produces quality espresso, look no further. Order this machine and enjoy it for years.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This machine appears on paper to have some really good features for a mid priced machine. sadly what it doesn't do is make good coffee.  This machine cannot produce any crema. the only way to get crema is to use a coarser grind and don't tamp it much. This method gives you a tiny bit of crema, but disappears rather quickly.  I'm not a coffee or espresso novice, i roast my own beans, i have used many machines, cheap and expensive. and i have concluded that this units pressurized portafilter is the reason it sucks. it is incapable of producing any significant amount of crema. This unit however is beautiful and small which was what i needed for the space i was buying for, but wow was this ever a disappointment in regards to performance and coffee quality. if you drink coffee mainly from keurigs and donut shops, then this will work for you. but for anyone else who takes their coffee a little more seriously, you will be disappointed, be warned stay clear.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this after moving to Canada from Sydney Australia, and found I couldn't get a decent coffee ANYWHERE (filter/drip isn't real coffee).This machine filled the void in my soul and tummy.Pros:1. The baskets are pressurized so it's impossible to screw up the shot2. The steam wand is sort of automatic so you don't need to have steaming technique. Foolproof if you love heaps of foam3. This delux model has a "hot milk" function if froth isn't your thing.4. It heats up SUPER fast. I turn it on in the morning and by the time I've grabbed my cup and filled the group head with coffee it's ready to go5. Great crema6. It's customisable! I haven't played around with this, but you can adjust the water temperature, and the length of shots7. It's so easy to use and you get a great coffee at home8. It came with a sample of the descaler stuff - bonus.Cons:1. The tamper it comes with sucks a bit, it's plastic and has a scoop at the other end. It doesn't impact the quality of coffee, but would have been nice if it was a real tamper2. Again, not a deal breaker - but the baskets (for single and double shots) seem to fall out really easily when you try to knock the coffee out.The pros far outweigh the very minor cons. This is an excellent machine for at home.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I am very happy with this espresso maker! Now I am not a cappuccino/latte expert but I am a coffee person. I don’t drink bad coffee and I love espresso and amercanos. But since I bought this machine I am really getting into steamed milk drinks!I got it on sale, and I’m pretty sure it was a good deal. So for the money (less than $275) I am really happy with how well it works. I generally make double shot espresso, rinse and make another double shot, then top off with steamed milk. Been experimenting a little, even made the kids hot chocolate a couple times.Setting it up was simple, cleaning it after use is reasonably easy... it is not a k-cup machine so if you are a convenience over function person an espresso machine isn’t for you. I had one time when it seemed to struggle pushing out the espresso, I took the cup thingy apart and cleaned it well, and stuck a little bit of the brush wire into the hole to clean it out. After that it was fine and I just make sure to poke the hole when I clean it now.Unless it breaks in the next couple weeks than I will continue to be very happy!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I am using this machine as someone with considerable experience with professional espresso machines. With the default parts, the espresso is rather weak and underwhelming, due to its pressurised portafilter basket, which was very poorly designed with a taper toward the bottom of the basket (compresses ground coffee into a small area, impeding water flow). These are okay to have if you use an incorrect grind. I replaced the basket with a non-pressurised one so it can actually pass water through a proper tamp at the proper grind (QUITE fine). With this small change, the quality of the espresso increased sevenfold. So now, I love it!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Honestly love this machine! I don’t often write amazon reviews but felt the need to write one for this machine! We sold our nespresso machine as we were spending $70 a month on nespresso pods! This machine makes WAY better coffee than nespresso and is just as easy to use! Slim on your counter top and saves space! Easy single, double espresso shot function! Can’t be beat! Will never be going back to nespresso!!!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this unit, loved the espresso! But after few weeks the power button got stuck. Luckily was within the return window, and got a replacement. Now, after 7 months, the same happened!Amazon said to refer to manufacturer, but this is getting too frustrating..

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Es bastante compacta, los materiales  son de primera, y sobre todo facilísima de usarAdicional la agarre a muy buen precio es de mis mejores compras que he realizado en amazon

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: L'appareil est défectueux. Il surchauffe. A servi seulement quatre mois. Comment faire pour la garantie?

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: No estoy de acuerdo con algunas personas que dan bajos puntajes a esta cafetera. Teniendo una buena mezcla de café el sabor del café es muy bueno, con granos malos y tostado medio el café no tiene buen sabor. La recomiendo con tostados tipo Italiano y i hace mezcla; mayor cantidad de Arábigo que de Robusta para equilibrar el sabor, la persistencia, lo amargo y la acidez.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: UPDATE:  I’ve had it for 3 years now and I’m still very happy with it!  Still going strong!I’ve had it for 3 weeks now.  It’s a well made machine, that takes up very little counter space.  Very easy to use....definitely good those who haven’t used an espresso machine before.  It makes good espresso, and excellent foam!  The frothing spout will also deliver hot water if needed for tea, etc.  Very handy!*its been over a year since my purchase, and this machine continues to make quality cappuccinos for me on a daily basis :-)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The handle is hard to pull on, it took me a while to figure out why. You have to make sure you line it up with the arrows pretty precisely before attempting to tighten on. You need to exert "some" pressure to get it all the way tightened but don't force it. If it's jammed try again until it works. This takes some getting used to but be patient, you'll get it.It produced better quality coffee on a fine grind, but not all the way fine. Coarser grinds on this machine produce BITTER coffee. They say the grinder is as important as the machine, so I bought the recommended burr-style grinder for it and I assume this has contributed to the high quality output of the machine.The footprint is small, welcome for any kitchen with limited counter space. The only downside I can see here is the plastic water tank, but I think you have to spend more than $339 CAD to get a metal one, plus it doesn't affect anything.I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend this machine for both beginners and espresso aficionados.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: First off I'm a dual qualified engineer. Systems engineering and communications and guidance engineer, so I'm no dummy. But the instructions for setup, adjust temp specifically suck! They do not match the actually procedure, but once I figured it out (experiential intuition helps) it's not difficult to run. In addition, DON'T OVERFILL THE FILTER BASKET!  If the filter will not insert and rotate to lock, you likely have to much coffee in the basket. They should have a clearer marking. I think the baskets should have been a little deeper for both the one and two cups. You can't make it strong enough. Coffee does not come out hot enough even at the highest setting (at best that I can tell, is where I have it set).  You cannot make a double Americano, because to make even a small cup of Americano you will need to use the 2 cup basket. So the dual drip for two shots is pretty much useless.  I literally just received the unit, set it up and tried a few experiments for the first time, so I'll play with it a bit, but if I don't get any better at it, it'll go back. So far, I'm a little disappointed in De' Longhi, especially since they are Italian ... you'd think they'd be a little fussier about their espresso machines at ANY level.Think I'm close to mastering this thing. The scoop that comes with the tamper sucks, use a regular tsp. For a 2 cup, loosely fill the basket to the top edge with a fine grind (not superfine).  Lightly tamper do not over tamper. If you take the filter off after making your espresso and its "soupy" then you likely over tampered and the water is not flowing properly and you won't get a decent creme.  When you lightly temper and clean the edges you should end up with about 1/8th of an inch of space at the top of the basket. If you heater is like mine, it needs to be at the hottest setting.  When you master this you should have about 30% or better creme at the top of your cup and it should take a few minutes not seconds to disappear. As well, instead of soup in the basket you should end up with a puck that basically falls out.Update after the first week of use. Once we all started to master the technique of using this machine, we all have come to the conclusion (4 of us) that you can make a nice smooth velvety espresso and a really nice Americano. The trick as noted about is to A) not over grind your coffee. Fine but not Superfine!! and B) do not overfill the basket. We mostly make double cups and such its basically 2 heaping tsp  of fine Starbucks espresso (that's what we use). When you level that with your finger or a flat edge it should b just about or very close to level across the top of the filter. Then firmly tamper making sure the coffee is level and you don't have valleys. The resulting space from coffee to top of the filter should be about 1/8" - 3/16".  With the right grind as noted that should give you a really nice smooth espresso with a luxurious creme.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Absolutely wonderful machine.  Quiet and quick to heat up, about 30 seconds.  Great being able to modify the dispense program to pour longer and shorter shots and have this retained in the unit. Takes up very small amount of counter space.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is the 3rd espresso machine I've owned. This one lasted me about 1Yr8Mo. We have very heavy usage of the machine, probably 4 to 6 lattes/espressos a day across my family.Overall the size is really amazing and fits perfect in my cramped kitchen.Warm-up time is very fast.Super easy to use.Quality of coffee is average, crema quality depends a lot on the grind and coffee you use. Your water quality also plays a HUGE part in the coffee - I suggest buying bottled distilled + a coffee water additive for best results.Foaming milk is super easy and almost fool proof.Cleaning requirements are about the same as any other. Once a month I need to run the cleaning cycle with descale solution.The machine started to break after about 1 year. The steaming wand started dripping water whenever the machine was on. I would lose about 1 espresso of water from the wand every 4 or 5 espressos I made - so I needed to keep a cup under the wand to catch the water.About 1yr8mo into owning, the pump totally died and it stopped working. This is not too bad, as most espresso machines I've owned tend to die within 16 months.If you're a heavy user, I advise getting the warranty.I expect these little machines to break - that is just the nature of the beast for low cost espresso machines. But the leaking wand was annoying.I bought another one today - the sleek size and adequate quality are the right fit for my needs.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Je suis débutant dans le monde Espresso. Ça été difficile de choisir parmi la multitude de produit. Celui-ci me satisfait très bien. Il est compact et est très rapide. Beaucoup moins cher que des machines super-automatiques. Et je peux faire d'excellent latte la fin de semaine. Ça fonctionne très bien.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I could not have said this better myself....I also roast my own coffee and have also used a variety of machines!!!This machine appears on paper to have some really good features for a mid priced machine. sadly what it doesn't do is make good coffee. This machine cannot produce any crema. the only way to get crema is to use a coarser grind and don't tamp it much. This method gives you a tiny bit of crema, but disappears rather quickly. I'm not a coffee or espresso novice, i roast my own beans, i have used many machines, cheap and expensive. and i have concluded that this units pressurized portafilter is the reason it sucks. it is incapable of producing any significant amount of crema. This unit however is beautiful and small which was what i needed for the space i was buying for, but wow was this ever a disappointment in regards to performance and coffee quality... for anyone who takes their coffee a little more seriously, you will be disappointed,

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I've had this machine for 6 month now and it is my 8th cappucino/espresso machine. I like that the amount of coffee (water) is programmable. I also find very nice that the water(coffee) temperature is also programmable. My water comes from a well and the water is "hard" this machine reminds me when i have to descale it so i really like this option. All around a great machine and it also looks very nice BUT after following the manufacturer instruction and using only a damp cloth to clean the exterior of the machine as you can see in the picture the paint is coming off and it's being only 6 month ! This is the only reason i did not give it 5 stars. Hope my review helps.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Belle machine, le café est bon sans plus, très peu de créma. Le bouton ON/OFF ne fonctionne pas toujours, parfois il ne veut pas ouvrir, ne clique pas. Après plusieurs ajustements sur la machine et sur la mouture du café qui est frais moulu, toujours peu de créma, décevant.  Auparavant, on a eu une Breville Roma qui coûte à moitié moins cher, qui a donné un bon café avec beaucoup de créma, sans ajustement; il fallait juste réchauffer les tasses avant la filtration.  Nous allons décider avant la date limite de retourner l'appareil.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Setup the machine as per instructions last night.  It made decent enough espresso, and I planned to dial in the best possible settings today.This morning 1/3 of the water tank had leaked out, leaving a large puddle and dripping down the wooden table I had the machine on.  I checked the tank, and it was sitting flush with the machine.  I removed the tank and did not notice any leakage where the tank connects to the machine.  Lifting the machine revealed a wet underside.Not sure if it was the machine, or something I had done wrong, I removed the tank, cleaned the machine, dried all surfaces (including the bottom of the machine) and let the machine sit for 2 hours.  I then checked it to confirm all surfaces were still dry.  I placed it on the kitchen counter for a test run.  I filled the tank 1/2 way and clicked it into place, making sure it was well connected and sitting flush with the machine (see picture 3).  I made two double espressos.  Unfortunately I could see water seeping out from the bottom (see picture 1).  Upon turning off the machine and lifting it, I could see there was water dripping from the slits in the plastic bottom (see picture 2).  Lifting out the water tank showed there was no leakage around where the tank meets the machine (see picture 4).To do a bit more sleuthing, I turned the cleaned up the machine, kept it off, and put the tank back in.  It started to leak again.Seems like I have a defective machine, which is unfortunate.  I would love to exchange it for a working one, but the only option seems to be to return it.  Can't give a brand new espresso machine that is leaky any more than 1 star :(

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: it does work and makes nice espresso, but a learning curve. Each bean is different for the required grind. I used no name espresso bean from Walmart when I first got it, grind to super fine Espresso with my Brevel dose grinder and it worked great, but this was only till I got some nice beans, when my lavazza arrived and I did same grind, plugged that thing like no tomorrow LOL no water would push through nada might as well be a plug. had to go up to a 18 (25 is filter grind...) and now i get a decent espresso out of it, slowly moved down to a grind of 15 no lower. Im scared to change beans to try others as the waste figuring out the correct grind is terrible. the milk frother works well easy to clean, for my first espresso machine that isnt a pod enviro disaster, it is good, easy to use/clean and holding up well (had it over a month done my first descaling) If I could do it over? I would spend the extra $200 and get a real machine but for a starter this is great.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Super décevant, le café passe une fois sur deux, et les deux autres fois la pression dans le gobelet est tellement grande quand demilit presque la machine à essayer de l'enlever. On sentw d que quand on se fait un café le matin, on n'a pas le goût de se faire niaiser par la machine.Je nettoie tous les morceaux après chaque utilisation, je démonté le mini filtre, etc.À la quantité de café que j'ai dû jeter pour recommencer dans l'espoir que ça marche, j'aurais pu acheter une machine de meilleure qualité.Je retourne au bodum

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I wanted to buy an entry level machine for espresso making to save on some money at Starbucks, and boy have I definitely accomplished that. It took a few cartons of plant-based milk and trial and error to understand and learn the machine but now its such smooth sailing. Within 5 minutes I can have a latte ready. I usually drink about 2-3 a day since it's just so easy to make and if you find the right type of coffee for you, you'll have a great time. Also, it took about 2 months for the machine to descale so now we have to buy some more descaling liquid. Unfortunately they ask that you buy the same brand? Not sure how I feel about that.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I can't believe i reordered after the used version i got off amazon was faulty. I thought, hey why not give this a try, people say it works great, and i'm dying for good espresso. The first one i got leaked water from the back EVERYWHERE and none came out the nozzle where it's supposed to come out. Now i'm crying trying depserateky to get ANY water to come out the new version i got after i reordered for a new model. it boils fine but wont come out the damn nozzle!!! Am i insane?? Are these all P.O.Ss? because after running the water out the steam nozzle and descaling it BRAND NEW i sTILL can't get any friggin espresso, it's so low pressure. I barely get a dribble withOUT any coffee in it. AVOID.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Love this machine.  Not only can you make your favourite brew at home, but you can also buy your favourite pods to use as well!  I wasn’t expecting that.  I use it at least 1-2 times per day so it will certainly pay for itself in the not to distant future.  I also love that there is the option of making payments rather than putting out a lump sum…especially this time of year with Christmas just around the corner!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I received the replacement Delonghi espresso machine.  I received it the same day actually before I was able to get the faulty machine sent back, for which I thank you.The replacement is also faulty:  Exactly the same problem occurred:The first cup was made, but it took several presses of the button to get the espresso cup half full.  Then yesterday when I was next back in this residence, I put it on, and it didn't work.  No coffee came through.After the pressure had gone down after some hours I emptied it out and tried running it through with no coffee.  As with the first machine, no water came through.  It also took several hours to cool down enough to take off the portafilta, and even then it had maintained some pressure.  The portafilta was full of water.It seems to me that there is a design flaw, and when quality control tests them, they do one shot of espresso and then think the machine is fine.This takes time and effort to get the machines returned.....taking them to the Post Office rather than courier.I will be speaking directly to DelonghiI

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Es una cafetera que hace un espresso, muy delgado para mi gusto y no creo que la bomba tenga la suficiente fuerza como para pensar algo que quede cremoso. He intentado con varios niveles de ee molienda y el resultado sigue siendo, no el que esperaba. Sin duda para el precio es un excelente compra, sin duda nunca será lo de una cafetera profesional.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: La pompe m’a lâchée après un an seulement. Dommage car pour le reste c’était bien.Maintenant je n’achète plus les produits De LonghiJe ne recommande pas cette cafetière.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: En la descripción la ofertan como acabado en acero inoxidable, pero es plástico con una muy buena imitación.La potencia es justa, pero cualquier máquina Nespresso ofrece una mejor crema, por lo que esta bien si buscas algo más artesanal o, como en mi caso, reducir el impacto ambiental de las cápsulas.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I really can’t fault the machine itself, it works really well especially for a previously owned unit. The issue I have with both Amazon and DeLonghi is that the box was missing a small insignificant part that both companies seem intent on not bothering to send me despite me asking both companies for that 50 cent part.The only option Amazon could provide was a full refund on a return, missing the point that getting the part was the preferable option, something Amazon staff feel is beneath them to do. At the end this will be my final purchase with Amazon as their support is non existant.DeLonghi is no better asking me to jump through hoops again for a 50 cent part that just seems to be an elusive animal. While I like the DeLonghi machine once it goes, hopefully years from now, it will be last product from that company as their staff or third party staff could not be bothered to support their customers despite contacting them several times.Amazon and DeLonghi should both take a course on how to properly support customers but they are not the only companies that simply sell crappy stuff they don’t support.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Have had it for two weeks now and really like  its performance. Had to return a previous model (from another manufacturer) because that model did not produce the desired level of crema during the pour. Love the feature that auto measures the output of coffee. the steam wand is easy to use and easy to clean (once you get the hang of it).

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The stainless steel cannot be solid due to the extremely light weight of this product so don't be fooled.  I confirmed this fact on a YouTube review.  It is a coating over plastic.  I have not actually used the product because I am returning it unopened.  I was notified of a discounted price through TSC .  When I initiated a return, I was shocked to find that I would be charged $30.00 for shipping.  Buyer beware!  Although Amazon advertises the best price and free returns, neither is true!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The Delonghi Dedica makes you feel like a barista, making coffee this way is certainly more effort than pouring hot water on some granules. It's a smart looking machine enhancing the quality feel of any kitchen. Getting your coffee right is about getting familiar with the machine operation. I like a long latte and get great results with the steamer too. The pump action of the machine makes it a little noisy. Tt really is only efficient for making a couple of coffees at a time.Overall this is a great machine but take a little time to practice to get the best results.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I like this espresso machine. Small and minimalist for small counter top. The only problem with this is it takes a while to make another batch of espresso so I need to turn off the machine and restart for another cup of espresso.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Es una buena cafetera de espresso, aunque no es de una calidad profesional, sino que es una gran máquina para el hogar. Llevo medio año con ella y estoy fascinado, me encanta!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I just love my espresso machine.  Coffee is really tasty and creamy when using the correct coffee ground. I had an issue with the pump after 2/3 months of use but using the warranty was easy although it took the repaired shop 1 month to repair it.  Working great nowSteamer is jot that great.  It releases too much water and makes my milk very weak.  I don't use it

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Belle allure, compacte sur le comptoir, fonctionne bien et fait de bons cafés. Deux défauts : le fonctionnement de l’appareil n’est pas intuitif. Il est compliqué à faire fonctionner. Aussi, si on apporte des réglages spéciaux, comme le temps d’écoulement ou la température du café, ils sont perdus à chaque fois qu’on débranche l’appareil ou qu’il y a une panne de courant. Mais, dans l’ensemble, nous aimons bien notre cafetière.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Gotta say the shipping was quick, but as pic shown, it arrives damaged. The machine, idk, maybe the water stains? For ppl if you mind that, just think carefully before you purchase this. It wasn’t taking a lot of space tho, and that’s the main point I got this lil machine. It’s great for beginner so, if you thinking to get one as entry level. Unless if you have higher budget, otherwise just go for this. XDEdited: Especially for girls, when you are tryin’ to close the filter, have an anti slip mat under the machine will be very very helpful.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Love this machine! This is our first espresso machine and after using it a few times I have it down to an art. Took me a few tries to figure out what all the buttons/flashing buttons mean.We are busy in the mornings so It was key to have a machine with an automatic drip stop. From start to finish I can make a cappuccino in 3 minutes. I also love how slim this is. Takes up minimal space. Only con is I wish it came with a metal milk frothing pitcher.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Terrible.After 2 weeks, no pressure build up.I've ensured nothing in the cup is clogged and even went so far as to use very little espresso. Cannot push any water through.Weak compressor and possibly already a leak as no water pushes through at all.Will be contacting for a full refund. PATHETIC

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Got hooked on Americanos on a recent cruise so decided to purchase.  One of the prime reasons for this model is it's small footprint as we do not have a lot of counter space.  Used about a month so far mostly weekends otherwise drinking our regular drip coffee.  We make mostly long black (espresso to hot water).  The portafilter is slightly on the small side and does not allow you to get a full 14 grams of coffee grounds loaded.  If you overfill then you will be unable to load in machine.  Each level scoop measure ( included ) is approx 7 grams of grounds so you need slightly less.  The scoop has a tamper on one end but would recommend a sturdy 51 mm tamper.  Obviously grind is a factor and our grinder that works well for drip can't produce fine enough grounds for  espresso.  We've gone through a pound of locally roasted and ground beans so far and enjoyed every cup.  Definitely more work than making a pot of coffee but just no comparison in flavor and well worth the effort.Did try the steaming wand/ frother in making hot chocolate for the grand kids and all worked well.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: As a former barista, I was skeptical about using a tiny home version like this. But I was pleasantly surprised. This machine is top notch – I use it every single day, often twice a day, and it works perfect every time. I highly recommend this product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: 1) looks great ( space saver on my boat)2) read the manual3) hard to get decent crema (treied all manner of grind and basket pressure)4) decent coffee5) poorly built ?6) cleaned it with Delonghi fluid when the brown steam icon shows7) Maybe I got a bad one.  Leaked out the wand after three months of daily use, Double shot went to one shot (computer problem)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   This machine can make good espresso, which I really like, and comes with really nice appearance , furthermore, small & convenient body size.However, I can’t make the coffee so early as it make very loud noise, I don’t want to wake my roommate up by this way😂😂

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: leaking from the steam wand after 7 months. The machine was sold by Coffee Mocha.  We called Delonghi customer support, and they said that Coffee Mocha is not an authorized re-seller and that they could not honor any warranty even though there was a warranty card in the box.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I give 4 stars as it can be hard to get the portafilter into the unit. This seems to be owing to the precision of the amount of coffee/fill level required. In the two spoons filter, it doesn't take QUITE two spoons. If you fill it too far, it takes a great deal of effort to get it on. I have had other machines that didn't require quite this level of precision!That said, the coffee is terrific and I will adjust! So far, so good.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: It makes a very decent espresso for it's price, and the steam wand is better than I expected and better than other models. Make sure to buy the descaler right away or you'll be sad and less a cappuccino for a day or so while you get it...Only thing I might do differently next machine I get is one that allows me to choose how much espresso I extract.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Very easy to use. I am happy and satisfied with my first expresso machine. I have only one complaint and that is, I wish there was a non pressurized portafilter option from Delonghi, or one compatible with the machine, as I’m not aware if I will be able to upgrade that peice once I’m more established in my expresso making craft. For the price, I think you should have that option. Could be my own fault though, as I should have researched this a teeny bit better before purchasing.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I love this machine, I was torn between this or Bellville and I am glad I went with this one. Easy to setup, automatic stop that can be adjusted, temp is adjustable, let's you know when it's time to descale. It also looks good and is not very big so it doesn't hog a lot of counter space. Highly recommend this one to anyone on the fence about which machine to purchase.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Now that have the hang of the unit, I can see that it overheats quite easily and does not always have a consistent volume when trying to us the "double" measure. some times it only pours 1 ounce, other times 1.5. -Looks super stylish, and makes nice crema, but i feel like I downgraded from a breville I owned for 9 years.Unfortunately I have missed my return window.  so will be keeping the purchase.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: tel que décrit à la réception, le café est délicieux mais après 2 mois, la pompe a brisée. Elle a toujours fait beaucoup de bruit aussi.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: J’avais une énorme Breville modele Barista comme machine à espresso. La machine a brisé 2 fois et les pièces trop difficiles à trouver. Avec cette petite machine, c’est simple et efficace! A un bien meilleur  prix, il suffit d’avoir un moulin à café à côté  pour broyer ses grains. Le moteur fonctionne bien et le lait mousse très bien ( même mieux que dans l’autre « grosse » machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: The unit I received had a problem with the power button.Amazon Customer Service was 5 star fantastic.Delonghi was 1 star awful. Full runaround on an exchange and very unresponsive. After many emails I opted to return the unit and will buy something else. Very disappointed in Delonghi......

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Muy buen producto, excelentes acabados y de calidad. Hace café espresso, espresso doble según se requiera. Tambié se puede hacer americano ya que puede sacar agua caliente. Fácil de usar, pero si hay que leer las instrucciones. Fácil de limpiar también. Es excelente compra para los aficionados del café.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Beautiful, slick, easy to use, consistent delicious coffee all the time every time. I love how practical it is to make coffee and also easy to clean. The steam arm is superbe the best I've ever seen and used. It warms up in less than a minute and it's thin enough to not take counter space. Another fantastic feature is that you can remove the water tank. And the machine even tells you when is time to descale. I strongly recommend this product.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Malgré plusieurs commentaires positifs, je trouve cette machine peu performante. La fonction lait moussé style cappuchino est loin d’être efficace et donne un lait chaud plein de bulles et peu crémeux. Le café est bon, mais sans plus. La machine est bruyante.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: La cafetera hace lo que promete: un buen expreso, opciones de programación de temperatura y tipo de agua, y en un reducido tamaño, que fue el factor más importante de compra cuando la comparé con otras opciones. El diseño es tipo "retro" y acabados metálicos. 4 estrellas, porque la opción de bombeo de agua caliente es ruidosa y con demasiada presión.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Mi experiencia anterior a esta máquina era la Oster prima latte 2 y la verdad es que esta máquina si bien no es superior con lo que viene dentro de la caja, una vez que adquieres un filtro no presurizado (cosa que no pude conseguir en la oster) la experiencia es superior. La máquina es personalisable, cómoda y abarca poco espacio. En líneas generales estoy satisfecho y la recomiendo ampliamente, acompañada de un buen molino tienes pasatiempo y buenos cafés garantizados.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Great coffee maker.  Adjustable heat and pour duration is a big plus.  Works great with coffee ground with my bodum grinder but not so much with preground coffee. For the later I have to be very light when pressing or the pump cant handle it.  Maybe its due to its double wall filter, a questionnable design.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Parts of the unit are well built and sturdy, while other parts are cheap and flimsy. So uneven design quality. Ok for beginners, but you'll soon pine for a nicer unit.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I was blown away with the quality and function of this machine - it looks and feels very premium for the price! I used to be a barista therefore I definitely prefer manual over automatic. The machine is very easy to use/clean, it's slim in size and, most importantly, the coffee tastes great! You simply cannot go wrong, I highly recommend it!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Programmation possible pour différentes fonctions. Silencieuse comparée à mon ancienne machine expresso. Très bonne perfusion de café pour un meilleur goût. Belle apparence en plus. Il me reste à souhaiter qu’elle soit durable car je commence à l’utiliser.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I bought this machine for travel not expecting much because of its size and inexpensive price.  I am happy to report that I have thoroughly enjoyed the unexpected good results. I am puzzled by the suggestion that the machine cannot produce any crema.  That is true if you introduce it to a cold receptacle.  Rinsing the cup with a little hot water before starting the brew, however, will produce crema.  I have a larger more professional system at home but this one is a lot faster and more convenient.  I would not hesitate to recommend it.
