Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This machine is a welcome addition to our counter top. It makes amazing espresso with a lovely crema. Ensure that your beans are ground for espresso. The milk frother works well and we have delicious cappuccinos every day now.For those complaining that the insert falls out when you bang the handle to dump the coffee, I would suggest just scooping out the grounds with a plastic spoon into your compost. This isn’t a commercial grade machine where you should be banging it anyways in my opinion.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: So my experience was not as great. It’s been under two months. Let me start on the positive, it’s beautiful. It’s coffee is okay once you tweak the settings but not café store quality. While reading the the specs etc there is a piece that says “dishwasher safe” this is not true for all pieces. [insert image here] it appears the alloy is a type of aluminum based on the discolouration, aluminum is very unsafe to consume.. I guess I just expected more being a pricey purchase.I guess it’s up to you but don’t base you purchase on appearance alone as clearly it’s limited.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I should have known better though (as this was a replacement for the same model that only lasted 2 years - so I'll take some of the blame)If you like using a pin to clean the machine AFTER EVERY USE then this is the machine for you - if not... keep looking because this will WASTE a ton of coffee and make for aggravating cleaning situations - and I missed the "return" window by 4 days according to Amazon.DO NOT BUY THIS if you want a properly functioning espresso machine.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This is overall a good expresso machine for the price. Just don’t pack the coffee too tightly. If you simply compress the coffee it makes a nice cup. Best also to use distilled water in these machines to prevent too much scaling. Ascetically the red finish is a fine choice. Overall it is worth the price.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Après deux mois d’utilisation la pompe semble montrer des signes de faiblesse.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: This product is so great. Got the item quickly, works great. Came with accessories. Love the sleek look of it. Makes such a nice espresso, cappuccino, latte… has lots of foam. Love using the milk frother also, the milk comes out steaming hot and super foamy. So happy with this product;)

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Overall good value. Great heat and pressure, amazing steaming wand. Has been giving a strange flashing lights sequence, but turning it off and on works so far. Want a larger drip tray to better accommodate the steamer wand.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Cette machine fait de l'excellent café et une mousse incroyable!. Elle est facile d'ulisation et chauffe en un temps record. Assurez-vous d'avoir une café moulu très finement!

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I use it at work. Two coffees and more from Monday to Friday and very happy with the machine. Choose a good grind coffee and this espresso machine will give you an excellent espresso or an allongé.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Coffee is great, super super quick heating. Can do cup after cup. Nice crema. Frother seems perfect too. LOVE that the water tank comes off and can be thrown in the dishwasher. Chose this unit because of the small footprint.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Je m’attendais à beaucoup mieux de cette machine. Ce n’est pas vraiment de l’expresso que fait cette machine! Mais un café très ordinaire!Je vais peut-être finir par trouver comment l’apprivoiser! Quelle est la meilleure mouture?

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Es un producto de buena calidad, fácil de usar y con buen funcionamiento. La oportunidad está en encontrar el café correcto para un latte perfecto. Hace falta más información de qué tipo, variedad, tostado, blend y demás para alcanzar el sabor sublime del café. También es difícil controlar la espuma de la leche. Seguimos intentándolo

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: We have used the espresso machine for a month now and it is excellent.The controls are straightforward and easy to use.Like all espresso machines, it is important to regularly clean the filters and the milk frother to ensure nothing plugs up.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: I have been using the machine every day for 2 months now and I really like it. Make great espresso, capuccino and latte. Just have to take the time to find what type of coffee you like and then you are set. Saves a lot of money compared to buying coffee pods.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
Review Description: Use it daily. Love how compact it is. the milk frother takes a while to get used to. Haven't figured out how to get good foam for latte art.Fits a standard mug under it when you remove the big drip tray. You can put a bigger cup under it too but if you fill it too much it will spill when you take it out.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red

They don't want to replace it.Pretty expensive for a 1-year life machine......Never tried another DeLonghi machine.. but the customer service ! No thank you.. Never again.

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red

Product Title: DeLonghi America, Inc EC685R Dedica Deluxe 15-Bar Pump Espresso Machine, Red
